story:
Sub-Space is a game for adults over the age of 17.  It is not a cheap card game you would find at your average novelty store, but it IS a game you will want to play with your friends with dirty minds.


The theme of the game is centered on BDSM, and does have some nudity depicted on the cards.  So just like an R rated movie, you likely don't want to do this activity with the whole family



Originally the game was one huge deck for up to 8 players, but by cutting it down, we where able to give each a bit of a theme.  The Soft deck has a lighter touch and is not as brutal or graphic as the Hard deck.  But, if you want to play with more than 4 friends, just shuffle both decks together and see who knows what, and who blushes.



Actually there is no sexual acts in the card game, unless you count the occasional 4 letter word.  The game has you collecting items, breaking others items, or stealing them for your own. 

When I created the game, I was thinking that there are no real card games for adults.  At least none like this.  Most of them are for trying to get you ready to score.  This game has the advantage that it's weird enough to play with friends who don't know, and suggestive enough for your friends that do.  But at it's base, it's a fun game with an adult theme.

  We have have printed the beta cards minus the art, and are in the process of beta-testing it further to work out any 'kinks' so to speak, but it is nearly ready now, we just need your support to print and ship the final project!


For $5, your name will be added to the webpage wall of benefactors.  Its our way of saying thank you, and additionally you will be given information about upcoming products before the general audience.


For $20 you will receive a copy of the Soft deck which includes the play cards, Sub cards, and instruction booklet and a category reference card.  You will also get your name on our website as a supporter, and early notifications about up coming products.


For $20 you will receive a copy of the Hard deck which includes the play cards, Sub cards, and instruction booklet and a category reference card.  You will also get your name on our website as a supporter, and early notifications about up coming products.


For $40 you will receive a box set including both Hard and Soft decks. This includes the play cards, Sub cards, and instruction booklet and 4 play mats .  You will also get your name on our website as a supporter, and early notifications about up coming products.


For $80 you will receive a box set including both Hard and Soft decks. This includes the play cards, Sub cards, and instruction booklet and 4 play mats .  Along with the game, you will also receive a T-shirt in Dark Grey or Black with the Subspace Logo, the Shot glass perk with the Subspace Logo, and a customized Submissive card.  You will also get your name on our website as a supporter, and early notifications about up coming products.


This $120 perk will get you a hand made genuine leather paddle, which will be featured on the Paddle card in the Hard deck.  Along with the paddle, you will also get both Hard and Soft decks which include the play cards, Sub cards, and instruction booklet and a category reference card, and your name on our website as a supporter, and early notifications about up coming products.

There is only one of this perk so first come, first spank.  Special Thanks to Mulefoot for offering this leather paddle as a contribution and a perk!


At the $150 level perk, you will get a hand made mop tail flogger which will be featured on the Flogger card of the Hard deck.  Along with the paddle, you will also get both Hard and Soft decks which include the play cards, Sub cards, and instruction booklet, and your name on our website as a supporter, and early notifications about up coming products.

There is only one of this perk so first come, first smack.  Special Thanks to Whipping Stripes for offering this Flogger as a perk!


For $180 you will get you a hand made genuine leather spiked collar, which will be featured on the Collar card in the Hard deck.  Once the goal is reached, we will ask for measurements and color preferences to customize it to your liking.  Along with the paddle, you will also get both Hard and Soft decks which include the play cards, Sub cards, and instruction booklet and a category reference card, and your name on our website as a supporter, and early notifications about up coming products.
There is only one of this perk so first come, first leash.  Special thanks to Ayrecaivo Leather for doing all the leather work on this perk!


Now below are a couple of additional perks.  If you wish to include these in your donation, please be sure to send us a message saying what the extra is for.


Along with the name on our website as a sponsor, we have a limited number of shot glasses for $6 each.  They will have the Sub-Space card back on the glass to show off your support.


For $10 you can have a custom Sub card.  This includes the name,  and what items  your sub will need to win.  As with every perk, you will get your name on our website as a supporter, and early notifications about up coming products.


For $25 extra you can get a black or dark grey printed T-shirt with the Subspace Logo, and show off your support for the game.  Once we have met our goal, we will ask about your shirt size  As with every perk, you will get your name on our website as a supporter, and early notifications about up coming products.

story:
A 2D Storytelling Role-Playing Game

Legend of Miro - Summary

Legend of Miro is a 2D storytelling role-playing game in which you play the role of James Sullivan, a normal character that has to face a journey that will change his perception about life and what is important in life.


Greenlit!

The gaming community was awesome and they have managed to Greenlit our small Indie Game in just 8 days from the date it was posted on Steam. We would like to thank all of those that helped us achieve this goal. Thanks!

We have been working full-time for months on Legend of Miro (January 8th) and this is the last stretch of the road and we need a little boost to get there.

Joel Couture on Siliconera: Preview article about Legend of Miro.

Characters

James Sullivan

Guard

???



The Perks

For the 25€, 50€, 100€ perks, you will also receive Random Steam Keys for each donation, at the end of the campaign (if the goal is reached).


The Team

We are a team of 2 developers that just started a great journey in the Gaming industry. Both of us are graduates of an Engineering University, which is not actually related to gaming, but we found our passion and dream job in developing games. 
Since this is our first gaming project, we encountered many difficulties and unknown issues to us, but we managed to solve them by trial and error. We guess this is how it all starts...

The Funds

Although we are only a team of 2 developers, we done everything so far on our own budget. The funds raised on IndieGogo will go towards improvements of the game in general (graphics, animations, gameplay and future translations to other languages).
The gaming industry is global and there are over 40 languages spoken by gamers, this is why a big part of the funds will go to translations and localisation features. 


Backer Impact

Every donation is highly appreciated and will be used to improve the game. Since the base idea of the game was to build it from the ground up based on what the gamers want, we developed as we received ideas and feedback from the Steam community.


Environment



Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot donate, you can also help by spreading the word about the campaign and the game itself. Every share, tweet like counts. 

We appreciate all your help and are grateful for your interest in our first Indie Game. You guys rock!

story:
The idea behind RAIN|FALL?

To write a great, dark story with multiple interesting characters and plots and make it as much interactive as possible.

RAINFALL takes story driven games to a new level. It's not just telling the story by scrolling through walls of text. You are in the game, you make decisions, you talk to whoever you want and you go wherever you want.

Instead of just talking to the people you meet, you can also get to know the world around you by reading letters, newspapers, notes, as well as simply looking at the scene and investigating it.

 

Reading letters, newspapers, notes is essential if you want to know more about what happened in the scene.​

A third operation of the current team of the Agency of Unnatural Cases turned out to be the most difficult and the most dangerous of them all.​ It's been raining for almost a week in that place. You are Alan Reed - one third of The Agency of Unnatural Cases and it's your job to find out why is this happening and how to stop it... or else, bad things are going to happen. 

Solve the mystery of the village where it always rains. Find the suspects, find out why they did it and stop the rain... Sounds easy? It shouldn't. People you are going to meet may not be as harmless and nice as you might have thought. And time is running out before the place is completely flooded. Possibility of a flood is not the only thing that should motivate you to do your job properly and make the right choices - a dangerous group of bandits have also settled in the village and no one knows why they are there.

Discover what happens to people when their usual colorful, sunny days become gritty and sad, and... rainy. Who are they going to blame for what ensued? See for yourself.

 

You will visit many locations in the demo and even more in the full game!

  • choices and consequences (your decisions (either in dialogues or environmental ones) will change the story, characters, their attitude to you and many other aspects of the game).
  • original, dark, cliché-free story.
  • different environmental puzzles.
  • minigames.
  • collectibles.
  • different endings based on your choices.

Planned:

  • comparing your choices and collectibles to other people's (internet connection required).
  • "speech ability" - the higher it is, the more chance you have to convince someone to your point of view.
  • relations with different characters - depending on either they are bad or good, there will be different outcomes. 
  • changing your character's appearance.
  • more puzzles in dream world (in addition, things you do in the dream world will leave marks in the real world and the other way around). 

​

I prepared some cool rewards for you, some even give an opportunity to be involved in the creative process of the game. Check it out!

5$ - digital download of the game and a big internet hug from me.

10$ - (^) + YOUR name in credits.... twice. At the begging AND the end. You should be sold right now.

FEATURED:  (EARLY BACKERS) $25 - (^) + Soundtrack and high quality posters. Ready to listen, ready to print. (Limited offer)

$35 - Again, soundtrack and posters. For those who were too late for 'early backer's offer' or who want to support RAINFALL more. Thanks!

$50 - (^) + Wallpapers - High quality wallpapers from the game. Illustrations or screenshots. Though, you shouldn't cover your wall with these... posters are for that!

$70 - (^) + Making of/Behind the scenes videos of RAINFALL and concept art as well as concept writing (with comments) from the game.

$95 - (^) + A lore book - What is a lore book? Well, it describes the whole lore (universe, world) of the game [pictures included]. Because the world in RAINFALL is original, there are many interesting things can not only enhance the experience but also make you the most powerful user on RAINFALL wiki (if it will ever... like... exist).

$125 - (^) + Write an inscription on one of the grave stones in the game. - There is actually a thing I did in my last game, where I put a funny quote/last words on every grave stone... but that was a comedy game. Please don't put anything funny or stupid on t... eh, whatever, you can do what you want.

$155 - (^) + Your character in the game! - RAINFALL is a game about characters. There's no denying to that. They play mayor roles in the plot. With this perk you can design your own character. I promise to not kill him/her... at least until the ending!

$190 - (^) + Add a plot/character/scene to the game! Now, let me be clear, RAINFALL has a story that is in one way or another shaped by the player. But how cool is it to change the story before anyone else! 

Thanks for every contribution!

(^) means (everything above)

 

The last several months I've been contacting artists, pixel artists and indie composers to help me with the game and set a budget. Fund splitting looks like this:

40% will go for creating original graphics for the game, to make the game much more unique (and better) looking. It will also enable me create the world exactly how I want it to be.                 

10% will go to the super talented artist who drew the artwork you see up there and will also help me with some other artworks for the game (posters, bulletins, newspapers etc.)                     

30% is for an original "soundtrack" for the game.                               

20% is for fees and other unforeseen expenses.

Why Indiegogo?

The idea of an adventure game in which it rains for most of the game and an investigator trying to solve the mystery has been in my head for a really long time now. And, after finishing The Time Traveler, a comedy RPG, I started working on this game. Why a crowdfunding campaign? I feel like I can make a good game with a great story but I don't have much money to spend on game development, that's why I've used free assets for my last game and Rainfall demo.  

I need your help to make my game unique not only because of the story but also because of the graphics and the music. With my skill for game development and your finacial help we can achieve great things! But for now, let's just make a game :) It will be like you've created this game with me (you will be credited in the game after all). And you have a chance to get cool rewards, so go for it!

With your support RAINFALL will be even more unique.

My work you can check out:

Mentioned earlier demo of RAINFALL: [DEMO]

As well as my last game - The Time Traveler (4.5 / 5). Keep in mind that TTT is a comedy and RAINFALL is much more of a drama, so it's on the other end of the spectrum. But the overall writing and good ratings the game got should give you an idea of how I make games.

Risks and challenges

Most of the problems I had with the engine I use were resolved when I was creating my last game - The Time Traveler. Keep in mind, that game was an RPG and it required a lot more time and technicalities to make it work well. RAINFALL is not that complicated but it's a much, MUCH longer game and the choices and consequences in TTT are only a taste of what I'm doing in RAINFALL.

Speaking of, the choices and consequences aspect of the game takes a lot of development time and is sometimes really challenging to pull off. I've tested it in my last game and it worked quite well (exept the ending which will be way more complex in RAINFALL).
In the end it's worth it, but it also means that the release date maybe pushed a couple of times.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

How can you help other than backing us?

Advertising games is most times even more challenging than making them. Want to help RAIN|FALL become one of the best indie adventure games of 2017? Help me spread the word around your friends! Use INDIEGOGO's share features! In other words, click one some of the buttons you see on the page. A friendly tweet mentioning #RAINIFALL or @comezgone would help a lot too.

 

THANKS FOR ALL THE SUPPORT!

story:
Hello! My name is Alexander. My partner in the creation of games and video presentations is Anton. I have over 14 years’ experience in the creation of Tabletop games (my first game was created 15 years ago).

The tabletop game Eraser combines both strategy and tactics, and the factor of good luck and fortune. Colorful game cards and game "money", as well as card-battle, attracted the attention of players from all over the world.

... You will be razed to the ground ...  © Eraser

- Unlike many wargames, the playing field is not divided into hexagons.

The movement is carried out on it with a triangle ruler, because this creates a more realistic model of movement on the map.

- Elements of tactics and movement on the map: the power of an attack on the enemy troops depends on the position of your troops in relation to the enemy.

1) Competition mode, "Eraser"

2) Competition mode, "Terminator"

3) Normal battle mode, "Eraser"

- The game can develop both on attack and defense.

- Reduction of stroke length when "wounded".

- Ability to play up to 4 players at once.

- Simple rules – just the pleasure of the game, not a waste of time to study the rules.

If the project is successfully funded, the game will be released on the US market with your help!

Manufacture of games ready for launch. We agreed with the printing press, now it’s your turn; it depends on you whether or not this project a success.




                                                     All rights reserved ©


                                                   Risks and challenges

For many years I have created games, so I know a lot of games.

Everything is ready for production.

We do not have sophisticated awards like as T-shirts and cups, which would prolong the production and delivery.

In our case, possible delays may be associated with shipping, customs.

                                                              Refunds 

Refunds may be given within 60 days of the campaign ending including fees. After this time refunds may be given minus the Indiegogo and payment processing fees due to us not being able to claim them back after 60 days.

If we have begun the packaging and shipment stages of the project (around 6-8 weeks before the actual shipping date) we are unable to refund at this stage.

Refunds within 60 days are reversed via Stripe to your credit/debit card. Refunds after 60 days of the campaign ending are processed via PayPal only.

                                                  Terms and Conditions 

If you do not confirm your shipping and pledge details within 10 weeks of our notification via email to confirm it will be treated as abandoned. We will however look at each case sympathetically and try our best to satisfy each customer.

By pledging on this Indiegogo you agree that our responsibility to you is for shipping your order as entered into the pledge management system. You are responsible for import or other duties that may be payable to relevant tax authorities. You also accept that you are fully liable for incorrect shipping details and will risk your pledge being unable to be delivered or lost in transit.

If you do not accept the proposed terms please do not pledge on this Indiegogo.


Thank you in advance for your help,  

Sincerely, Alexander.

Alexander. My partner in the creation of games and video presentations is Anton.
I have over 14 years’ experience in the creation of Tabletop games (my first
game was created 15 years ago).
The tabletop game Eraser
combines both strategy and tactics, and the factor of good luck and fortune.
Colorful game cards and game "money", as well as card-battle,
attracted the attention of players from all over the world.
... You will be
razed to the ground ...  © Eraser- Unlike many
wargames, the playing field is not divided into hexagons. 
The movement is
carried out on it with a triangle ruler, because this creates a more realistic
model of movement on the map.
- Elements of
tactics and movement on the map: the power of an attack on the enemy troops depends on the
position of your troops in relation to the enemy.1) Competition mode,
"Eraser"
2) Competition mode,
"Terminator"
3) Normal battle
mode, "Eraser"
- The game can
develop both on attack and defense.
- Reduction of
stroke length when "wounded".
- Ability to play
up to 4 players at once.
- Simple rules – just
the pleasure of the game, not a waste of time to study the rules.
If the project is
successfully funded, the game will be released on the US market with your help!
Manufacture of
games ready for launch. We agreed with the printing press, now it’s your turn; it
depends on you whether or not this project a success.

story:
EDGE (Entertainment Destination Gaming Emulator) Retro Video Game Console

 

Imagine having a video game console capable of emulating games for video game consoles that are obsolete now but we enjoyed playing them in the past. EDGE is a retro gaming console that brings you back to a world where recharging health is a cheat code, you can have as many guns as you want, & achievements aren’t just some numbers on a screen EDGE is the device designed to make retro gaming accessible to everyone.

There's something about a big HD TV and digital surround sound that fills up a living room. Shooters, platformers, sports games, arcade classics, and experimental indie games just feel bigger on a TV screen. It's how most of us grew up gaming. 

 

EDGE video game emulator console is an exhaustive collection of video games from across platforms and generations, including various home consoles, handsets, and arcade devices. Enlisted classics include Super Mario, Pro Evolution Soccer series, Need for Speed series, Street Fighter, Final Fantasy series. All 10,000+ enlisted games are perfectly supported.

What can I play?

EDGE will ship with thousands of nostalgic retro games that are playable out of the box. Our Plug’n Play installer gives you the choice to download, configure and install additional emulators from public sources and repositories. This allows you to play thousands of additional ROM’s that can be easily installed onto the system by using a Micro SD card or a USB Hard Disk Drive. The following 16 gaming systems are supported:

  • Arcade Machines (Capcom1/Capcom2/Capcom3, Final Burn Alpha, International Games System, and Neo Geo)

  • Classics PC Engine

  • Dreamcast

  • Famicom

  • Super Famicom

  • Game Boy Advance

  • Game Boy Color

  • Multiple Arcade Machine Emulator

  • Multiple Arcade Machine Emulator Plus

  • Mega Drive

  • Neo Geo Pocket

  • Nintendo 64

  • Nintendo DS

  • PlayStation

  • PlayStation Portable

  • WonderSwan Color

A timeline of video game console releases

Date Console
1985 Nintendo releases the Nintendo Entertainment System
1989 Nintendo releases the Game Boy
1989 Sega releases the Sega Genesis (Mega Drive)
1991 Nintendo releases the Super Nintendo Entertainment System
1995 Sony releases the PlayStation
1996 Nintendo releases the Nintendo 64
1998 Nintendo releases the Game Boy Color
1998 SNK releases the Neo Geo Pocket
1999 SNK releases the Neo Geo Pocket Color
1999 Sega releases the Dreamcast
2001 Nintendo releases the Game Boy Advance
2004 Nintendo releases the Nintendo DS
2005 Sony releases the PlayStation Portable (PSP)

 

 

Specifications

Android Lollipop OS (Operating System)
Quad-core RK3188 Cortex-A9, up to 1.6 GHz SBC Board

CPU (Central Processing Unit)

  

GPU (Graphics Processing Unit)

ROM (Read-Only Memory)

RAM (Random-Access Memory)

Micro SD

HDMI
Connectivity
  • Operating system Android Lollipop 5.1.1
  • Processor Rockchip® Quad-core Cortex-A9, up to 1.6GHz
  • GPU Rockchip® Quad-core Mali400 with up to 600MHz
  • 16 GB flash memory (internal storage)
  • Wi-Fi 802.11ac dual-band
  • Bluetooth
  • 3 USB-A 3.0
  • Gigabit ethernet
  • Micro-USB (OTG)
  • microSD card slot that supports up to 64 GB
  • HDMI output, up to 1080P via HDMI cable or wirelessly

 

Does EDGE only work with wired controllers?

EDGE is compatible with most Bluetooth gamepads, for example those used with the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.

 

And there is more:

By adding a wireless keyboard and mouse, your console becomes the perfect TV Box. Surf YouTube or watch your movies on your big screen while kicking back on your couch.

OTG Support

Kodi

 

Popcorn Time

 

 

Project Milestones

  • January & February 2017 - EDGE prototyping

  • March & April 2017 - Crowdfunding campaign

  • May 2017 - Purchase components

  • June 2017 - EDGE manufacturing

  • July 2017 - EDGE testing

  • August & September 2017 - Production and final assembly

  • October & November 2017 - Shipping and product delivery readiness date

 

Risks and challenges

Putting games on TV is in our blood. One thing we have learned along the way is that it is never simple. We think we've found a great route with EDGE and have been fortunate enough to be able to use a lot of the underlying technology we have already developed to help get this project off the ground.

We've worked with some great partners from leading chip manufacturers to R&D and hardware development houses in Asia to get to this point. We have faced some significant design challenges along the way, not least in terms of packing the technology within such a small form factor but also in terms overheating issues in earlier prototypes which we have now solved through our choice of processor.

There is always a chance of problems in the delivery chain causing delays. If essential components used in the project become unavailable, we might be forced to make changes to the planned product to facilitate suitable replacement components, causing delays. One of our suppliers could go out of business or be unable to scale production volume up quickly enough if demand exceeds our estimates. Customs procedures and certification requirements may change and cause delays. With all unfinished projects, there is always a chance of patent or other legal claims by 3rd parties that need to be addressed and may cause delays or project cancellation.

While these risks exist, we have put contingency plans in place where possible and we are confident we can deliver the project to spec and on time.

Legal Disclaimer: The designs and functionality shown are not necessarily final, they are used for illustrative purposes and may be subject to change. The SBC board used in the prototypes is subject to change depending on economies of scale. The system does not ship with software components or games we didn't either license, develop ourselves or use under a permissible Open Source license. Where we modify or build on Open Source software in order to enable the functionality of our system, we will release all source code once distribution of the final units commences, irrespectively of license type. 

ROM(**) usage: If you decide to install the additional Emulator Pack to enable the system to run game backups from older systems, the legality of using such ROMs depends on your countries laws and on additional circumstances such as for example your continued possession of the original copy of the game as well as the original hardware it ran on. The functionality is meant to allow you access to your old gaming favorites, in cases where e.g. technical reasons prevent you from continued use of those - always subject to the laws of your country. We do not condone software piracy.

* An Emulator is a program that tells a computer how to behave like the console or arcade machine did, so that it knows how to interpret the ROMs.

** A ROM is a digital copy of an individual game program that was originally running on Arcade machines, consoles or older home-computers. A ROM can normally only be run on the system it was originally designed for.

story:
Monique Needs Your Help

 

My name is Dusan Palka and Monique Dream is the game I work on.

I like playing games and I also believe that working on the game is a kind of art. During my work on the first level I noticed that I love Monique and I want to prepare for her more and more adventures in the next levels. That's nice but...

I realised that without your help I can hardly finish her dream in good time and fully devout to her.

With your help and support, Monique can continue to fight for her life, solve all the puzzles on her journey and one day wake up from her long dream.

"Torofly" - one of the enemies that Monique meets in her dream.

 

Making Monique

So far all the work is made just by me. I was focused on animations, on her ability to interact with the world in the game and with her enemies. Monique can live her dream and actually be alive.

Next levels design of the game will be more attractive about a game environment. Monique will live her adventures in the caves or solve puzzles in abandoned buildings and that's a lot of work with textures and modelling in 3d software. Monique needs the team. There are two talented friends of mine that will join me and will be the full-time staff so that we can work as a good small developing studio and make the interesting environment happen. Finishing Monique Dream will take time and we want to fully devout to her. It means to work 8 hours minimum daily or more...

I know that if we want Monique to live her stories, finish the game in good time and keep quality of her fantasy dream world...then we can't keep other job. We have to work hard...and give Monique all our working time.

"Monique" - in the special animation.

 

The Sound & Our Original Soundtrack

The sound is really important for us and we want the sound of Monique Dream Game to be excellent. I use a home recording software to make a working version of the sound and the voice of Monique for now. It's just a temporary solution.

Thanks to your contributions we will record all (voice of Monique, other sounds and our own music) in a professional recording studio.

"The music in the game - the parts of my own songs"

I've been playing the guitar for a long time - but there won't be only the guitar. In the part of our country called Bohemia and right in our town Straznice we have great musicians. They will join me on the CD of our music with their instruments. The CD will be full of nice songs - (not only parts specially adjusted for the game)

Music will be around 40 minutes long. See section "REWARDS".

"A peaceful Torofly"

Monique will use it for flying - you will drive it in the game. (It will come out as the update on our youtube channel) - MoniqueDreamGame             

 

When Will Be Our Game Finished ?

We don't want to disappoint you.

Monique Dream Game will be a big full game with nice animations, puzzles and monsters or other creatures.

For me it means that there will be a minimum of ten levels in the game. Also, the time of your playing will not be under 8 hours.

We are hardworking and able to finish Monique Dream Game probably earlier but we want to avoid any disappointment that we can make to you by promising.

I feel we need one year and four months to be ready and bring an interesting game from us to the world of the games and to you.

"Walking Fridge"

 

The Funds From You

The funds from you will be used wisely and just for the purpose of making and finishing Monique Dream Game.

We have set our fundraising goal we need to reach and the time for completing the game. You may feel that it is a large sum we’re requesting to finish our game but this is actually the minimum for the full-time staff of 3 people and the game like Monique Dream.

This is a fixed funding campaign. If we don’t meet our fundraising goal, all contributions will be refunded. We can’t finish Monique Dream Game without the full amount and there’s no point in keeping the money if we don't reach it.

With your kind help we will finish the game and thanks to you we start to work as a small good studio that will be developing interesting games in the future as well.

 

If We Are Funded

If this our campaign on Indiegogo has a fundraising success...

We are hardworking and we will finish the game in time. If there is any problem about the date of finishing we will do everything to sort it out during month or so.

We want to release the PC version of Monique Dream Game on Steam.

I know that our game will be full of interesting animations, puzzles and enemies and the story of Monique during our work and updates in levels will get the right final look. 

 

Digital OST Download

You can listen to our music in the game but it can be limited by the length of the animations or situations.

This digital copy of the soundtrack will be the music exclusively made for the friends of Monique. Can be said that it will be a standalone music and will be available only for you. (specially made for people who helped us)

 

"The Story Behind Monique Dream Game"

One would say it is just PDF but... We will take our time for this.

We will write down funny situations during the time when we actually make the game. We would like to tell you about our obstacles or happiness, together with nice pictures from the game or us. We want this PDF to be a fun for us and for you. (specially made for people who helped us)

 

Digital Video "Best Animations" Download

A limited edition - digital copy of our best animations made for you as the movie with Monique telling her story and experiences together with our music.

Voice of Monique - Our lovely friend and artist Kristina Burilova.

(specially made for people who helped us)

 

CD - Soundtrack & DVD - Best Animations

A limited edition of a nice - looking covered CD of our music and DVD - Best animations (with your name and our "Thank you" on the cover)

(specially made for people who helped us)

 

Free Key For The Steam PC Release

                                        

 

Funny Sentence

You are in the game so help Monique to say something !

Now you can think up a funny sentence and Monique will say it in the game. We want to give you this unique opportunity but we wouldn't be able to do that for so many. We have to limit this reward for the first 25 claiming and for the next claiming we will offer some interesting rewards during our work on the game.

Rules for the sentence:

  •   it should be a fun: (a short joke about en enemy or the weather etc.)
  •   you can use only first name of someone: (Peter asked me for a date...)
  •   no advertising
  •   don't use vulgar or abusive words

We will stay in touch by email and keep you updated about situations in the game where we need your sentence or you can try to think up anything and we will discuss this with you.

 

Object In The Game

Give us your idea of the object or something you would like to see in the game.

Make your ideas achievable for us. (small favorite objects, the toy or...it's up to you)

We will stay in touch by email and discuss this with you.

Limited for the first 25 claiming and for the next claiming we will offer some interesting rewards during our work on the game.

 

Create An Enemy

You say and we will create an enemy!

We will do this for you and we can't wait to hear your ideas. In Monique dream is anything possible. The enemy can have any form you can imagine - it's up to you. Monique Dream Game can also be a bit of the horror game. Write down several ideas you like and we will make one happen.

We will stay in touch by email and discuss this with you.

 

Part Of The Team

We will actively talk to you about next levels.

You will have the access to our non - interactive videos which will be regularly made only for you and you will be able to influence the game with your own ideas as the part of our team.

Although we have our vision..., there will be the place in the game where your decision will be applied. You are the part of the team now.

We will stay in touch with you by email and will keep you updated about all the work on Monique Dream Game.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help us by spreading the word out about Monique Dream Game.

You can use the Indiegogo share tools. Tell your friends about Monique.

Join our mailing list to receive Monique Dream Game News & Events

You can follow us on Twitter 

Become friend on Facebook

Our Website

Our YouTube channel

A limited edition of a nice - looking covered CD of our music and DVD - Best animations (with your name and our "Thank you" on the cover)
(specially made for people who helped us)
 
Free Key For The Steam PC Release
                                         
 
Funny Sentence
You are in the game so help Monique to say something !
Now you can think up a funny sentence and Monique will say it in the game. We want to give you this unique opportunity but we wouldn't be able to do that for so many. We have to limit this reward for the first 25 claiming and for the next claiming we will offer some interesting rewards during our work on the game.
Rules for the sentence:

  it should be a fun: (a short joke about en enemy or the weather etc.)
  you can use only first name of someone: (Peter asked me for a date...)
  no advertising
  don't use vulgar or abusive words

We will stay in touch by email and keep you updated about situations in the game where we need your sentence or you can try to think up anything and we will discuss this with you.
 
Object In The Game
Give us your idea of the object or something you would like to see in the game.
Make your ideas achievable for us. (small favorite objects, the toy or...it's up to you)
We will stay in touch by email and discuss this with you.
Limited for the first 25 claiming and for the next claiming we will offer some interesting rewards during our work on the game.
 
Create An Enemy
You say and we will create an enemy!
We will do this for you and we can't wait to hear your ideas. In Monique dream is anything possible. The enemy can have any form you can imagine - it's up to you. Monique Dream Game can also be a bit of the horror game. Write down several ideas you like and we will make one happen.
We will stay in touch by email and discuss this with you.
 
Part Of The Team
We will actively talk to you about next levels.
You will have the access to our non - interactive videos which will be regularly made only for you and you will be able to influence the game with your own ideas as the part of our team.
Although we have our vision..., there will be the place in the game where your decision will be applied. You are the part of the team now.
We will stay in touch with you by email and will keep you updated about all the work on Monique Dream Game.

 

Other Ways You Can Help
You can also help us by spreading the word out about Monique Dream Game.
You can use the Indiegogo share tools. Tell your friends about Monique.

story:
3D Historical & RPG Game.

THORDERIA is a one-man strategy-intrigue-new world game. It offers to players an
extraordinary experience with the world atmosphere supported by cinematic realism,.
    You choose the limit of what can be done in Thorderia according to the fate you choose.
The infrastructure of the game will present you different surprises in each new path chosen

and you will be able to take on unexpected roles!

What distinguishes Thorderia from its counterparts? Realistic atmosphere and roles you can

take in unlimited universes and more!

This is not a dice game or a game of chance! It's not a trip back to the end of the road! Go
ahead and discover Thorderia! In Thorderia, the game starts with 3 different fates…

Choose Your Fate, Start Build Your Life!

    The general systematics of the Thorderia game is mainly based on living as an individual in
the medieval world. This world is similar to the world with the high realism created, almost
anything that can be done in the real world can be done without borders. It is the basic logic to
establish an order and not to pursue a continuous goal, and to continue on our own goal.

Just as life is the setbacks and games we encounter while we are making plans, life in
Thorderia works just like this. When we are farmers, our harvest can be looted, we may be
victims of intrigue in the palace, or we may suddenly lose our assets as a merchant. If it is the
single biggest difference, we choose the identity we were born in the beginning!
There is a huge empire to be discovered. Of course, this empire contains various mysteries
and intrigues like everything else. You will learn this as the game progresses. After joining
the game, you will choose your identity, and with the knowledge you acquire, you will gain

property, skills and power in your Thorderia life.

Realistic World

Game graphics are designed cinematically in Thorderia. A life in real
world and cinematic effects!
    Basically, an empire was founded on three related kingdoms and
related village concepts. Wide area, rich graphics and realistic visuals!
    We plan to add more configuration to the game during the game
development process.

Game Platform
   
It will be played on the Steam Platform and if we
reach our first goal, the game development will
be ready to be presented with an estimated 6-
month period.

  
Game Systematics

    The game is a single player game. It works as Third Person31/.5000
A farmer, trader, rebel, waitress etc. brought to life in Thorderia. You
can start as or by taking part in the palace. You can direct the future of
the kingdom with intrigues but in a completely 3D-movie scene. You
can do this overthroving the king from the throne or you can do it as
king’s vizier .

Character Classes and Skills

The Thorderia Empire consists of 3 Kingdoms.
These;
Balghard Kingdom
Zargoth Kingdom
Deroga Kingdom
   Depending on the preference made at the beginning of the game,
you can take part in the kingdoms itself, establish your life in the
profession you choose in the city or village.

To take some advantage you can make tactical moves for the
management, people or yourself and fold your excitement

What Can You Do in the Kingdom.
- Overthrow the king. (Find a way to go to the throne.)
- Kill the king and start a throne fight between the heir apparents and
take advantage of this situation to execute or kill the heir apparents.
- Start a civil war in the kingdom and create chaos
- Be the king's most loyal man. (Vizier or a noble Knight)

What Can You Do in the City.
- A worker or shopkeeper working in a weaving workshop
- Merchant
- Blacksmith
- Farmer
- Livestock Dealer
- Rebel
- Thief
- Gang leader
- Sanitarian
- Innkeeper or waitress
- Winery Employee
- Mercenary
- Librarian
- Pub Employee
- Marketing

The experiences you gained within the game to be played will allow
you to make various gains. The variety and richness of talents and
properties will make the game more fun.

Character
The game will be played with the Third Person camera angle. You
will be in the third dimension in the real world.

A Day in Thorderia

In Thorderia, the atmosphere will look like a cinematic realism while
living in it. You will observe the difference of building a world in the
atmosphere created by our team with high expertise realism. You will
experience the color it gets at the sunset and its refractions when it is
born on the world we set up.
Budget management

   If we manage to achieve our $ 50,000 Crowdfunding goal, all funds
collected will be used for the following goals in the game;
Completing 3 Kingdoms (Big Map)
Sound and Music Design
Animations
New Models
Demolition Effects
Hardware Needs
Fluid effects

If we receive a donation above our Crowd Funding Goal, we plan to
add:

More Land and Culture
Different Fates
And Brand New Ideas!
In short, we will use it to create richer content.
Special Character Customization

 

Development Updates

 

  We will inform you about the progress of development. We will
post innovations, videos and images regularly.

From Team

We are a small but hard-worker team and we recently started working
for our project. We believe in our project and we will continue to
work quickly once we have completed what we need to progress. Our
goal is to provide players with a world experience in realistic
cinematic scenes.

From Team Leader

Leader-CGI Artist / Director : Ufuk Pamuk

    Hello, I'm Ufuk Pamuk. I’m a CGI Artist. My field of expertise is
rendering , lighting, color grading and compositing and game
environment artist.
I have been personally and commercially working in this field for a
total of 13 years, with the preparation - 8 years development period.
You can review my works from the link below.

https://www.artstation.com/ufukpamuk
https://www.facebook.com/ufukpamuk.CGArt/
https://twitter.com/ufukpamuk2

Character Design / Animation / Coding : Hasan Koşmaca
Concept Art:Nazlı Dayar

Me and my team believe in our work. We are also passionate about
games, and we want to work out an extraordinary work in the world in
which we have designed the key points that already missing in similar
games.Your support will bring us to our dreams and players to the
doors of this extraordinary world.

    Of course, your support is very important for us financially, but
besides, your opinions about the game are very important for our
game. Please let us know your opinions and thoughts.

Note: If our campaign won't achieve its goal , we will reduce the map and scale , work on smaller area .(Maybe a smaller empire )And some features will be limited.But graphics quality stay same.

story:
First, what is Decentraland?

Simply put, it is the 'Second Life' of the blockchain. It is a massive open-world that you can explore in VR on your computer. You play a character and can walk around the world and enter shops, clubs, and businesses created and maintained by other players. The game itself is free to play, but you can make actual real-life money by creating your own virtual business within. For more info, check out this cool article.

..So? 

As many of you know, I have been dreaming of making a virtual experience/game for almost a decade, and with the technology behind Decentraland, it is easier and more accessible to me than ever before. I also think I have a kickass idea. ;)

Enter 'Era' -- a virtual night club within the Decentraland universe. Experience nostalgia like never before; walk through rooms representing decades of the 20th century.

In the Era night club, enjoy an immersive VR experience while traversing the history of music and design. Each room's environment encompasses a different theme:

1920's: The Speakeasy Room!

1930's: Vaudeville.

1950's: Diner.

1960’s: Drive-in Theater.

1970’s: Disco Club.

1990’s: Grunge Concert

Each room will include minor changes in aesthetic and background music every month, so you will always have a reason to come back and explore! Our music is in EDM-style with inspiration from each decade in every tune. Music provided by the very talented MELOMATIC!

How can you help?

In order to build this dream concept, I need to have land in Decentraland. My goal is to have at least 3 parcels. Once I reach 3, I can make my building a 2-story... and thus, 6 different 10m x 10m rooms. If I can get 4 parcels, I will be able to add a "modern" room and an "exclusive" room to the docket; this would complete my "dream square." :)

At this time, the folks behind Decentraland are auctioning off the remaining parcels of land. It is a Dutch auction that ends on Christmas -- that said, many educated speculators say that ALL of the remaining land will be bought when the price reaches $500/parcel.

I have been doing various odd jobs in exchange for cryptocurrency, in the hopes to be able to buy land before the auction ends. I have enough to buy one parcel. Would you be willing to help get me the rest of the way?

Helpful options

The auction will reach $500/parcel on Friday @ 12AM. (So Thursday night.) I don't have terribly much time to raise money, so I am hoping you will consider a few different options to help me. 

Donate

Goodness, bless you! For all donations $25 and above, you get lifetime free entry to the club you helped build!

Buy land next to mine

If you yourself are interested in Decentraland, consider buying your land next to mine, so that we can feed off each other's business -- and you can potentially sell your land to me down the road. :)

Share this Indie campaign with your friends

Facebook shares, por favor?

Stretch Goals

$1,000

Buys 3 parcels. Yay, 6 rooms!!

$1,500

Buys 4 parcels. Woah, 8 rooms!

$1,500+

Helps pay for 3D modeling, custom music, and additional land. woot woot!

In short...

Your contributions help me with finances down the road (through monetization of the game), help create a beautiful piece of this VR land, and ultimately help me to achieve my passion project. Thank you for your consideration, friends! I cannot emphasize to you enough how amazing this immersive experience is going to be, and I highly encourage you to come visit me there. :)

story:
Game’s Motto:

Do you have guts to overthrow the dictatorship?

 

President's Palace

 

What is the game about:

-It’s hard to win democratic elections, but it’s much harder to win rigged elections where everything is controlled by one group of people in power. When the people are oppressed and economy is controlled by few it’s up to you to change it.

-Maneuver between different political and economic beliefs to win people’s hearts. Develop friendships with influential individuals and governments that will show support to you in exchange for a little help from you, of course. But also remember about your team and close ones, do you trust them? Are they ready to execute your orders?

-How to revolt is up to you to decide. Peaceful protests or terror? Aim for international support or bribe and abduct objectionable persons? Democracy or another dictatorship? It’s your call.

-Most games are focusing on faceless management and people are just tools in your hands. But is it that easy to lead the people’s destinies? It takes enormous willpower to make the necessary decisions for the benefit of society instead of your profit. Is it possible to get out of the political game without betraying ideals? Or is freedom not so important after all…

 

Your Possible Team

 

Features:

Character Generation and Personalities – All characters are based on studies of personality psychology, especially on adaptation of “Big five personality traits”. Each character’s beliefs, skills and behavior patterns are generated by an algorithm that takes their childhood history, teen and elder years of life into account, adds some key life events that probably changed them, as they would any real person. You will get to know them better by talking, watching their activities and mission results. Mix people in groups for missions wisely, because it’s critical for success. You must know and treat your people well, they are not just tools.

 

Character Profile that reflects his individuality and views 

 

Base management and characters’ interactions – By gaining popularity in the city and country, you will get followers; some of which may even join your team. Choose wisely which group will gain your favor because they will join you and if you reject them what will others think? You may group people in cells with various degrees of independence. You choose what they must do and how many resources they will get to achieve the goal that you set. But they may disobey you, change the goal and gather resources by themselves. Therefore, you must combine people in cells wisely and choose those you trust to lead, those who have enough willpower and the necessary skills to do it.

 

Base Management Gameplay
 

Mission types and preparation – It’s not easy to organize a demonstration. You must have enough supporters, enough money to feed everyone, influencers to entertain the mass but mostly the idea that will make everyone’s heart beat in unison. So, you must prepare. Get to know each corner of the country, gather compromising materials on enemies, make new contacts with people of the same beliefs, get international support and only then can you achieve something. Of course, no one said that terror is not a viable choice to get things done, just cover it with some propaganda. Not enough funds? Rob the bank or try to forge money. Is the Chief of police just on your tail? Kidnap his child and “make him an offer he can't refuse”. But of course, simple and short-sighted solutions like these mean consequences.

Planning Phase – in real life no one will listen to your orders without doubts in their minds. Are we trying to bring freedom to our country by listening to the orders of someone else? So, in the game we are trying to replicate “how the real team would execute operation”. You are choosing who to send on missions, which equipment they will get but most importantly how to execute the mission. Each mission has 3 phases (preparation-action-aftermath). We have a map of the building, the visibility of action points/scenarios on which depends on how well we conducted the preparatory work for the mission. For each key point on the map you choose who to send and what to do (of course you must check if their personalities and skills suit the job), decide what to do on each stage and send your team to make history. Don’t worry if they need to ask you how to proceed, they will do it or they will decide on their own, yet again choose people wisely.

 

Planning Board Gameplay
 

Story:

Setting - 15 years ago, the people raged a revolution for independence from the Shah, in which they won.  Democratic elections were held, then once more, but this time, democracy died. Because of certain decisions, the dictatorship of one family and the police regime was consolidated in the country. Not only has freedom abandoned the country, but your parents fell victim to that same revolution 15 years ago, when you were only 5 years old at the time. Since then, you are living with your uncle that also has a rich history of opposition activities. Yesterday you were expelled from university for excessive political activities and you decided that it’s time to change things.

 

International Affairs
 
 
Hijalla – It’s a middle eastern country, that has some oil, gas, little production and farms, but most importantly dictatorship and police that protect the oligarchs who exploit the corrupt system. Also beware of difficult relationships between neighbors and warring religious groups inside of the country.

Deasima – A big metropolis, with everything you want from the poor residential areas of workers to luxury restaurants with cocaine paths.

Nahzeir – A relatively poor region that feeds the whole country, as it is on the fertile soils of the river Firat.

El-Balehir – An ancient and rich region that historically plays an important role in the economy of the East.

 

Nahzeir, El-Balehir and Deasima cities respectively

 

People:

Badawi family (Nacer – President/Father/Older brother, Hafid – General/Younger Brother, Fathi – Air Chief Marshal/Older son, Hani – Minister of Economy/Younger son) the family of a dictator who seized all the major state structures who do not intent on giving power back to the people.

Abidin Family (Derzel – Father, Ibtissem - Daughter) close friends of the President, you can say that Abidins’ are the purse of the ruling regime. They’ve got their hands in every big and profitable business running in the country.

Elbaz family (Hakim – Supreme Judge/Father, Amira – Head of Huriya TV Network/Daughter) – Need to slander someone and throw them in jail? This is the right job for the Elbaz, the personal executioners and propagandists of the president.

Al-Hameini family (Mahmoud – father, Wassim - son) is a dynasty that controls the seaport of El-Balehir. You can imagine the power of controlling main transportation and the economical hub, everything that comes in and out of the country passes Al-Hameini hands.

 

Everyone in power is tied up 

 

Art:

We tried to achieve an art-style that transmits to the player the oppression and problems of the inhabitants of the country, but also conveys the hope and desire of change for the better.

Music:

Music is composed by ”Soundspring Studio”. You can hear it in all of our videos.

Why CrowdFund:

The game is in development for a year and a half. Currently, the game is 40% done. All of the game concepts and mechanics are finalised, the basic systems are coded and most of artwork is done. Till now, I was the only developer, but it’s time to expand the scale of production. However, this requires funding. We do not really want to turn to publishers because the game concerns sensitive topics and politics, so we need full creative freedom. If we don't get funded, the game will be released anyway but with less content.

Budget Overview:

RoadMap:

January 2017 – Development Started

September 2018 - Indiegogo Campaign

November 2018 – Pre-Alpha Demo

February 2019 – Alpha Demo

May 2019 – Start of Beta Testing

July 2019 – Polishing of the game

October 2019 – PC/Mac/Linux Release

February 2020 – Xbox Release

 

Free roads unlike our busy Roadmap

 

Post Scriptum:

We are very glad that you have read this far! If you support our project, then you will help us very much. However, if you are unsure or can not support us financially, then subscribe to game's blog or twitter. Thanks!

You will get to know them better by talking, watching their activities and mission results. Mix people in groups for missions wisely, because it’s critical for success. You must know and treat your people well, they are not just tools. Character Profile that reflects his individuality and views  Base management and characters’ interactions – By gaining popularity in the city and country, you will get followers; some of which may even join your team. Choose wisely which group will gain your favor because they will join you and if you reject them what will others think? You may group people in cells with various degrees of independence. You choose what they must do and how many resources they will get to achieve the goal that you set. But they may disobey you, change the goal and gather resources by themselves. Therefore, you must combine people in cells wisely and choose those you trust to lead, those who have enough willpower and the necessary skills to do it. Base Management Gameplay Mission types and preparation – It’s not easy to organize a demonstration. You must have enough supporters, enough money to feed everyone, influencers to entertain the mass but mostly the idea that will make everyone’s heart beat in unison. So, you must prepare. Get to know each corner of the country, gather compromising materials on enemies, make new contacts with people of the same beliefs, get international support and only then can you achieve something. Of course, no one said that terror is not a viable choice to get things done, just cover it with some propaganda. Not enough funds? Rob the bank or try to forge money. Is the Chief of police just on your tail? Kidnap his child and “make him an offer he can't refuse”. But of course, simple and short-sighted solutions like these mean consequences.Planning Phase – in real life no one will listen to your orders without doubts in their minds. Are we trying to bring freedom to our country by listening to the orders of someone else? So, in the game we are trying to replicate “how the real team would execute operation”. You are choosing who to send on missions, which equipment they will get but most importantly how to execute the mission. Each mission has 3 phases (preparation-action-aftermath). We have a map of the building, the visibility of action points/scenarios on which depends on how well we conducted the preparatory work for the mission. For each key point on the map you choose who to send and what to do (of course you must check if their personalities and skills suit the job), decide what to do on each stage and send your team to make history. Don’t worry if they need to ask you how to proceed, they will do it or they will decide on their own, yet again choose people wisely. Planning Board Gameplay Story:Setting - 15 years ago, the people raged a revolution for independence from the Shah, in which they won.  Democratic elections were held, then once more, but this time, democracy died. Because of certain decisions, the dictatorship of one family and the police regime was consolidated in the country. Not only has freedom abandoned the country, but your parents fell victim to that same revolution 15 years ago, when you were only 5 years old at the time. Since then, you are living with your uncle that also has a rich history of opposition activities. Yesterday you were expelled from university for excessive political activities and you decided that it’s time to change things. International Affairs  
Hijalla – It’s a middle eastern country, that has some oil, gas, little production and farms, but most importantly dictatorship and police that protect the oligarchs who exploit the corrupt system. Also beware of difficult relationships between neighbors and warring religious groups inside of the country.Deasima – A big metropolis, with everything you want from the poor residential areas of workers to luxury restaurants with cocaine paths.Nahzeir – A relatively poor region that feeds the whole country, as it is on the fertile soils of the river Firat.El-Balehir – An ancient and rich region that historically plays an important role in the economy of the East. Nahzeir, El-Balehir and Deasima cities respectively People:Badawi family (Nacer – President/Father/Older brother, Hafid – General/Younger Brother, Fathi – Air Chief Marshal/Older son, Hani – Minister of Economy/Younger son) the family of a dictator who seized all the major state structures who do not intent on giving power back to the people.Abidin Family (Derzel – Father, Ibtissem - Daughter) close friends of the President, you can say that Abidins’ are the purse of the ruling regime. They’ve got their hands in every big and profitable business running in the country.Elbaz family (Hakim – Supreme Judge/Father, Amira – Head of Huriya TV Network/Daughter) – Need to slander someone and throw them in jail? This is the right job for the Elbaz, the personal executioners and propagandists of the president.Al-Hameini family (Mahmoud – father, Wassim - son) is a dynasty that controls the seaport of El-Balehir. You can imagine the power of controlling main transportation and the economical hub, everything that comes in and out of the country passes Al-Hameini hands. Everyone in power is tied up  Art:We tried to achieve an art-style that transmits to the player the oppression and problems of the inhabitants of the country, but also conveys the hope and desire of change for the better.Music:Music is composed by ”Soundspring Studio”. You can hear it in all of our videos.Why CrowdFund:The game is in development for a year and a half. Currently, the game is 40% done. All of the game concepts and mechanics are finalised, the basic systems are coded and most of artwork is done. Till now, I was the only developer, but it’s time to expand the scale of production. However, this requires funding. We do not really want to turn to publishers because the game concerns sensitive topics and politics, so we need full creative freedom. If we don't get funded, the game will be released anyway but with less content.Budget Overview:RoadMap:January 2017 – Development StartedSeptember 2018 - Indiegogo CampaignNovember 2018 – Pre-Alpha DemoFebruary 2019 – Alpha DemoMay 2019 – Start of Beta TestingJuly 2019 – Polishing of the gameOctober 2019 – PC/Mac/Linux ReleaseFebruary 2020 – Xbox Release Free roads unlike our busy Roadmap Post Scriptum:We are very glad that you have read this far! If you support our project, then you will help us very much. However, if you are unsure or can not support us financially, then subscribe to game's blog or twitter. Thanks!

story:
HoldOn! is a mobile game with a positive message: save people! The idea of the game came from a recurrent dream - what if all the people close to you were barely hanging on to the edge of a cliff? Who would you save first?

I'm a graphic designer, illustrator, and comics artist. I also do stand-up comedy in Romania, but I've always loved programming even though I have no formal training - I taught myself. I've made a lot of games and programs over the years, but very few were actually published.

You can check out everything I do on my personal website: http://mache.ro

 

 

 

Remember that recurrent dream I mentioned earlier? Well, since I couldn't get rid of it, I decided to be proactive and make a game based on it.  I couldn't do it all by myself, so about 2 years ago I convinced a bunch of friends and family to help me bring it to life. They all loved the idea and gave their time and talents for free. 

Even though everyone had a full time paying job elsewhere and we only worked on the game in our spare time, the app we build up until now is way better than I imagined we could! 

However, it is far from a finished or final game. We're calling it a proof of concept as well as a proof of our ability to create a game and work together.

 

The game, in its short, demo-like form, is available for download right now for free on the Google Play Store and the App Store.

    

Keep in mind this short version is meant to showcase the game mechanics, the artwork, and music as well as get feedback from you. It's not by any means a complete game - that's why we're doing the crowdfunding!


In order to finish the game (in a reasonable timeframe), we need to be able to pay ourselves a salary. Most of the money we raise will go towards that, with a small percentage going to marketing the game prior to launch, developer fees & QA services.

Also, because we don't want to release half a game and call it done, we won't move forward with the project unless we meet our goal - we want to be able to put in 100% and create an awesome app you can enjoy for a long time.

Here's a quick breakdown of our costs over the next 12 months:

  • $9600 for a programmer to work on adding all the features, optimize the game and work on all the publishing aspects, as well as support post-launch
  • $8400 - animation: characters, powerups, and backgrounds
  • $9600 - artwork: backgrounds and UI
  • $6000 - music: all the sound FX and custom music in the game
  • $2400 - project management: we need someone to organize the project, deadlines and campaing updates
  • $1800 - accounting: we need to have some sort of legal form to work, and an accountant to take care of all our taxes and paperwork
  • $3000 - marketing: someone to take care of social media for a few months around the launch date as well as a budget for ads and promotional things
  • $11000 - production of all the different perks (books, hoodies, etc)

That comes out to ~€73,000. On top of that, we need to take into account the Indiegogo fees. If we manage to secure our funding, we'll be able to work full time for a whole year and launch an awesome game!

 

What if we go beyond our goal?

Well if we manage to secure at least $8000 over the goal, we will be able to afford renting a studio apartment so we could work together instead of each at our homes. This would definitely make things much easier and most likely shorten the delivery date!

 

 

We have a lot of features in mind for the final version of the game! See below for details.

Locations
We've brainstormed a lot on these - each one will be a chapter with 10 different levels. Chapter one from the current demo is "Mountains".

Powerups (or powerdowns..?)
These are just some of the powerups you'll find in the final version of the game:

 

Characters
We love our Selfie Girl, but she's just one of many characters to be designed and included in the game:

Our team is made up of these very talented people:

  • Razvan Dumitru - 3D artwork and concept art | https://www.artstation.com/razvandumitru
  • Ana Dobrescu - Animation and graphic design | https://anacatalina.myportfolio.com/projects
  • Paul Alexandru - Music and sound effects | https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZluACJA1qE2dX3C6Qc8srA/videos
  • Geo Doba - Project management
  • Toma Alexandru - Game design, creative direction and programming (for now) | http://mache.ro

 

The main challenge of the project is being able to finish all the assets (character design, animations, backgrounds and music). We really think a game is a work of art and should look and feel as good as possible.

So we will need to manage our time very well, which will be easy to do once the burden of other freelance work is lifted by being able to have a salary while working on Hold On.

 

If you've read so far, but haven't yet decided to join our campaign, you can also make a difference and help us just by spreading the word - share this with any of your friends who you think will enjoy our game - Indiegogo makes it very easy to do that!

Thank you!

story:
Mirror Link

 

 

Space Outlaw Alice is a 2D retro game inspired by the clasics of the NES/Famicom console and the mecha anime genre. It is a game that puts together distinct platformer and horizontal shoot'em up segments and is powered by pixel art, chiptune music and rule of cool.

The game is a junction of several sciece fiction and space opera elements in a simple but interesting storyline. It comes close to the hardware specifications of the NES, but adds modern features like diagonal scrolling, widescreen and fewer graphic and sound limitations.

The story follows the titular character as she gets targeted by the corrupt government of the Earth Union and is forced to deal with mysterious extra-dimensional monsters. The player will mainly experience a classic platform action, but each stage also contains segments where Alice will pilot Seraph, her giant robot, and the game will shift to a horizontal scroller shooter.

Space Outlaw Alice is scheduled for a Q4 2019 release.

 

 


Playing as Alice, action is in platformer format with (mostly) linear stages. Expect plenty of jumping, shooting, spikes, pits and explosions.

 


Alice will also battle using her giant robot Seraph. That's when the game shifts to a horizontal scroller shooter. More shooting, obstacles and tough bosses await!

 


All graphics inside the game are made with pixel art inspired by the NES color palette, which gave life to some quite charming sprites back in the day.

 

Speaking of charm, all tracks in the game are chiptunes inspired by the catchy music from the 8-bit classics.

 


The game will have 6 stages for you to advance through. Each has two parts, one on foot and the other piloting Seraph. You can also go back to already complete stages to look for items.

 


Alice can collect 5 extra weapons and some upgrades for health and ammo. Seraph also has collectable upgrades for its health and charged shot.

 


When things get really tough, you can expend your special attacks to cause extreme damage to regular enemies. They help against bosses too.

 


The storyline from Space Outlaw Alice is presented through pixel art cutscenes and dialogues. If those aren't your cup of tea, you can press start and skip them too!

 


Here is where things get real crazy. There are all kinds of enemies for you to face: soldiers, space outlaws, deadly robots and even monsters from another dimension!

 

 

Space Outlaw Alice is being developed with Clickteam Fusion and will be released for Windows PC. Release on other platforms will depend on technical and financial viability, a stretch goal being a possibility.

The game will be available on Steam Store when completed.

Minimum System Requirements

  • Windows XP or later
  • 1.8 GHz Processor
  • 512 MB RAM
  • 100 MB free hard disk space 
  • DirectX 9 compatible VGA

 

 

The year is 2378 A.D. Humanity is expanding into space, but its progress is being held back by the corrupt regulation of Earth Union. In addition to the inability to rely on its own government, both Earth and space are plagued by criminal activities and terrorist attacks. Alice, fearless outlaw and captain of the spaceship Valiant Gear, accepts a job to raid a military facility and gets caught up in a situation that will determine the fate of the world. Targeted by the Earth Union army and facing the coming of extra-dimensional creatures that threatens to exterminate all forms of life, she and her crew will need to make a decision. Run and mind their own business or join the battle and help everyone?

 

 

Space Outlaw Alice's funding is set to a flexible $6000 goal. This is the ideal ammount needed for Hissatsu Studios to work on the game and release it within a reasonable time frame. Reaching at least 50% of the goal can still make it happen, although delays are more likely to occur in this scenario. If the reached amount is lower than that and doesn't make the project viable, you'll get refunded.

This is the studio's first project. Its founder and currently sole member, Lucio de Godoy, can only work on his spare time. Although he is passionate in his vision, doing art, programming and game design at the same time is very time-consuming. Funding will help Hissatsu Studios, in order of priority:

  • Work full-time on the project and deliver it on an acceptable deadline;
  • Outsource materials that Lucio cannot produce, like music;
  • Pay for promotional and marketing materials;
  • Obtain hardware and software that will improve quality and speed of work.

Of course, we will also give you some cools perks. Go to the next section and follow the map.

 

 

 

  • $1 - Special Thanks
    A special thanks for supporting us. Your name will be immortalized in the credits of the game.
  • $3 - Wallpaper Set
    The previous perk + a pack of wallpapers for desktop and mobile with some cool promotional artwork.
  • $5 - Full Game (Early Bird) - 30 available
    All the previous perks + the full game in DRM-Free format or Steam key. You're ready to be a space outlaw!
  • $7 - Full Game
    All the previous perks + the full game in DRM-Free format or Steam key. You're ready to be a space outlaw!
  • $12 - Digital Soundtrack
    All the previous perks + original soundtrack in digital format. Enjoy some upbeat chiptune music!
  • $18 - Digital Artbook
    All the previous perks + artbook in PDF format full of cool artwork, concept art, pixel art and more.
  • $22 - Full Game for Two (Early Bird) - 30 available
    All the previous perks + an extra copy of the full game in DRM-Free format or Steam key. Give it to a friend and see who finishes the game first!
  • $24 - Full Game for Two
    All the previous perks + an extra copy of the full game in DRM-Free format or Steam key. Give it to a friend and see who finishes the game first!
  • $30 - Printable PDFs
    All the previous perks + a printable PDF set consisting of a Seraph papercraft model, a poster with promotional artwork and a custom Space Outlaw ID Card.
  • $40 - Beta Access
    All the previous perks + you receive access to beta versions of the game. Your feedback will be invaluable for us!
  • $60 - Become a NPC - 20 available
    All the previous perks + we will create a NPC based on you hidden in one of the stages. You can even become an achievement!
  • $99 - Create an Enemy - 10 available
    All the previous perks + you get to design a regular enemy for the game. It can be a soldier, a robot, a space pirate or even a monster. You choose!
  • $149 - Create a Sub-Boss - 6 available
    All the previous perks (except Create an Enemy) + you get to design a sub-boss that will appear in the middle of a stage, Make sure you create a cool formidable foe!
  • $199 - Create a Boss - 3 available
    All the previous perks (except Create an Enemy and Create a Sub-Boss) + you get to design a NES Hard hidden boss for the game.
  • $199 - Be a Boss - 3 available
    All the previous perks (except Create an Enemy, Create a Sub-Boss and Create a Boss) + we will turn you into a hidden boss for the game. It is your chance to be NES Hard!
  • $399 - 3D Model - 20 available
    All the previous perks (except Create an Enemy, Create a Sub-Boss, Create a Boss and Be a Boss) + a Space Outlaw Alice logo keychain and a limited 3D Printed 1/144 Seraph. I bet this one will make your room a lot cooler!

 

 

Hissatsu Studios is a indie game studio based in São Paulo, Brazil. It is dedicated, with a burning spirit, to forging great adventures through its games. Its main inspirations are the 8 bit and 16 bit era videogames, like the NES/Famicom.

Its founder and currently only member is Lucio de Godoy, a graphic designer that uses his spare time to work on Space Outlaw Alice, the studio's first commercial project. Lucio works on the art, game design and programming of the game.

For this project there is also the work of Rafael Giordanno, who composes the background music, and Glauco Silva, who made the cover artwork.

Hissatsu Studios believes that every game, however simple it may be, is a world in itself. Thus, its goal is to make games with fun and challeging gameplay aided by interesting storylines.

 

 

The greater obstacle Hissatsu Studios faces is the unability of working full time on the project, which is the main reason for this campaign to exist. When it reaches the goal, the studio will be able to work full time on the game and chances of launching will become 100%.

If the campaign doesn't make it to the goal, but reaches at least 50% of it, the project will still be launched, although delays will be more likely. In the event of the amount reached being lower than that and making the project inviable, your contribution will be refunded.

There are risks of minor delays, because producing art, programming and game designing are still time-consuming tasks for a person alone. However, the majority of the system is already programmed and most of the script is done, so when successfully funded the game will certainly be launched by 2020 at the most.

Hissatsu Studios' core value is hard work and it plans to reward you with the best game it can make.

 

You can support Space Outlaw Alice in many ways and it will be greatly appreciated.

Spread the word and make some noise about this game. Share this campaign in your social profiles and show it to your family, friends and anyone who likes retro platformer shooters (with monsters, robots and space pirates).

If there is someone that would like to write about us or stream a gameplay, let them know. Any exposure helps a lot!
