$199 - Be a Boss - 3 availableAll the previous perks (except Create an Enemy, Create a Sub-Boss and Create a Boss) + we will turn you into a hidden boss for the game. It is your chance to be NES Hard!

$399 - 3D Model - 20 availableAll the previous perks (except Create an Enemy, Create a Sub-Boss, Create a Boss and Be a Boss) + a Space Outlaw Alice logo keychain and a limited 3D Printed 1/144 Seraph. I bet this one will make your room a lot cooler!

 


 
Hissatsu Studios is a indie game studio based in São Paulo, Brazil. It is dedicated, with a burning spirit, to forging great adventures through its games. Its main inspirations are the 8 bit and 16 bit era videogames, like the NES/Famicom.
Its founder and currently only member is Lucio de Godoy, a graphic designer that uses his spare time to work on Space Outlaw Alice, the studio's first commercial project. Lucio works on the art, game design and programming of the game.
For this project there is also the work of Rafael Giordanno, who composes the background music, and Glauco Silva, who made the cover artwork.
Hissatsu Studios believes that every game, however simple it may be, is a world in itself. Thus, its goal is to make games with fun and challeging gameplay aided by interesting storylines.
 


 
The greater obstacle Hissatsu Studios faces is the unability of working full time on the project, which is the main reason for this campaign to exist. When it reaches the goal, the studio will be able to work full time on the game and chances of launching will become 100%.
If the campaign doesn't make it to the goal, but reaches at least 50% of it, the project will still be launched, although delays will be more likely. In the event of the amount reached being lower than that and making the project inviable, your contribution will be refunded.
There are risks of minor delays, because producing art, programming and game designing are still time-consuming tasks for a person alone. However, the majority of the system is already programmed and most of the script is done, so when successfully funded the game will certainly be launched by 2020 at the most.
Hissatsu Studios' core value is hard work and it plans to reward you with the best game it can make.


 
You can support Space Outlaw Alice in many ways and it will be greatly appreciated.
Spread the word and make some noise about this game. Share this campaign in your social profiles and show it to your family, friends and anyone who likes retro platformer shooters (with monsters, robots and space pirates).
If there is someone that would like to write about us or stream a gameplay, let them know. Any exposure helps a lot!

story:
deutsche Version

Summary  

This is your Life is a text-based life simulation game and a self-authoring interactive novel. Players follow the life of a human being from birth to death by influencing important life decisions at every stage of development, and can add their own experiences to the story.


Experiencing different Lives - Story Mode

The player has no direct control over his life choices, but he/she can communicate with and influence the “inner dialogue” that makes up their character's emerging personality, represented as different, autonomous cursors.

 When you discover the right approach in interacting with them, you can ask them to “step aside” and let YOU make the choice – exercising free will. If they don't trust you, they might choose something you think is not a good idea, resulting in tragic consequences.

The goal is to gradually raise the level of Consciousness points by developing a good relationship with your fractured sub-personalities, unlocking additional choices as well as Destiny points.

 

 

At the beginning of story mode you only have a very limited number of Destiny points, and you can spend them whenever you want to “force” your character's life into a direction YOU want, even if the character's caregivers or inner voices prefer something else.  

At the end of your life you will lose all your Consciousness points, but you will keep the Destiny points, starting again as a baby. In this way you can lift up the quality of life for every person you play, but you can also see the dark side of life, witnessing tragic choices and suffering resulting from a lack of consciousness.


Psychology Puzzles

The key game-mechanic in Story Mode are the conversations with your character's sub-personalities - making this game separate from all the other RPGs or life simulations. It resembles very closely how our brains actually work, trying to deal with trauma, adapting and creating an identity that fits into our social environment.
​If you want to learn more about the concept of sub-personalities, I recommend this video.
 

Exploring Consciousness - Free Will Mode

In this mode you have total control and consciousness over your all your life decisions independent from Destiny points, even as a small child. You can experiment with the freedom to see where life can go if it is all up to you for a change.

 

Writing your own Story - Self-Authoring Mode

This feature is a “level editor”, allowing players to create their own story or expand the existing one with unique choices and inner dialogue that reflects their own personality. You can choose backgrounds and music that matches the mood of every new stage of life.

 

You can create “mouse cursors” from 8 different archetypes that represent aspects of your character's personality - what they choose, what they would think and how they would respond in all the different moments of life that require a meaningful decision.

 

 

Creating a rich inner life offers a psychological puzzle for each moment, depending on nature and nurture, the developmental stage and the personality type - on YOU as the author. The challenge for players is to have empathy for each part and understanding for how it wants to help, even if what they suggest seems counterproductive.

 

 

The Meaning of Life - Project Philosophy

The term “self-authoring” (exploring your past, present and future in written form) has been popularized by the success of Dr. Jordan B. Peterson. He speaks to a growing audience of people that are looking for purpose and are motivated to “sort themselves out”. ​ 

Inspired by his work, I created this game in the hope that it addresses the longing for meaning and awareness, as well as the curiosity, that even very young children already have: trying to figure out what life is all about in pretend play, asking questions such as:

What is it like to grow up?
How can you be a “good” person?
What is it like to fall in love or have children?
What is a breakup or divorce and why is it happening?
What is addiction?
Why do some people commit suicide?
How does it feel like to be really old?
How does it feel to die?
What is it like to have a different skin color or grow up in the Middle East?
What is it like to be a gay teenager? 
Or to have cancer?
Or to be a millionaire?


The main story of the game will offer a taste of what is possible - with only a limited number of choices, of course. The strength of this concept is the invitation to players from various backgrounds to contribute their own experiences. 
The authoring mode is kept very simple and easy to use, and the text limitation of 280 characters per moment (twice the size of a tweet) prevents people from becoming overwhelmed when reading or writing. 

 

I want to offer a playful experience of self-knowledge – players are able to gain insight into their own and other people’s personalities and the inner dialogue that everybody has, but rarely ever shares - or is even aware of.  

You can have fun experimenting with the “wrong” choices to see how life can take a radical nose-dive or how addiction cycles can keep you stuck, and you are able to figure out in a playful way, how your mind works, and with compassion for your own sub-personalities and their sometimes tragic strategies, you can overcome even the worst situations.

When writing their own stories, players are encouraged to share their key life moments and the inner turmoil that they have been going through, promoting an anonymous creative outlet for experiences that are otherwise difficult to convey and getting acknowledgment and empathy over the in-game rating and commenting system.

Self-Authoring is scientifically proven to improve academic performance, and journaling is well known to be essential for personal growth. Creating this game is very meaningful to me, as I believe it can stimulate self-reflection, goal-setting and compassion by putting the players into the shoes of different human experiences. It may even facilitate self-healing by motivating authors to write about their inner struggle, and help them visualize positive and negative outcomes of their choices.
 

Wide Availability - Platforms
 

The game is made with Game Maker Studio 2. 
The initial prototype will be available for PC, but I can release versions for almost every platform out there:   

  • Desktop: Windows, Mac and Ubuntu  
  • Browser/HTML5
  • Mobile: Android, Amazon, Apple 
  • Consoles: Xbox, Switch, Playstation 4

 

The project - Planned features 

A story that is open to everyone  
The full version will enable players to add their story branches to the online branch, contributing to thousands of life moments and decisions of other people – to then be experienced in the online story mode, a constantly growing database of almost endless diversity and replayability.

 

Spontaneous Order
An easy rating system for each moment (or author) to keep the best content upfront and to help filter out trolling. 

Timeline Overview
A timeline overview at the end of each lifetime, to offer reflection, getting an impression of what you may have missed out on, or the chance to go back and make a different choice.

Image Editor
A background image editor that will let players create their own background images with just a few mouse clicks or swipes.

Music
An atmospheric, ambient soundtrack that will set the mood for how your life is going, or to provide inspiration and relaxation while authoring.

 

 

Playable Prototype

An early prototype of the game is available for Windows PC:

 

Please be aware that this version is an unfinished, untested product with only limited features. Nevertheless I hope you have fun trying it. If you have suggestions for improvement or bug reports, please contact me.
 

Gameplay Videos
 

 


 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help 

Please share this page and the project idea with friends, who might enjoy it! 
If you have gained some self-knowledge and a great life story to tell, please contact me for a personal conversation or join the forum! I always love to meet interesting people, and your story can inspire additional content for the game! 

 And that's all there is to it. Thank you for your time!

More information: https://ratakari.wixsite.com/selfauthoringgames

story:
Setup Simulator is a realistic upcomming simulation game where you are the creator. Build any setup in anyway you want, with endless possibilities . With endless possibilities and multiple ways to achieve the result you desire. Here money is not a problem. Play the sandbox mode with unlimited money and unrestricted placement, or play the campaign, where you earn your own money and continuously progress, to achieve your ultimate setup. If you want to take your computer knowledge and creativity to the test, a challangemode is also an option. All of this, is a part of setup simulator.

 

Since the game is still under development, we wouldn’t let your hunger torment you. So we made a free appetizer, allowing you to experience the concept in 2D, since there is no other substitute game out there. This is far from the real game and it doesn't have all the features as the real game, but it will give you an idea of what its like.

 

We know that there are many limitations when it comes to building a setup. That’s exactly why we created setup simulator. We want to give you the freedom to build setup you’ve ever thought about. Here money and physics restrictions is no problem. We try our best to replicate real life, This means you can move around in the room & see your setup evolving up close. Building the setup feels just like in real life, where you grab your item & place it anywhere in the room. You can also toggle free placement, which allows you to place anything anywhere. We allow you to build your ultimate setup, with real life brands.

Wires are the thing that many people often overlook, but we don’t. We implemented a simple system with 3 types of wires: USB, display port & power outlet.

 

That perfect setup also needs a classy computer. We’ve made it possible to build your computer from the bottom. Bring each part to the computer & start building. We don’t want people creative ideas to be restricted when they build their computer. It works like in real life. You can boot your computer without having having all case parts equiped. This also gives you more freedom to fit larger parts in smaller cases. Cable management plays a large role when it comes to the final touch of a pc. So we made it possible to have an influence on the cable management by choosing specific point where curtain wires should go. We hope to see some crazy builds from you guys!

 

It doesn’t stop here… We want you, the player to experience the computers performance, not only by vision, but also by hearing it. If you made a mistake you’ll quickly hear the computer struggling to complete task, but if you did well you can enjoy the silence of your sweet build. The sound of the computer depends on: airflow, fan quality and the parts in the computer.

 

To effectively simulate computers performance, we implemented boot time, which depends on the computers power. When you boot your computer, you will start with only an internet browser. With this browser you can do a lot of things:

 

  • Shop for items
  • Receive jobs & earn money
  • Download applications

 

We have 4 applications to choose download. A software that lets you control the light in your setup. An overclocking software that let’s you max out your computers performance(be careful, you don’t want to toast your computer). A benchmark application, that can take your computer to the test. Not only can you benchmark test your computer, but you can also play a minigame, containing insights on your computer performance like fps and so on…

 

Explore the 3 different gamemodes:

  • Sandbox - The gamemode with no restrictions or money limit
  • Campaign - Earn your way up to the top
  • Challenge - Compete in challenges

 

Aproximately 5 years ago, i bought sims 4. In there i would build the gaming rooms of my dreams. I got the idea of making a game about creating theese rooms, but that quickly fell apart, since the onlyu thing i could codeback then, was a small game on scratch. 3 Years later i was taking my coding very serously & 1 year later i started teaching programming.Back then I've had been working on multiple team projects & that've teatched me a lesson or two. So now i finally felt like i was ready. So i hit up a  guy i've been working on projects with before & told him about the idea. He loved it, so we immidietly planned out the game & in november of 2019, the development begun. It didn't take long before the core systems of the gamer was working.

Weeks of everyday programming passed by...

Then in may 2020, Jon told me he couldn't continue on the project. This was due to some personal resons. I was pretty upset, but i didn't want to stop the development of my dream game. So with all my savings i hired Leo as a permanent artist & the game quickly started looking much better. Then i hired a couple of different programmers to temporarely take over Jons role. Now the game started to look and work better than ever. Tho my savings where not big enough to continue for too long, especially because i quit my job for the project.

 

I'm paying for the entiere project out of my own pocket. But the salary for 1 permanant artist & 1-3 freelancers are not affordable on the long run, with this budget. This game requires a bigger budget to finsh. Without the help, we sadly can't afford to finish this game.

But we building up a community, a community we believe in and that also believs in us. If you want the game to become reality, we strongly urge you to help us & become a part of the community from the beginning of the devlopment. You are the creators of setup simulator.

 

 

We understand that this game is a huge project and we are still far from done. We also want the game to look good, but at the same time also be playble on low performance pc's.

This is not my first project, therefor i have a good feeling of what it will require & how we will work towards thew finished game. Unity is my sweet spot, i know it inside out. I even teach unity. This gives me a huge advantage in being quick and efficiant.

We've been working on the game for 10 months so far and that gives us a good perspective on what it will take to finish the entire picture. We've been working with many different influencers, so we have a good idea of which people we want, for when we complete the game. Last but not least, we've digged very far into what itr takes to make a good looking game which is still playable on low perfomance pc's. We stumped over the CTAA v2 antialiasing package, which makes the games light & reflections look much better, especially when rbg lighting is such big part of this game. This asset can be turned of in the settings, for people with less powerfull computers.  Another asset that playes a big role in this game is Amplify Impostors. This asset allows us to have more high quility objects in the game, without using too much of the gpu. But in generel we are doing all we can to uptimze the games perfomance, so that all thoose advanced objects can be rendered in realtime while playing.

But the bigfgest challange is to get the budget to pay the freelancers, so we can finish the game. Thats why we need you, to help us make this setup simulator a reality.

 

 

 

 

The backers edition of the 2D game, is kinda like a starter, taht you can enjoy while waiting for the main course(the real game). The 2D game is the concept game, but with much more features and many more items to build with. Learn More...

 

 

 

Thank you for viewing this our indiegogo campaign. We are very grateful for your interest and for taking the time to check us out!

For those of you who cant afford back the project, there is another solution. Sharing our project with friends and family and social network would truly mean the world to us. Thanks in advance!

story:
The Game Design Document (VERY IMPORTANT!)

 

Quantum Fall Game Design Document Quick Sheet 

 

Title: 

Quantum Fall 

Platform Releases: 

Oculus, HTC Vive, Valve VR, Xbox, PlayStation, PlayStation VR, Nintendo Switch, PC. 

Intro: 

A 50-year war has devastated Earth, during which a group of scientists has discovered quantum entanglement, allowing them to take the best humanity has to offer to a new world. A century has since passed on this new world, now called New Earth. The capital, New Phoenix, is home to the most technologically advanced systems humanity has ever created. The deeper understanding of Quantum Physics has allowed humanity to make great strides in clean energy, healthcare, and life. There is just one problem; a secret organization has brought it all crashing down with the destruction of the Quantum Core that powers the planet. This results in sending it into what is called a Quantum Fall, obliterating everything in existence and restoring Earth’s war torn timeline from 100 years ago. You are a temporal agent that was activated the moment the core breached. It is your job to piece together who was responsible and make a stop to it before it can happen again.

 

Character Bios (Subject to change and more additions): 

Agent X: The main hero of the game (the player). His job is to find and solve the clues as to what happened to trigger the Quantum Fall and who is responsible for the attack. He has a personal Quantum Entanglement Device implanted by a government organization for this purpose. It will allow him to travel the timeline associated with each clue he solves to piece together the real culprit of the attack and prevent it.

 

Cosmos (Ai): Cosmos is the Quantum AI created when the scientists first settled New Earth. She is tasked with controlling and managing all the systems of New Phoenix with very little human oversight. Cosmos has studied all of human history to assist her with anything humanity needed. However, is Cosmos truly all that she seems?

 

Rough Plot: 

The game opens with a quote from a great 21 century physicist on black background,

“It is often stated that of all the theories proposed in this century, the silliest is quantum theory. In fact, some say that the only thing that quantum theory has going for it is that it is unquestionably correct.”
― Michio Kaku, Hyperspace: A Scientific Odyssey Through Parallel Universes, Time Warps, and the Tenth Dimension


 

Fades in then pans across New Phoenix to a man looking out at the city from a window talking about the history of New Phoenix.

Agent X:

“New Phoenix the most technologically advanced city ever created. Powered by a Quantum Core that will never die providing clean energy for as long as it runs. A city of the future built from the ashes of Ear....”

Massive explosion and screen fades to bright white, then to Agent X waking up in a different place and time.

Game starts.

From the starting level, Agent X will need to solve puzzles and find clues to discover what has happened, all with the assistance of Cosmos, the Quantum AI that was created to help him.

Each level will consist of discovering a series of clues. These are presented in the form of exploring the different data terminals based on information gathered, data logs, and Quantum Trails left behind from the accident. These will present as puzzles and tasks to decipher the truth.

The end will present itself as an awakening moment when the last piece has been collected and all the information plays as flashback, revealing what happened and who was responsible for the destruction of the planet’s Quantum Core, at which point Agent X will have to solve the hardest puzzle of all.

 

Artistic Feel: 

Quantum Fall will have a heavy Sci-Fi influence, much like cities in Star Trek, Star Wars, Cloud Atlas, and Fifth Element. The mechanics will be very similar to the older games of Myst and Riven, but with the added AI element and modern mechanics.


 

  • Systematic Breakdown of Components:
  • Save/Load System
  • Collision System
  • AI
  • Particle systems
  • VFX
  • UI Systems
  • Player Abilities, Controls, Cameras, and other components
  • Puzzle Systems
  • State Machines
  • 3D Rendering
  • Compositing
  • Day/Night Cycles
  • Sound Effects. 

Please fell free to watch the video for more information.

 

 

 

About Me

My name is Colton Childrey. I am a passionate game developer in Los Angeles. I have over 8 years working on and in the game industry. I have taken on this new challenge of running my own studio working to bring games back to what they where; an emotional and engaging platform for storytelling. As a kid, I grew up playing games like Final Fantasy, Myst, and The Beast Within. These are games where players not only had an actual campaign to play, but also became emotionally involved with the characters, story, and worlds they were exploring. In today's games, it is all about the next battle royal or FPS. I say it is time to change that, but in VR, where players can have more of an immersive experience.  If you have read this far then GREAT, THANK YOU! As a contributor, you will help redefine VR games before they too get stuck in the FPS rut all other systems are in. Did I mention that you also get your name on the credits when it launches? Oh yes, it is just one of the many rewards you can receive for contributing to my campaign. Please look on for other rewards and perks.

What We Need & What You Get

Now for the nitty gritty of why we are here (Ughhh! Right?)

We are trying to raise $50,000 for the project.

How we intend to spend the income:

  1. $5,000 will be spent to pay off the rent for the year on the office to reduce overhead.
  2. $10,000 will go towards getting more computer and equipment for the other staff.(We are a small studio only 4 core developers.)
  3. $5,000 will go to buying the last of the remaining software licenses. (Maya and Substance not cheap anymore WOW!)
  4. $25,000 will go to paying the staff for expenses for the first year of the project. Staff do have sweat equity, so they are happy to work on their passion full time with little pay as we are all friends and coworkers trying to change reality.
  5. $5,000 will be set aside for emergency funds, such as broken GPU, CPU, or any other event. (We tend to set fire to our GPU, the poor thing.)

 

The Perks

There are a limited number of each perk. We make more available if we see higher demand. The perks will take 6-8 weeks for delivery depending on location. Here is a brief list of perks available to contributors:

  • Basic Gamer Jersey w/ Studio Logo and Supporter on Back
  • Premium Gamer Jersey w/ studio logo, supporter on back, and your personal twitch.tv stream name on right arm sleeve.
  • Name in game credits
  • Stickers
  • T-shirts
  • Pens

Hopefully you are still there, we are at the end, I promise.

Back Up Plan

If in the event we don't reach the full amount, we will spend it on staff and equipment and move from there. Please, the more the better! Let’s make something great together!

Risks & Challenges

With any development, there are always risks and setbacks.

We plan to always have at least 1 day a week to address any issues with equipment, hardware, software setbacks. We will be holding two meetings a week with the core team to share issues and concerns to address in the project. If in the event of some kind of disaster, we will also have a daily uploaded project file for remote access to prevent any interruption of the timeline for the project. All the core team will be well trained to take over another task in event of a staff emergency, death, or simply quitting. In addition, we will have emergency funds set aside for minor issues that will require just a little more cash to fix.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cant contribute, DON'T PANIC! You can always help by sharing this campaign on all social media platforms. We will give you a perk based on amount of shares and views your post are receiving, but only 1(one) perk will be given, so get those views on the post and re-shares. Once done, just email moreinfo@legiongamingstudios.com with an image of your post and how many views, shares, and re-shares or tweets it has.

story:
UPDATE[ www.xknoprovinggrounds.com

to learn more about the app please stay updated using our website above.]



08/21 US LAUNCH  $70,000 Goal. 

Once we hit this goal we will make another!~

Xkno Proving Grounds is a Platform For Rappers To Have Rap Battles And Make Connections.

Currently there is over 31+ Million Rappers who all share their posts and upload rap music they created themselves. But most of them can only be discovered through chance and luck. 

Or if they choose to, going to a Underground Battle Arena. Which brings the obstacles of "Travel, Violence, and Unknown Circumstances."

So we take away the need to Travel, and created somewhere, where all rappers can come together to grow as a community as each artist climbs the ranks. We allow each artist to be found individually through their talent and skill!

With us at XKNO Proving Grounds, the artists rap and share their talent, and we perform the rest!

With this system in play, we are Focused on finding the Best Free Style Rapper, as well as creating a platform where rappers can come network,  and grow.
 

CURRENTLY DEVELOPED FOR IOS ONCE WE REACH 70k GOAL WE WILL CREATE MORE GOALS BASED ON THE NEXT LEVELS OF FUNDING!
 

THE RAP GAME
 

Everyone talks about the Rap Game, We have seen shows, events, competitions. But we haven't seen where the Rap Game is holding records for this. People are aware of the Rap Game, but each have their own preference on what that is. Well, lets set the flag today, Here is the Real Rap Game. Where all records will be help, competitions will play out, and the best will come out ontop. 

Our Mission

Right now talent can be difficult to find. We are creating a platform where relationships and where you come from does not matter. We all start from the beginning and climb the ranks as we Rap in a safe environment and from the comfort of our homes. You are judged by your talent and your skill. If you continue to climb the ranks we have some surprises in store!

  • Creating a platform where talent is found and giving power back to the individual artist!
  • No need for travel and joining the "underground scenes" that can be dangerous!
  • Grow and build with a like minded community of hip hop enthusiasts

Are you ready to take on the challenge and go live against your peers and show the judges how talented you are?

LIVE RAP BATTLE FEED

In Xkno Proving Grounds we allow users to go head to head in a Rap Battle type format straight from your Phone! So that way, if you are at work all day, you can still catch a rap battle on your break, or even show your skills without leaving work! (REAL LIVE RAP BATTLES)



THE NEED FOR A PLATFORM

Before Xkno Proving Grounds, people didn't really have a platform to come and have  Rap Battles against people from the US from their home. They had to find and gather people to participate before it actually became an event. Here we have a place where everyone can come together and spit some bars.  Also, we are keeping score for you. 


 

Leaderboards

 

In Our App you can always be assured points are tallied by un Bias votes and systems. We don't favor anyone. We want to find the best, by having them all battle against each other. May the best Lyricist Be Victorious and Be The TRUE QUEEN/KING OF THE RAP GAME.



We Can See Who The Real Rap King/Queen

We always hear about who is the Rap Queen or King, and we can always agree, they are not the best rapper. Well in our platform we do not worry about who is more likable. Because they program does the work for us! No emotions involved. So all you get, is straight Technical facts created by the environment. Those facts will Reflect Who Is Truly The Best!

 

EVERYONE GETS A SHOT!

 

LEGENDS

In our App we even created an area specifically for the Famous Rappers of Today to take part. With our app we create opportunities to have a Rap Battle against your favorite rapper! Given you have the skills to do so. We have invited Multiple High Profiled Artist to our App. These High Profile Artist will be Determined by their Emblem, which will be Labeled as a Legend~!. So that way we can assure they stick out as they deserve too. Legends will not lose their spots as a Legend, but users can become a Legend amongst Legends within our App.  If you have a request for a specific artist to become a Legend let us know on our Facebook Page!


|
Click On Image!
 

 

Get to know us!

 

Lara LLC - Crunchbase Company Profile & Funding

We are LARA LLC

 

We Need Your Help!

As of the creation of this campaign we have successfully raised $30,000 from investors.  Our goal being $70,000 for initial launch in August, 2021. We hope to fundraise so we can focus more on delivering the very first best Rap Battle Platform. Every $10,000 goes to the next step and milestone. So every penny helps! Now if we raise more than our desired goal this will allow us to not only launch on iOS but the Android Play Store as well and we have much more planned for you!

Maybe you can not spare a few bucks. No worries! Feel free to share our page! Helping us advertise and build our brand will go further than you may think! 

Currently $30,000/$70,000 RAISED
$40,000 Goal To Finish App!
 

Matthew Lara comes from Los Angeles California.  Mathew has recently created a Gaming Stream and is now pending FB partnership after 2 years. He has created pathways to help others succeed while streaming and has also ran a campaign to sponsor DJ Mizter Bonezz with a brand new board from DJ Hercules.  Currently Matthew is Leading the process for the successful Launch of Xkno Proving Grounds and with creating a platform for all Rappers to come to have Rap Battles.

Matthew Believes 

"The Master Has Failed More Times Then The Apprentice Has Even Tried".

 

Damian Nicholson was born in San Antonio TX and was raised all over the world as a military child. Damian has had the opportunity to grow around many cultures including going to high school in Japan. After school Damian joined the Army as an Infantryman. He served for 6 years with 2 combat tours to Afghanistan. After his military career, Damian got into business and led a successful real estate career. He now owns his own team Blue Cord Homes and is now the CO-Founder for LARA LLC.



With Rap Battles Being A Stepping Stone

We at Lara LLC have way more in store for everyone! Our first product starts with something to fill the void for rappers and others who want to rap. We hear the cries of people who are constricted with time, and have skills beyond imagination. We hear you and we are here to help!

story:
WE'RE ON! (12.9.2015)

We are happy to announce that we are going forward with sponsors instead!
As if the Zombie Apocalypse could be stopped. We will be taking over Lasipalatsi (downtown Helsinki) to bring you a Zombie Run, an outdoors market, a media art exhibition and live Rock'n'Roll!

More info on our webpage: ZeroHour.fi

# THE ZOMBIE MANIFESTO #

Here are SIX reasons why Zombies are great:
  1. If you are ready for Zombies you are ready for everything.
  2. Zombies are simple and everybody knows what they are.
  3. Zombies make good photos and gather media attention.
  4. Zombies want you for your Brains not your looks!
  5. Zombies have no borders and are free from politics and nationalisms.
  6. Zombies are inclusive! They like everyone just the same, independent of Gender, Sexual Orientation, Age, Skin Colour, Religion, Cultural or Economical background.

We believe counter culture does not have a defined form, nor does it have defined borders. Instead, it has a series of gravitational centers and with Zero Hour we are aiming to connect and amplify as many of these centers as possible.

JOIN US!

  • Follow our Instagram and Twitter
  • Like our Facebook page and join the event
  • Spread the word: #ZombieRunHelsinki

story:
I'd like to make people aware that thanks to smartphones we can help and change the world for better. The idea for our game hit us in November last year. I've created a game that is supposed to inform how we can help people who desperatly need our support. Under the eyelids is a charity mobile game, in which the heroes are children. 

In this game the fate of heroes depends on us.  Throughout the work we’ve been inspired by the desire to help others. Poor children were what motivated us when we created  “Under the Eyelids” Every lvl tells another story, in every lvl we can help people who have different problems.  We want to make a mobile game that will allow to show problems from all over the world. Our motto here is: Each of us can help! 

 

Under the Eyelids will be game of physical skill in which the character is a young child. Climatic, black and white graphic, the best soundtrack and interesting stories, it is our highest priority.

Our target group is young people aged between 16 to 30. They mostly use phones for gaming.

It's very important that the game will have multi-stage levels.

Do you know what happens every day in the world? Let me explain it to you It's 21st century, we have telephones, electric cars, nuclear power, but every 5 seconds a child dies of starvation and lack of water. 

 
                                                        
 

The construction of one well in Africa costs $ 3,500, but every day in the world people buy 700 million bars of chocolate… On average a bar of chocolate costs $1, multiply it 700 million times. For that sum we can build 200 thousand wells, which are really needed there, or provide 12 months of education, medication and food for 2 million children. I would like to present this problem on the first level of the game.

When we created Under the Eyelids we felt that it is not enough for us. Not every person would like to have a mobile game, so we came up with an idea. We must make an official website Under the Eyelids where news, updates, upgrades will be published and this will be our way to help children all over the world. During this project we also wanted to find out what kids know about children in Africa.

                                                       
Together we painted pictures for children in Africa. This was a really great fun and it let us see our project through children’s eyes.
We are going to send our pictures for children in Africa.
www.undertheeyelids.pe.hu

 I have created all levels with children on my mind. I want to make a mobile game that will allow to show problems from all over the world. Our motto here is: 

The second level will be about children which live in war. Our mission is to collect money for them. I strongly believe that we can help, but it isn't easy to do. Armed conflict is a reality for millions of children. 

                                                      

Do you know that 50 million of them flee from worm! Under the Eyelids is committed to supporting these children. 

The same like in the first level (Africa-the lack of water) player after the game will have the option to donate money to a good cause.

 

 I`ve a lot of ideas for Under the Eyelids, but i need money for realizations of it. I`am going to spend money on :

  • high-performance game programmer
  • graphic desinger
  • marketing

The money raised through Indiegogo for Under the Eyelids will go towards making the game as best as it can be. Out of the initial goal, here's the percentage breakdown:

                                                    

 Paweł Uszacki  

Paweł started creating Under the Eyelids in December of 2016, but the first plans were born one years ago. Paweł always helps people who need his support. He decided that he has made a mobile game and showed that thanks to smartphones we can change the world for better. Since then he has been working all the time.  

Klaudia Tomkiel  

She joined this team early in this year. Klaudia leads all aspects of social media and marketing. She is looking for new voluntary organizations with which Under the Eyelids can interact and helps to manage the project.

 

Risks and challenges

For any rewards involving t-shirts and stickers, there are very few risks involved. We would like to try different kinds before we will start producing them. The Under the Eyelids shirts must be quality and comfort, It is our highest priority.

The biggest risk that we face is simply running out of money before completion of the game, so we are looking for the best and most beneficial solutions.

story:
---Help us bring EtherTCG to fruition---

Ether TCG is a strategy based, deck building, collectible card game that is extremely fun and easy to learn. Creatures are pitted against each other on the battlefield, attacks being powered up by the precious Energy Cards. Weapon cards boost stats and items can change the tide of the battle and add a layer of strategy that keeps your opponent on the edge of their seat the entire battle. The last Creature standing is declared the victor!  Whether you want to play in tournaments, play a quick and easy game with your friends or collect all of the cards, Ether TCG may just be what you're looking for! 

 

PROGRESS SO FAR

So far we have completed well over half of the art required for the cards (which is the most time consuming part) as well as extensive player testing over the last 8 or so months. This is the first set of cards that we will be creating. There's 100 different cards in total, 2 of which can only be obtained from the Two Player Starter Set, while all the others will be found in booster packs. And for those fans of bling decks, there will be foil versions of most of the cards in the set too!

During the Campaign we will make it our goal to keep in touch with the fans and backers by providing weekly updates each week. This will come via a Status update on our Facebook page and update here on our Indiegogo page. This is so you know exactly what we are doing and the progress on the product. We believe that communication is necessary for a modern business as when the customer is happy, we are happy! 


To learn more: explore the EtherTCG Website, Card Database or download the Rules 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



CARD BASICS

So you wanna know how to play the game huh? Well instead of clogging up this page with images you can view the rules in the Gallery on this page or follow this link to the EtherTCG site to view them step by step.

If you wanna buy booster packs and not the starter set, we have a printable version of the rules here so you don't miss out!

                                                                        

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------




All our products being produced are of the best quality and come in professionally designed custom packaging. Our trading cards are being printed on thick 300gsm stock, our boxes are sturdy and made to be reusable, with  plastic insert trays designed to hold your cards while you are not playing with them.
The campaign will be the only time that these cards will be available in 1st edition. In the future the more popular cards and cards that may need a buff/nerf (stuff happens!) as they were not working as originally intended, may get re-released and therefore not be 1st edition any more.


SHIPPING INFO (Important!)

Once the product is ready to ship we will send each one of you a paypal invoice with combined shipping cost,  This is so we can be fair to everyone by charging you the exact shipping  rate. This also means that if stretch goals get met, instead of getting charged twice for shipping you will just get charged the one price. 


PERKS


Booster Delight 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A must if you have friends!!  

PIRATES vs FEUDAL

PIRATES

Join the Swashbuckling crew of the most feared space pirates in the galaxy as they try to score the mother load of Energy, loot and lollipops from the King of the Northern Kingdom. It won’t be easy but they have firepower on their side! They kinda..... , don’t know what they’re doing but that won’t stop them!

FEUDAL

The Kingdom of the King rests upon Energy rich lands. War is constant. The Kingdom’s unbreachable gates are all that stand between the King’s enemies and his mass riches; an almost endless supply of Energy! Weapon development is slow but defence is in their favor. How much longer will the Gates hold?

View the deck lists here!

Includes 1 promo card with each purchase.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Collecting them all??

Includes 1 promo card with each purchase.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Quintessential Supporter

Sketch card will come protected in a Toploader.
Includes 1 promo card with each purchase.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You want what???

Foil card will come protected in a Toploader.
Includes 1 promo card with each purchase.

Indiegogo Promo Card        

                  

Each Booster Box, Starter Deck, Sketch Card and Personal Character Card you buy will come with a foil Indiegogo promo card exclusive to this campaign that is individually poly wrapped to keep it in pristine condition and will never be released again. Meaning, you buy two Booster boxes, you get two Promo cards. Simple huh!

Check out the card's effect here

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



          

          


If we reach the Next Expansion Card Set stretch goal, this won't be getting worked on until after base set has been completed and shipped out. 


These above are just some of the stretch goals we have in mind. We are currently in the process of finding out information on other products so we can add some more stretch goals, including but not limited too Custom Card Folders to store your collection!!


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Going forward our goal is to keep providing updates to Ether with new expansions released, on average, every six months. These expansions may be through other Indiegogo campaigns or pre-orders through our website.


WHERE IS MY MONEY GOING?

Your pledge dollars go directly into making the pledge rewards, and shipping them to you. We have invested in getting the project to this point where it's ready, your support ensures that we have the cash to pay our printers to make the games - the most costly part of game production.

- Creating the products

- Taxes for importing the products

- Pay for our websites hosting

- Hardware

- Promotion

- Commission Work

- Secure Storage of Product


RISKS AND CHALLENGES

All designs are still subject/likely to change. Images shown here are of the final art - however while it is not expected, changes may be made before final production both to the art work and game contents. Variations in the production process and monitor calibration may cause alternations from the screen images to what appears in physical form.

As we are relying on another company to create our product delays may occur. The estimated shipping time we  provided, is based on the estimated production times, plus some. It's our goal to get it out before the estimated dates!

Have an issue? Send us a message. Nothing would make us happier than having 100% of our supporters be 100% satisfied with their pledge rewards! You can contact us through indiegogo, our website or jump on over to our Facebook page, where you can discuss the game with other community members and us! 

View our website and browse our card database which is being updated throughout this campaign! www.ethertcg.com

story:
Welcome Adventurer!

Remote Knights Online is a faction based openworld Hack'n'Slay type of multiplayer game with survival and roleplaying elements.
You control your avatar from a freely adjustable 3rd person to 1st person perspective in a seamless handcrafted 3D world.
Main goal of the game is to survive and lead your faction to victory in a combination of PvE and PvP.
The world changes dynamically according to the behavior of the players and leaves a lot of room for creativity,
be it in singleplayer, multiplayer or in self-hosted mode with custom ruleset.

 


The survivors of the (great event) first settled on the coast of Vall Tir. After some time however,
there were power struggles in the leadership and a subsequent attempted coup that divided the knightly order into two fractions.
Which, despite the ensuing peace negotiations, turned into a violent war.

This is only a short summary, you can discover the full history in-game if you are interested. In the future we plan to bring more content based on the lore, new content should be chosen democratically by the community. Most wanted content has top priority for us.


Players can join one of these factions as a knight in order to gain dominion over Vall Tir in epic multiplayer/singleplayer battles.
Each fraction has its own history, culture and religion, which is reflected in the style of play, music and general ambience.
Play your way up in their ranks with friends or alone, unlock new skins, achievements, etc.(more on this in the future)
Every time you spawn, you play a new life, because by death you lose all items and the ingame level progression.
But if you manage to recover your treasure before an opponent has done it, you lose nothing.
General account level, unlocked content, achievements, etc. should be spared from death.

Graphic violence (18+):
The time in which the RKO plays is characterized by violence and the law of the strongest.
This is also reflected in the visual presentation.
Swords, for example, can cut plants, wood, fabric and even flesh and bones.

Example of our realtime slicing & destruction system.
The level of violence can be set in three stages:
(no gore, blood, full gore)

 


The combat system in 'Remote Knights Online' is designed to be fast, tactical, immersive and fun.
Hits are done by weapons collision, there is no target locking or aim assists, players have to decide and aim by themselfs.
There are five weapon styles, each with its strengths and weaknesses.
(Unarmed, One-handed, Two-handed, Polearm, and Bow)
Attacks can be charged in direction and force, which affects damage and range.
Evading and parrying have to be timed well.
To win against heavily armored opponents you should try to hit the least armored part of the body for maximum penetration or just destroy armor with heavy charged attacks if you have some space.
Rhythm and awareness can be decisive in most battle situations.

The Action system is structured as follows:

Attack action: ((left mouse button + Time) + input direction)
Defend action: (right mouse button + input direction)
Evade action: (left shift + input direction)

Actions share the same cooldown.
Making the right choice here is what makes the difference between life and death for your avatar.

Attack techniques in detail:

Basic melee attacks (fast but not suitable to penetrate heavy armor)

Charged melee attacks (heavy attacks with adjustable dash range but leaves you vulnerable while charging)

Melee Combos are charged attacks chained together (heavy and fast attack chain but leaves you vulnerable for flank's while active)

Defense in detail:

Parry is a reaction action which leaves your opponent vunerable for a short time window, when succesfull.
Weapons: (Unarmed,One-Hand,Two-Hand,Lance/Pole)
Block requires One-Hand and Shield. You move slowler but can hold the action until your endurance is used up.

Evade roles can be used to dogde attacks or simply to change position quickly.
 (but cost more stamina than parry/block and have a higher cooldown)



Explore 'Vall Tir' a seamless handcrafted atmospheric open world with changing weather and day and night cycle.
Thanks to our dynamic content system, the world is constantly changing. AI, items and entire scenarios change while playing.
So you never know what adventure awaits you.

 

 

 


The AI has a real life cycle and wants to fulfill needs like drinking, eating, resting and adventure. It can also use emotions to communicate with you and other AI's.
Which is not only amusing and atmospheric but also invites you to roleplaying. (even in this early version)
Apparently the best loot is to be found with dangerous bandits, waylayers, animals, undead and other creatures that roam the world.
For larger groups of higher level opponents, you better bring a few friends.
At night, most of the residents of Vall Tir retreat to their camps to rest, eat or just be in company. In addition,
it is said that in the absence of sunlight the undead crawl out of their graves, driven by the urge for fresh blood.


 


Items are an important part of RKO, your virtual life depends on them.
At the moment there are weapons, armor, consumables and tools.
Each type varies within quality levels, from common to very powerful and rare.
Searching for items is a great adventure in itself.
You never know if the next opponent might drop something epic and valuable.
Equipment can also break and wear out, so stocking up if possible can be useful.


Weapons:
Five types of weapons, each with its own strengths and weaknesses.
(Unarmed, One-Handed, Two-Handed, Pole, Bow)
Armor:
Each part of the body represents a hitbox which can be protected by an armor item.
Because direct hits with sharp swords, arrows and claws are very bad for your health,
you should try to get a full set of the highest possible quality.
Consumables:
Fresh drinks and good food are just as important to staying alive.
They are currently the only source to fill up missing hit points.
It is also possible to further process food in order to increase efficiency.


 


To support deep immersion, there is a social interaction system,
players can communicate quickly via a pie menu. Which also works with AI and can be quite amusing.
To recover from the strains of the fight, you will be able to make music together, dance and other fun stuff.
We have several other features like this in the making, more on that later.

 

Help us to fulfill the dream!


This campaign goal would enable us to work full-time on RKO for just under one year. Time we need to go towards Early Access phase on Steam(PC, Mac).
Anything beyond that will speed up the process and enable us to integrate additional features more quickly.  (stretch goals coming soon...)

Sharing this campaign on social networks is already a great help, please let everyone know!

Thank you so much!

 

DEVELOPMENT:


We are two brothers who have been working with passion on this project since 2015, initially half-time and later full-time.
Our motivation is to realize this game idea as well as possible and to build a great community around it.
The basic idea probably comes from childhood fantasies, when we played games like 'Barbarian on c64' or later
Severance: Blade of Darkness, Gothic etc. Titles that motivate us to take this kind of gameplay to the next level.
For further development we have many cool new ideas that we would love to share with you guys.
If you like Remote Knights Online and want to stay up to date, we would be happy if you follow us on social media's. You can make a huge contribution just by sharing the campaign, if you can't invest right now.

'This game means the world to us, we put everything into it 

and can't wait to play it with you guys!

Thank you so much!


(The Schmidt Brothers)

AI, items and entire scenarios change while playing.So you never know what adventure awaits you.   
The AI has a real life cycle and wants to fulfill needs like drinking, eating, resting and adventure. It can also use emotions to communicate with you and other AI's.Which is not only amusing and atmospheric but also invites you to roleplaying. (even in this early version)Apparently the best loot is to be found with dangerous bandits, waylayers, animals, undead and other creatures that roam the world.For larger groups of higher level opponents, you better bring a few friends.At night, most of the residents of Vall Tir retreat to their camps to rest, eat or just be in company. In addition,it is said that in the absence of sunlight the undead crawl out of their graves, driven by the urge for fresh blood.

 
Items are an important part of RKO, your virtual life depends on them.At the moment there are weapons, armor, consumables and tools.Each type varies within quality levels, from common to very powerful and rare.Searching for items is a great adventure in itself.You never know if the next opponent might drop something epic and valuable.Equipment can also break and wear out, so stocking up if possible can be useful.Weapons:Five types of weapons, each with its own strengths and weaknesses.(Unarmed, One-Handed, Two-Handed, Pole, Bow)Armor:Each part of the body represents a hitbox which can be protected by an armor item.Because direct hits with sharp swords, arrows and claws are very bad for your health,you should try to get a full set of the highest possible quality.Consumables:Fresh drinks and good food are just as important to staying alive.They are currently the only source to fill up missing hit points.It is also possible to further process food in order to increase efficiency. To support deep immersion, there is a social interaction system,players can communicate quickly via a pie menu. Which also works with AI and can be quite amusing.To recover from the strains of the fight, you will be able to make music together, dance and other fun stuff.We have several other features like this in the making, more on that later. Help us to fulfill the dream!This campaign goal would enable us to work full-time on RKO for just under one year. Time we need to go towards Early Access phase on Steam(PC, Mac).Anything beyond that will speed up the process and enable us to integrate additional features more quickly.  (stretch goals coming soon...)Sharing this campaign on social networks is already a great help, please let everyone know!Thank you so much! DEVELOPMENT:We are two brothers who have been working with passion on this project since 2015, initially half-time and later full-time.Our motivation is to realize this game idea as well as possible and to build a great community around it.The basic idea probably comes from childhood fantasies, when we played games like 'Barbarian on c64' or laterSeverance: Blade of Darkness, Gothic etc. Titles that motivate us to take this kind of gameplay to the next level.For further development we have many cool new ideas that we would love to share with you guys.If you like Remote Knights Online and want to stay up to date, we would be happy if you follow us on social media's. You can make a huge contribution just by sharing the campaign, if you can't invest right now.'This game means the world to us, we put everything into it and can't wait to play it with you guys!Thank you so much!
(The Schmidt Brothers)

story:
Arzu Venture is a 2D kemono platform game being developed by Orion's Reverie for PC with future plans for console and mac.
 
 
Founded in 2016 in Doha, Qatar. Orion’s Reverie is an international studio of directors, designers, artists, animators, writers, and producers that creates video games, animations, and commercials. As a creative team we go out of our way to get under the skin of every project. We are passionate about our craft, and we challenge ourselves to leave a lasting impression with every piece of work. Arzu Venture is one of ourcurrent projects.
 

Arzu Venture's English trailer

 

 

Arzu Venture's Japanese trailer

 

 
 
 
A 2D kemono platform game with a story that combines fantasy and science fiction. The game is set in the fictional world of Celestia, a world being maintained by twelve Stellar Guardians who are currently in deep slumber. Albeit asleep, their powers remain active in their respective shrines, making it possible for them to maintain the stability of their world. One day, the Elder of Sidus Village felt a great disturbance in the twelve Stellar Shrines, which he thought was a sign of a grave danger befalling Celestia.
 
 
You play as Osku and Razi, two childhood rivals tasked to investigate what’s causing the disturbance in the twelve shrines. They set out an adventure of rivalry, not knowing that they were about to face a force that they cannot defeat alone.
 
 

The Protagonists:

Osku is the village Elder’s hot-headed grandson. Having the blood of a magus family, he also has great potential as a magus. However, in a young age, he became interested in weapons and followed the path of modern weaponry instead. Thankfully, his parents and the Elder respected his preferences and decision to master a different field. The Elder has not given up on Osku studying magic though, always asking Osku if he’s thinking of starting the life of a magus.

Osku has grown to be very proficient in using and even modifying various weapons to suit his fighting style. He boasts that weapons wouldn’t require chanting long spells to deal great damage to an opponent. For example, firing a strong fireball from a gun would only need 2 seconds of charging while it may take 10 – 20 seconds of chanting for traditional magic and the chanting speed would still depend on the caster’s magical ability. He can be usually seen fighting with Razi but he actually cares about him a lot as a friend.

Razi is the village Elder’s best student in traditional magic. He’s always praised as a genius despite not belonging in a magus family. Razi lost his parents when he was young and he was adopted by the Elder when he was spotted boiling a small forest pond by only staring at it, showing great potential as a magus. He can be usually seen fighting with Osku but he actually cares about him a lot as a friend as well.

Razi, despite being conceited, has great respect towards the Elder who raised him and taught him how to be a skilled magus. He also sees the Elder as his own grandfather.

 

The world

 

 
Celestia is the fictional world in Arzu Venture. The locations are all very unique with a combination of fantasy and sci-fi elements. We make sure that every scenery is memorable and breathtaking. There will be forests, ruins, dungeons, and other locations that have different climates. Towns are also different from each other as some people prefer the traditional ways of living (e.g. using magic for everyday tasks) while some prefer advanced technology which is evident with each town's design.
 
 
Arzu Venture's enemy monsters were carefully designed to fit the dreamlike world of Celestia. The normal enemy monsters were intentionally designed to be simple and cute with vibrant color schemes while the boss monsters were given more details and were made to be bigger to give off a feeling of intimidation and to separate them from the normal monsters.
 
 
 
 
Like with most platform games, Arzu Venture involves guiding a player character to jump between suspended platforms and/or over obstacles to navigate the environment. The player controls the jumps to avoid letting the player character fall to their death or miss necessary jumps.
 
 
Before starting, the player can choose to play as Osku or Razi. The two characters have different play styles - Osku is a weapon user while Razi mainly uses magic. Each stage will have a boss battle that the player will have to defeat to make progress in the story. 2-player mode will also be available. Each stage will have side quests and locations that will only be accessible if two players cooperate and help each other as Osku and Razi. 
 
 

There's an existing demo stage and a game play video of it. It currently has the basic functions like walk, run, jump, and attack.

More functions will be added in the final game. Two or more attack methods for both characters, and a 2-player system. 

The first attack is what we call the “catch and throw” function. That function involves: Catching a monster, than the player can throw out the caught monster to inflict damage to other monsters. The player can also jump on the caught monster mid-air to reach high platforms. 

The second attack function that we want to add is the “special attack”. There are a lot of items the players can collect throughout the game. One type of item enables the use of powerful special attacks.

The game can be beaten in single player, but we also want to add a 2-player system. 2 players can work together to suppress the enemies and reach optional areas that can only be accessed with 2 players cooperating. If we gather enough funds to hire one more server programmer, we can include online functionalities in the 2-player mode.

What makes Arzu Venture special?

 - Arzu's fantasy-inspired art style is hand painted. We aim to make the players will feel like they are reading picture books while playing the game.

 - An engaging story about friendship, rivalry, and heroism centered in the fictional world of Celestia where advanced technology and traditional magic co-exist. In the story, players can collect story-related items in checkpoints to unlock a series of paintings as rewards. This way, players can enjoy the deepest parts of the story, which is rarely provided in action games nowadays.

- The two playable characters have very distinct play styles that are both needed for 2-player mode which will really give the players a real sense of cooperation. 

- Animated cut scenes.

- An interactive platformer gameplay that would also require puzzle-solving skills.

- Cute and likable kemono characters designed by well-known artists in the internet. And that includes that monsters!

 

 

We are a team of experienced professionals. Our lead management members have more than 10 years of professional experience in the game industry, with proven experience in the best game development companies. Our programmers have stellar programming experience in large gaming companies in Canada and the U.S. Our artists are globally recognized because of their extraordinary skills and our animators have solid experience as well, equipped with the best qualifications. With this team, we are confident that we can bring out the best in this beautiful game.

 

 

Creating videogames cost a lot. We are in need of your financial support in order to catalyze Arzu Venture’s development. In addition, it would allow Orion’s Reverie to focus on the core values of this game’s development: Interactivity and fun. Without you, we cannot expand the world of Arzu Venture. 

With more funding, we can open possibilities to a longer story with more character development, a bigger world and overall lore, better graphics, more game mechanics, and a larger selection of soundtracks.

 

Goals

 

 

If we reach 152K USD we'll be able to complete the game!

 

 

 If we reack 166K USD, we'll add an online mode!

 

 

If we reach 180K, we'll add an additional non-canon playable character with a new play style!

 

 If we reach 367K, we'll add more story and animated cutscenes!

 

 

Budget plan

 

We will need 1.2 years to develop Arzu Venture. After a half year, we can provide a demo. Then in the last few months of development, we will have 1 - 2 months of beta testing debugging before finalizing the game.

 

 

And as our way to thank you for your very valuable support, we offer tremendous rewards that you will surely enjoy like a copy of the game, its soundtrack, art book, beta tests, and etc. 

Your support, no matter the amount, is a very huge help in fully grasping our vision for Arzu Venture.

Physical rewards will be sent around October- December 2018 except for the physical game and soundtrack, which will be sent out after the game's official release. 

  • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/search/top/?q=orion%27... 
  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/ArzuVenture
  • DeviantArt: https://orions-reverie.deviantart.com/ 
  • Instagram: @orionsreverie.qa

 

Risks and challenges

 

Developing a game costs a LARGE amount of funding, and that's the toughest part. Marketing also comes in the scene, but that can also be solved with enough funding. We are now preparing early social media advertisement to help with the marketing plan and get more exposure. We believe that a good game by itself can shine.

Delays may also be a problem, because there will always be unexpected bugs. However, we have a good game designer who can take control of it with no problems. Our developers are very experienced with such issues.

For this project to be a success, we've already thought out of these outcomes and we also already have planned solutions to overcome them.

story:
Demo Download Link

 https://drive.google.com/open?id=157T_sNErZMELBDER5TnJ9wRK-p7XDq4m

 

Hey human, welcome to the Fibos universe! Cosmic invasion is upon us and we need your help!

More then 7 races will battle each other with all their power to try to take over each others hoods.

Why?  there was an invasion of supreme race that came to eliminate the entire planet, each hood hold resources and space for troops, that created a chaos and led even the most peaceful race to engage in battle to take as much hoods as possible.

you have no option but to fight back and defend what's yours ,you can be the hero, the battle commander, helping your race with battle formation and rearranging to most valuable position can bring you closer to the victory!

Think fast, act fast and earn your rewards and respect of your Cosmic race!

The demo release is near, get ready to enjoy from real action!

 

 

Hey if we reach our Top goal, we are going to have much more resources to finish our challenging battlefront, battle your friends or players from the world in Real Time PVP ,collect the best characters and build the greatest hood to be the best! !

 

 

Gameplay Video

 

Gameplay Images

 

Every battle starts with 2 active houses and 2 inactive houses.
you will start with melee recruit house and medical center .

All houses can be upgraded to lower train time or heal more plus some special power bonuses.

The two other are Ranged and Mage recruits which could be bought if you have enough income and then you can train those powerful characters to use is battle.

Each character can be upgraded and get really strong , the character receives xp and income for every kill, the amount granted depends on the enemy strength.

ther ar 3 lanes to defend , on the sideway lanes there are crystal mines , you need to capture them in order to gain even more income, every character inside the mine will grant you with more crystals per seconds.

 

Each entrance to the village will poses 2 towers to defend it, in order to eliminate them you will have to train bombers, a good tactic will be to defend the bombers with a line of recruits in front that will take the damage from the towers and allow the bombers to get close enough to bomb.

More Features like power-ups , towers and special events are waiting for you in upcoming demo.


 

 

 

 

Those are just two races and we plan to have much more!
each race contains 4 characters and 4 houses , we also create environment props that will be recognized with each race.

you as a player will have a personal experience level system , with each battle you will gain more and more experience ,as you level , you will unlock new characters , abilitys, place slots to buy and place a house and much more!

 

There is TONS of achivements that you can can gether, depending on your play style and creativity of playing, each achievement gathered will grant you with special resources . Will you get them all?

 

 

 

After we reach goal of 45,000$ the game will be richer for:

  - 12 new races

  - 48 new characters

  - 48 new race houses

  - 130 + new environmental objects

  - Android & Ios Cheaper performance version

  - More then 130 new levels

story:
Short Summary

Raise the dead is a work of art I really want to get out there. I want to create a cute game that's goofy and fun. I chose something that people normally see as scary, zombies, and made it cute. Making the zombies 'almost' harmless also makes for a fun, relaxed experience of a farming styled game.

Features:

- Herding zombies and keeping them in cells.
- Synthesize various potions.
- Use potions to perform experiments on zombies.
- Research and develop new upgrades, potions and tech.
- Farm plants.
- Customize your lab
- Play around with the cutest of zombies.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The funds will make sure I have enough money to purchase any extra help and any extra software or assets the game might need.

The plan is to get the game on Steam and many other stores. Steam keys will allow for easy distribution and a centralized place where the game can be updated. Steam keys would be preferred if we do get onto Steam, however if not, there are other stores like Itch.io, Humble, etc. There will also be a soundtrack available (you can preview some of it here: https://soundcloud.com/deadgravity/sets/raise-t... ).

Risks & Challenges

The game will be completed even if the funding goal is not reached, however, reaching the goal will make sure I can deliver the best game possible.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our links and tell your friends:

Subscribe to the Mailing List: http://eepurl.com/cMMu1T
Twitter: https://twitter.com/xCOLOSSALWRECKx
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/raise-the-dead
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/colossalwreckpage/
Discord: https://discord.gg/5rSSmq8

Support on Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetai...

story:
My name is Michel Schmidt from Sweden, I'm 30 years old and married and working half time in a resturant, and working with my hobby project : Blixten Quest.

Before I did start with Blixten Quest did I make website with animations and created many different effects in 3D.  But after a while did I start with programming and took the big step to start with Game Development and I did feel right away this is the thing I love working with.

Now is my dream to work fulltime with Game Development, and hope to start up my own Game Studio.

 

Operating: From Windows XP to Windows 10 (I may add more operating later).
Game Platform: Right now have I looked on Steam and Itch.io

 

Release Date

I gonna release the Early Access now in 2018, and it's gonna be in Summer, Late Summer.
The game is full playable, but there is more levels need to get added, and I gonna add some more contents.

FULL RELEASE? This is litle bit harder to answer, I trying to work very hard too release it, but I hope before 2019.

 

 

Blixten Quest got some inspired from Zelda II, but still has a big different from it.
I wanted to make something different when it comes to the classes, that you can switch while your playing, so you can have different playstyle.

This game is most focus on Adventure & Exploring but still have some story in it.

 

Beginning Story

You are playing "Blixten" and  wakes up and see something has happened, something is missing, you are worried. Now you need to find out what have happend! 
Let's start the adventure .

 

Character

You can switch between classes (Warrior,Ranger and Mage) while you are playing, you don't creating the classes, you choose while your playing. If you are playing Warrior then just Warrior leveling up, if you switch to Ranger, you are starting to level that class instead.

 

 

Collection

You are going to find new Collections while you are playing, those Collection do you need to move forward in the game. All classes have different Collections. All have different abilites too!

You are wearing it always, and making you stronger too.

 

 

 

  • Many places to explore.
  • Collection system (Finding Weapons).
  • Rifts (Not fully finshed yet)
  • Day & Night Cycle

   And more can come after a while..

 

 

And much more!

You have a big world to explore, you are going to have a great adventure. Finding Caves, Castle, Towns and much more. Talking with NPC, buy stuff, meet bosses, find secrets, get gold, shards and so much more!

Later I need to start a Company that cost, and Website host, marketing, maybe find someone that can help me with the project to get it faster on the later updates.

story:
Update: American Sign Language version of the video is here!

Summary

As a Dad of gamers, I searched for game servers on which my boys and their friends could play, ideally:

  • high performance
  • cost effective
  • on-demand
  • private

The options available were always lacking in one or more of those characteristics.  They were either:

  • low quality
  • expensive
  • always running
  • public (and therefore crowded and not always kid-friendly)

Rats Alley provides that missing option for gamers of all ages, and for parents of gamers.

What We Need

The initial development stage of Rats Alley is complete, and in alpha release (which you can see at RatsAlley.net).  Registration is closed off to the public, but the system is being used by a group of stalwart Alpha Test Heroes.  Before we can open up the Rats Alley site for registration, we need:

  • Legal consulting
    • ​For the full features of Rats Alley to be unlocked for an account, a user must validate their age.  Validated users can then create Parental Control accounts, for which they remain legally responsible, but which provide them with tools to manage access for their young gamers.  This, however, enters legal territory that is, to us, rocky and unknown.  We want to ensure there isn't anything about the Rats Alley system or our terms that can lead to the site being shut down.  We estimate about $10,000 for the consulting, legalese, and retainer.
  • Accounting
    • Rats Alley wants your money!  But we also want to manage that money well, and have the financial systems in place and personnel under contract.  We estimate about $2,500 to get that set up.
  • UX / Graphic Design
    • The Rats Alley game server system is working well, but boy is it ugly!  It is amazing how a good User Experience designer can transform a web application, even if the base functionality remains the same.  We estimate about $15,000 for a complete front-end usability overhaul and graphic upgrade.
  • Third-party Validation
    • ​The independent identity and age verification system we want to use (https://blockscore.com) is legally bound to only provide services to businesses with a commercial address.  The software development company (https://greenhollowtech.com) that is engineering Rats Alley has been, since its founding in May 2011, a home-based business.  Local office space is available for $6,000 for the first year, which would provide the required commercial physical address to contract with the verification provider.

The Impact

Your contribution will empower Rats Alley to provide quality and affordable game server hosting with a solid fiduciary and legal foundation as well as a great looking and easy to use front end. 

  • Rats Alley enables gamers to host their own game servers with the power they need without breaking the bank.
  • Rats Alley provides parents with the tools they need to easily manage their children's access to features, who they can connect with, and the game servers they can run.

You can be an integral participant in making Rats Alley a reality in the gaming world!

Challenges

Rats Alley has been under development by Israel J. Carberry, owner of Green Hollow Technology LLC, for two and a half years around a full-time day job.  It has been, and will continue to be, challenging simply in time management, as all the development work is done on nights, weekends, and holidays.  The technical construction of Rats Alley will continue to be developed by Israel, who is also the lead developer at NetGalley (the aforementioned day job which he still loves doing).

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word!  Everyone knows a gamer or two - you might even be surprised who are serious gamers when you start asking around.  Let them know about Rats Alley so they have the opportunity to join the team of supporters and fans.
