story:
The Boy from Dragons - Full Length JRPG 

Allenstapt, a vast temperate planet, billions of years old, has declined for millennia. After a hundred generations passed, the creatures alive now have never felt a storm among their surface. Grass grows, trees remain staunch, but drought grips any who attempt to irrigate or farm the land. The planet's temperature has slowly even declined, with fears that a couple hundred years in the future, the earth they stand on may just simply freeze over. The cause of the slow calamity is known. Dragons, primal beings of pure elemental force and will, which have manifested and drawn unique connections to the cosmos' forces, are dying out. Patrons and Matrons alike, since the dawn of creation, dragons have created beings in their own image or to fulfill their objectives. Without them, all creation slides closer to the brink of desolation. Good and evil conspire to allow the spread of conflict and calamity to worsen and spiral further out of control. As a boy reaches adulthood and joins the Human Kingdom Corps, a military branch of human civilization, an incident forces him out of his old life and into a new purpose. This incident, which starts as a mere ripple, will become a typhoon across the universe; as an adventure spanning worlds unfolds. And the hope of restoring order to creation rests in the hands of the Boy from Dragons.

This will be a full-length JRPG based on its own full-sized book. The Boy from Dragons will have 60+ hours of gameplay with a vast amount of plans for side quests and battle system mechanics to give both casual players and completionists an incredible amount of personal enjoyment with each playthrough. This is a game that will leave a mark in JRPG/RPG fans' memories!

It's been over twenty years since I picked up my first game, the Legend of Dragoon, from a friend. If I were asked today what my favorite games were, I would list titles from Legend of Dragoon, Breath of Fire, or Suikoden series. Games that had an incredible storyline, revolutionary gameplay, mesmerizing intros, and kept it right through the game.

DRM didn't exist.

In-game purchases didn't exist.

Offers to buy 10 seconds into the game didn't exist.

Alphas that last seven years and somehow reach v3.123141 also didn't exist.

I could also get higher than level 4 when I purchased a video game. -.- Monsters.

There was no emphasis on open-world or crafting that turn the video game into a soup of spending days hitting rocks off trees to build cabins so that you can play two hours a day, and someone else who plays 22 hours a day can destroy it.

That's not how we enjoy stories and shouldn't be why we enjoy games. The Boy from Dragons isn't about leaping back; it's about pulling forward everything we love in video games and making it today's project with today's technology.

Our studio wants to put out a full-length JRPG with purely original lore, mechanics, and storylines while paying respects to the way games were when JRPGs were released on PSX. This will be a game where you can dive right in and immerse yourself in a rich fantasy universe with quests, heroes, magic, and battling for people of any play style to enjoy.

+$25000 investment from our personal savings

+2000 Hours into development

+Formed a wonderful community on discord

+Made a proper fantasy based offical trailer with all original art, vocals, and composition

+2 months into the production of the playable demo ( Expected to drop Campaign day 30.)

+Made a bunch of friends along the way

+Have great streamers supporting us

Hi, my name is Dean, and I'm the author of The Boy from Dragons: Tales, which just successfully funded on Kickstarter. We have plans to launch a whole series this year, one after another, and so this falls in line with issues in Kickstarter's rules, which are you have to complete the campaign, AND rewards first. Some rewards can take 3 months to a year to manufacture. So it's OK, we did one good project with them, now we are here for our video game, as we are way too far into production to wait, and planned to release it hot on the tails of the book. I am a creative writer and indie game developer, who like many, has been indoors for much of the pandemic. I have started to explore my creativity in creative writing, artistry, and coding, and the journey has been mind-blowing. Growing up, I had stories I loved like everyone else, and although I took very strongly to video games instead of books, their level was the most crucial component of what I enjoyed. My experience with some of those games would carry over twenty years, and I still look back on with admiration and joy. There is, however, also a bit of sadness. With the best stories I have ever been able to even imagine, some of my favorite games never got to continue growing with me. Their sequels never happened and eventually were canceled, not by the artists, because artists never stopped dreaming, but by the publishers. Our new series won't be, because we didn't use any.

      -DJR MacNeill

 

Risks & Challenges

Our studio is led daily by a dev team with individuals who do it all. Gamers who are executives, JRPG/RPG fanatics, and developers with skill and experience. Having our lead developers from diverse backgrounds allows up to wear more hats, cut costs, and still deliver a polished product. Our two head individuals do 20 Years+ combined experience in the business but double that in playing video games and appreciating craft. We set the budget of the task at 41,700. At 100% funded, we understand our game's capacity to end up around 60 hours on Steam and Switch. However, that's not all we want to deliver! To fully realize the dream for this game and ensure a classic full-length feel of 60+ on ALL consoles, we need to surpass this amount well and attempt stretch goals without community! We need to crush that budget goal, so the next time you want to pick up a JRPG classic, it's off the Steam store or PS Network. Not a Rom, a publisher, didn't appreciate 20 years ago that still deserves to be played today.

story:
Go online and battle up to 3 others
- Hone your skills in single-player training
- Earn points and customize your tank
- Ten arenas and three game modes for multiplayer battles

-You can create a server, You can create a game and THIS IS TENKS!!!

 

 

Online mode will contain a server where players can connect around the world. You can also create your own game or your own server, through which you can play with your friends around the world. Online mode will contain over 50 maps that you can edit in the game.

 

For now there is only a single player

The single player currently contains 10 training maps. Through coaching you can collect coins, which you can use to edit your tanks. You can use these coins to edit the tanks in multiplayer game.

You can practice your skills in a single player

Each level gives a certain number of coins. The total number of coins won per map depends on the number of destroyed enemies, the number of fired racks ..

You can upgrade your tank

You can edit your tanks in various ways. By singl player or multi mode you can win some prizes that you can take on your tanks. You can boost the strength, speed, durability, appearance of the tanks, the name of the tanks.

 

Tanks!!! Interesting arcade game for all ages, fosters your skill, speed, strategy.

story:
History

GameGoblin started as GamrXtreme.com which launched Christmas 2018. The demand was so high our systems and servers couldn't handle the traffic. We gave GamrXtreme.com a break while we rebranded to GameGoblin and improved our systems.

GameGoblin relaunched at the Collision Conference/Web Summit 2019. Demand was still very high so we had to limit platform access to handle traffic.

We need your help!

Contribute to GameGoblin and get early access to the platform! You'll also get access to provide feedback on the platform to help shape the future of GameGoblin.

story:
Welcome to Terra Second!

Terra Second gathers the world visionaries in an online environment. There we can do what comes most naturally to us humans – to play. We belong together in little societies, we constantly communicate and we develop ideas of how to make a world the way we want it to be. We dare to face challenges – such as artificial intelligence, natural disasters, social problems, you name it…

Welcome to Terra Second! Who knows what stands in front of us?

We are creating a model for a better, more rewarding human civilization.

We volunteer to provide the solutions, which will make the world a better place for living.

Who we are:

We are a united international team of visionaries, IT gurus and civil activists joining our efforts across five European countries. We have put to use the British accuracy, the German neatness, the Spanish passion, the Polish innovative thinking and the Turkish reverence for past traditions. Together we have developed a platform that aids in synchronous and asynchronous distance

 

The E-Referendum

The University for Applied Sciences, Bern, Switzerland brought us together. We have been inspired by Switzerland, the "Admiral" of referendums, but we have also experience with a project for legislative changes conducted in Bulgaria. Thus our e-referendum came into being. It supported the organization of a Round Table (think about the Arthurian Legend) in the Bulgarian Presidency featuring expert participants from Germany, Switzerland, Latvia, and Canada.

While we were doing this, we got to meet everybody. We have contacts of various communities from all around the globe, reactive, enthusiastic communities who are willing to change the patterns of the current human reality.

Our Cisco Academy, launched in 2001 made possible the gathering of a company of IT specialists, working on different positions all over the globe. Nowadays, they keep on cooperating on a variety of IT projects.

We are proud to present our Terra Second – a social game that is in its essence a simulator of an alternative human reality. It provides the experience of global cooperation to all kinds of business, art and entertainment people, who wish to contribute to alternative solutions for the world we live in. We will discuss challenges and opportunities, create ideas, and make decisions. Through voting, we can implement different scenarios and estimate how their application will affect a world like ours.

We will teach ourselves how to take part in a referendum as a part of our daily round. We guarantee the immaculateness of our results by using the blockchain technology. Everyone can become a “miner” independently of his computer capacity and contribute to the program security.

Thus we will learn to give vent to our strategic solutions and our political representatives can learn how to implement them and finally earn their wages honestly. 

This game can practically change our lives…And that’s not all!

 

What Do We Need And What You Will Get

All financial contributions will accelerate the creation of Version 1 – the prototype of the game. Obviously, this project needs a lot more than just funds. Everyone can participate and aid progress. It's a huge, ambitious project, the risk of the investors is shared. We work really hard.

We are building Terra Second – the game, as well as a network of collaborators and this game,  will evolve continuously. The players will be able to redefine the rules of the game at some point of this development.

How can you contribute? We accept hosting and cloud services, skilled labor from volunteering designers and web developers, as well as online marketing specialists.

We also need a group for testing and generating ideas for improvement of the game, so volunteering is valuable to us.

Each contribution will be highly evaluated and rewarded – everything from writing code, to relevant contacts. Probably, there will be additional bonuses except the ones mentioned in Indie GoGo.

 

The Impact

The Internet has turned the world in a big village. Our social game Terra Second is the opportunity to involve in what's happening to us, to navigate our destiny. It truly is a game for visionaries. Its environment is beautiful and emotional, moreover – it will redefine the rules of Life, and most important of all – you guys, who care for our beautiful planet will finally get the chance to meet each other! We will discuss solutions for global challenges – how we came into being, what technological needs do we face, how do we rule societies and the world. Some of the players will have the chance to constitute an entirely new set of Rules and Laws, for the betterment of human civilization. This is the ultimate Goal of the Game.

We are aware that immense interest and significant efforts are put into revealing the past of our Human Race. Haven’t you asked yourself – Who we are? Where do we come from? Why are we what we are? Are we a product of genetic experiments? Does someone control us?

We are nowadays getting excited about the colonization of the Moon and Mars, and the development of international space programs can also be based on ideas generated by Terra Second.

What do you think? Can the collective mind help us all find adequate solutions for the plenty of challenges faced by our civilization? This game, Terra Second, this social experiment will give rise to the people and open new ways ahead of them.

 

Risks and Challenges

Technical challenges

Until now, there has been no e-referendum based on the blockchain, not even in Switzerland. The Game Terra Second is actually a simulator for crowd self-study and the next application in real voting systems. We have also drawn in our team as consultants some top experts of the blockchain. Until now, they are quite experienced only with the application of blockchain, for the creation of cryptocurrency. We now have to experiment with different applications and create the base version of the game.

The Concept

Nowadays we are bombarded with all kinds of messages, and a lot of them distract us from the real challenges. Everyone needs to walk his way and follow his legend, and reach a certain state of maturity – and that cannot be accomplished only with education.

But among the billions of humans on Earth, at least millions are at a certain intellectual level – to perceive by themselves, rationalize, discuss ideas, generate their own ideas and participate in e-voting via blockchain. Yes, they can do this!

The Question is:

Are you among them?

Possibilities for reaching out

In the beginning, when we create Terra Second – there is naturally a lack of resources. The most important of resources is obviously the people. We aim at creating a community from reformers and gathering active people all over the world – like the Space Kingdom Asgardia or the Italian Damanhur. Thousands of clubs for UFO, associations for technical progress, debate communities exist all over the world, and we are interested in empowering them through our game platform.

Political challenges

Yes, we challenge the System, the Matrix and they will try to defy us, and that’s the wonderful evidence that we are on the right track.

We expect the unexpected. We prepare ourselves for hard scenarios. We hire security experts, but we are not being paranoiac.

A Shocked Human Civilization

We are prone to not believing the real threats that stand in front of us.

When some negative events happen people tend to blame that on conspiracy theories. What if we prove them wrong? What if professional astronomers, geologists, and other scientists present convincing facts for an inevitable natural disaster? For instance the cyclic switch of the magnetic poles? How will all of this affect the psyche, will, possibilities and reactions of some of the game players and the Big Brother watching us – authorities, governments, media?

 

Let’s make Terra Second the land of the free and the home of the free…

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Other Ways You Can Help

Enthusiasm is contagious and very important. We will be incredibly grateful to all of you who wish to contribute with their services. We are in dire need of enthusiasts in all aspects of creation – from hosting services to civil activists. We appreciate it even if you share about the project in your Social Media or your video blog on YouTube, featuring your opinion and recommending the game. Please, share your reasons to support us, no matter what way you chose. It is impossible to predict all the opportunities for you to be a part of this futuristic project. 

You are our inspiration!

 

Visit our FB page, like it , write there ...

story_txt:
Welcome to Terra Second!
Terra Second gathers the world visionaries in an online environment. There we can do what comes most naturally to us humans – to play. We belong together in little societies, we constantly communicate and we develop ideas of how to make a world the way we want it to be. We dare to face challenges – such as artificial intelligence, natural disasters, social problems, you name it…
Welcome to Terra Second! Who knows what stands in front of us?
We are creating a model for a better, more rewarding human civilization.
We volunteer to provide the solutions, which will make the world a better place for living.
Who we are:
We are a united international team of visionaries, IT gurus and civil activists joining our efforts across five European countries. We have put to use the British accuracy, the German neatness, the Spanish passion, the Polish innovative thinking and the Turkish reverence for past traditions. Together we have developed a platform that aids in synchronous and asynchronous distance
 
The E-Referendum
The University for Applied Sciences, Bern, Switzerland brought us together. We have been inspired by Switzerland, the "Admiral" of referendums, but we have also experience with a project for legislative changes conducted in Bulgaria. Thus our e-referendum came into being. It supported the organization of a Round Table (think about the Arthurian Legend) in the Bulgarian Presidency featuring expert participants from Germany, Switzerland, Latvia, and Canada.
While we were doing this, we got to meet everybody. We have contacts of various communities from all around the globe, reactive, enthusiastic communities who are willing to change the patterns of the current human reality.
Our Cisco Academy, launched in 2001 made possible the gathering of a company of IT specialists, working on different positions all over the globe. Nowadays, they keep on cooperating on a variety of IT projects.
We are proud to present our Terra Second – a social game that is in its essence a simulator of an alternative human reality. It provides the experience of global cooperation to all kinds of business, art and entertainment people, who wish to contribute to alternative solutions for the world we live in. We will discuss challenges and opportunities, create ideas, and make decisions. Through voting, we can implement different scenarios and estimate how their application will affect a world like ours.
We will teach ourselves how to take part in a referendum as a part of our daily round. We guarantee the immaculateness of our results by using the blockchain technology. Everyone can become a “miner” independently of his computer capacity and contribute to the program security.
Thus we will learn to give vent to our strategic solutions and our political representatives can learn how to implement them and finally earn their wages honestly. 
This game can practically change our lives…And that’s not all!
 

What Do We Need And What You Will Get
All financial contributions will accelerate the creation of Version 1 – the prototype of the game. Obviously, this project needs a lot more than just funds. Everyone can participate and aid progress. It's a huge, ambitious project, the risk of the investors is shared. We work really hard.
We are building Terra Second – the game, as well as a network of collaborators and this game,  will evolve continuously. The players will be able to redefine the rules of the game at some point of this development.
How can you contribute? We accept hosting and cloud services, skilled labor from volunteering designers and web developers, as well as online marketing specialists.
We also need a group for testing and generating ideas for improvement of the game, so volunteering is valuable to us.
Each contribution will be highly evaluated and rewarded – everything from writing code, to relevant contacts. Probably, there will be additional bonuses except the ones mentioned in Indie GoGo.
 
The Impact
The Internet has turned the world in a big village. Our social game Terra Second is the opportunity to involve in what's happening to us, to navigate our destiny. It truly is a game for visionaries. Its environment is beautiful and emotional, moreover – it will redefine the rules of Life, and most important of all – you guys, who care for our beautiful planet will finally get the chance to meet each other! We will discuss solutions for global challenges – how we came into being, what technological needs do we face, how do we rule societies and the world. Some of the players will have the chance to constitute an entirely new set of Rules and Laws, for the betterment of human civilization. This is the ultimate Goal of the Game.
We are aware that immense interest and significant efforts are put into revealing the past of our Human Race. Haven’t you asked yourself – Who we are? Where do we come from? Why are we what we are? Are we a product of genetic experiments? Does someone control us?
We are nowadays getting excited about the colonization of the Moon and Mars, and the development of international space programs can also be based on ideas generated by Terra Second.
What do you think? Can the collective mind help us all find adequate solutions for the plenty of challenges faced by our civilization? This game, Terra Second, this social experiment will give rise to the people and open new ways ahead of them.

Technical challenges
Until now, there has been no e-referendum based on the blockchain, not even in Switzerland. The Game Terra Second is actually a simulator for crowd self-study and the next application in real voting systems. We have also drawn in our team as consultants some top experts of the blockchain. story:
This is an intellective battle game. It may look simple, but you will find it meaningful when you play it.

This game was created based on the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods 2000 years ago. It’s an era when the culture and military flourished in the history of China and even of the world. There were many world-class cultural celebrities who were active during that era, such as Lao Tseu, Confucius, Qu Yuan, and Sun Wu, the writer of The Art of War.

Well, it’s not important. All you need to know is that this game is very interesting. After you play it for a long time, you will feel more about its unique charm!

 

Game Development

Six years:We have been working on this game for six years, in which three years were spent for design and development, and the other three years were spent for balance and details.

Uniqueness:Although our studio is small, we have tried our best to make this game different from the rest. It is featured with the unique creativity and playability.

References: WARRING STATES: The Heroes was firstly conceived in 2012 under the enlightenment of CLASH OF HEROES, Hearth Stone, Plants vs. Zombies, etc. We adopted a variety of design concepts from these games and finally completed our overall design. Here, I’d like to pay tribute to these great games.

Adventurous attempt: We have been working on this game for so long that it’s destined to be an adventurous attempt. I hope you can feel it with your heart. I believe that a lot of people will like it.

Key Features

  • This game is suitable for people aged 6-60 who like to use their heads, as well as the female players who don’t care about the “ugly” characters.
  • You will have a wonderful competitive experience due to its optimal balance and rivalrousness.
  • There are 70 distinctive heroes, 14 soldier types with different features, and 38 treasures with various functions.
  • The pre-battle configuration can be built easily, and the battle experience is abundant and funny.
  • The configuration shall be built with 30% strength, 30% luck, and 40% skill.
  • Different soldier types can restrain each other with their particular features, which is different from the general restraint by means of numbers.
  • This is a global game. You can battle with foreigners, families, or friends.
  • It is interconnected among IOS, Android and PC.

 

Core Mechanics

Hero’s skills:Every hero has exclusive skills that will have a great impact on the battle situation.

Hero’s passive skills are also crucial.

 

Soldier type: You can choose 2-4 different soldier types for the battle.

You will get more advantages if you master the features of different soldier types.

 

Team formation: In this game, 3-6 soldiers can form a team vertically or horizontally. Different teams will work in different ways.

 

Team combo: Team combo is an important skill. You can achieve more kinds of combo through ingenious arrangement.

Multiple​ combo

Cross combo

Team attack: You need to make the team attack the enemy at the right time. Don’t attack blindly.

Warriors can attack a column of enemies in flank

Team defense: In many cases, defense is also a choice. You must master the features of each soldier type so that you can defend the enemy in a better way.

Swordsmen’s infuriation effect can be used to defend spearmen.

Elusion: Sometimes, it may be better to make the hero or the team elude the powerful enemy.

The hero can also choose to avoid danger.

Game Mode

Arena: In this game, all the players can battle with each other for the qualifying tournament, including weekly and monthly matches.

1V1: You can create a 1V1 for yourself so that all the other players can challenge you in your 1V1.

Challenge for soldier types: Every soldier type has its own challenge level. You cannot use it unless you win the challenge.

Single expedition: In this mode, you can go on a punitive expedition to other six countries so as to unify China.

Planning for more modes: We will introduce more game modes, such as melee, customized battle, and most importantly, the country war that involves all the players.

 

In the real process of the game, the scene is changeable and colourful. Here, we will introduce some basic conventional strategies.

Basic Tactics

Team defense and combo: You can move the team for both defense and combo.

Protect the cavalries: You shall protect the powerful cavalries. Please prevent your opponent from initiating the attack on them.

The cavalries are not protected

The cavalries are protected

Combination of warriors and spearmen: The key is to determine the attacking sequence and position of different soldier types as needed.

Wrong sequence

Right sequence

Combination of Bowman and white wolves: Give the white wolves a reasonable chance to bypass the enemy in front of them.

Wrong sequence

Right sequence

Hero’s Skills

Zhao Gao: Make it easy to form a 5-member team and a cross combo.

Shangyang: Reuse the team in the corner and reinforce the attack.

Qinshihuang: Clear the enemy ahead skillfully and carve out a way for your team.

 
 

The following is some representative evaluations made by the players during the public test period.

 

 

 

 

Principle members are introduced as follows:

 

We have spent a lot of money on this game for years. Now, some subsequent functions have not been finished, and our goal of the first version has not been achieved. We want to complete it through crowdfunding.

We expect to launch this version in Q1 or Q2 of 2021, and then add new functions gradually.

 

The following is the rewards prepared for crowdfunders. All the rewards are limited to the game.

We hope we can get your help through Indiegogo so that you can experience our game as early as possible. Thank you for seeing this project. Thanks a lot!

story:
Protect your clan while finding love and the meaning of forgiveness.

 

"The Last Clan" is a fantasy story with romance elements, evolving around a central theme of the importance of family.

Unlike other popular Oni stories that portray them as evil beings, ours focuses on what it means to be different in a time where you cannot truly be yourself.

 

http://amachamusic.chagasi.com/mp3/yukyunotokie.mp3

 

The story begins in Narasaki: home to the last clan of Oni. Generations prior had torn apart a once-peaceful city into one steeped in war, fueled by loss and revenge. Years later, the battlefield has become empty, however, any with 'tainted' blood are seen as a threat to mankind.

Thus one secret clan remains, keeping the essence of who they are hidden.

Moriko's life is shattered when her father, the clan head, is burdened with a mysterious illness...

She'll risk it all to find a cure, putting her life on the line to retrieve a magical item believed to save him. 

Rated PG-13 for dark themes, mild swearing, action, and potential blood.

 

Team:

 

Neeka: Team Leader, Writer, and Developer

LunaLotus: Writer

Mytheme: Sprite + CG Artist

Puppetbomb: Background Artist

 

 

https://cloudnovel.net/Neeka/novel/the-last-clan-tale-of-oni-demo

The game will be available to play online on Itch.io

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • A branching story-line, with multiple endings (there are no bad endings!)
  • 4 Romantic Routes
  • Personality-based Choices
  • 15+ Colorful CGs; main and route-specific
  • CG Gallery
  • Immersive sound effects and background music
  • NEW: Platonic Non-Romance Route

 

 

Our goal is $3,691 

The team has lovingly provided assets (without pre-payment) for the Demo and Backer Rewards. However, we are missing some vital assets for the game, such as the full script and some essential backgrounds.

 

Here's a breakdown of our goal:

 

  • Artist A: $865 (CGs, Sprites, Rewards)
  • Artist B: $340 (Backgrounds)
  • Artist C: $120 (Promo Art)
  • Writer A+B: $2,000 (Entire Script, All Routes + Endings)
  • Fees: $336 
     

Stretch goals: $~1,000 

Any additional funds raised will unlock other assets such as:

  • Thematic CGs: $175
  • 5th romance route: $500
  • Partial-voice acting: $250
  • Mini-game elements: [unsure]
     

The total word count for the game is estimated to be around 110,000 words. There are two writers for the game, splitting the work down the middle. 

The game will be completed no matter what, though if our goal is not met it will considerably add time to its release.

If we don't reach our total goal, I will still use the funds to pay those who I can as fairly as I can. 

This project means a lot to the team and would love to fully bring it to life with your help.

 

I, Neeka, have previously crowdfunded a small game (32,000 words) prior to this one, which is available for free: https://cloudnovel.net/Neeka/novel/our-mountain

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Potential obstacles we may face on the way are mainly delaying the release to the full game. If we cannot fund the additional, needed assets we may have to use some placeholders for certain art, as well as a limited features.

We can overcome this by creating participating in Indiegogo's In Demand feature.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Can't afford to back us? No problem! You can help us by sharing our campaign to your social media/friends/coworkers/grandmas, to anyone and everyone.

story:
Lethal Honor: Essence is a strategic and challenging action-adventure roguelite,  featuring precise and strategical combat against eldritch creatures, using melee combat and tons of different abilities in a dozen different locations. The player will be an agent of Lethal Honor, an organization that investigates and destroys paranormal events all around the world.

Prepare to discover the truth. Welcome to Lethal Honor. 

 

The game will be released on Playstation 4 on March 2021, and three months later, on PC. The switch version depends on the corresponding stretch goal.  

The game will be released in English and Spanish. We will add more languages as we reach more stretch goals; such as Russian, Korean, Portuguese, French... with the corresponding polls.  

 

We are close to the next stretch goal... THE NINTENDO SWITCH version!! 

It's a long way to go... but we can do it!! A full Switch version costs a lot of time and resources, but we'd love to be able to develop it!! It would be from 6 months to 1 year after PS4 release (development time is long and har for a new console), but the Switch version will be released with ALL content up to date!! So you won't miss ANYTHING!!

  • Action-Adventure: Intense and brutal melee combats with draining but rewarding gameplay. Attacking relentlessly will only lead to your death: think, plan and survive.   

 

 

Use your attacks and abilities with intelligence to defeat the enemies

Gothic graphic novel art with hand-drawn 2D characters in 3D scenarios

  •  Mixed roguelite and adventure progression: Travel through different zones with an original progression system, that will encourage the player to revisit scenarios to get access to new content that was previously closed. Mixed with hundreds of items, relics, and artifacts that will force you to adapt your play style in order to maximize their benefits.      

Your abilities help you keep the enemies at bay. Learn how to use them or suffer the consequences. Dozens of different bosses with their own mechanics. Improvise. Adapt. Overcome.

  •  Plan your movements strategically: Go across zones with several types of nodes. Fighting is not always the answer: You may encounter decision-taking events, shops, recovery rooms and much, much more. Plan ahead and accept the consequences: getting into an untimely battle could lead to your demise. 

Each zone will feature different objectives: reach the end node, freely move for 'x' turns, fog of war...

  •  Thrilling graphic novel narrative and storytelling:  Explore and unravel a mature and dark story full of secrets. Each main agent will move the events forward with a unique story told through comics and events with a strong and deep emotional burden.   

The Awakening Room is the main hub of the game, with all allies stories and narratives.

 The game features a dark gothic graphic novel visual style, in which we combine 2D hand-drawn characters and enemies with full 3D scenarios using cell shading to achieve a unique visual style with its own personality.

In only three months of development, we won our first art award! BEST ART on FIMP Gaming and Tech in November 2019. 

 

Each time we start a new run we will embody a "lost agent", whose only future is his or her demise. But there are other agents (“Core Agents”) whose events will irremediably change the outcome of the story from that moment on, unlocking new zones and weapons, different combat styles, items, runes, and allies.

There will be dozens of different agent suits and helmets, providing different gameplay mechanics and aesthetics.

Danielle's combat style will be very different from Aaron's: she will be much faster and deadlier, but she will be weaker and more vulnerable

 

They will be assisted by several allies, non-playable characters the agents will rescue. In return, they will help them from the Awakening Room, the game's main hub before each run. They will send them on new missions, requests, and story events. There will be a lot of storytelling in the Awakening Room.  

 

  Demons are not always what they seem. There are some that will help the agents... for a price. There is nothing black and white in this universe, and the most unlikely partnerships are needed in order to survive.

 The final game will feature a dozen different scenarios, each one completely different from the others, with their unique enemies, events, traps, items: Scientifically-advanced laboratories, forests swarming with insect-type demons, flooded caves, abandoned mines, razed cities…

They all will tell a story that will help you understand the main events, all linked together in a storyline that spawns for more than a thousand years.  

  

 

The team developing "Lethal Honor Essence" has been making games for more than 10 years. We know what we do, and we do it with infinite passion.  

 Lethal Honor Essence is not “just another game”. It is a dream come true: a universe we have been maturing for more than 20 years and, finally, we can show it to the world.

It all started back in 1997 when a group of friends decided to create a unique story for a role-playing game. It was based on the real world, but in which all monsters of our nightmares could be, and in fact, were real. The universe describes the fight of good against evil, in which the line that separates light and shadow is slim.

Old Lethal Honor's RPG documents from 2001

In all this time it has been growing, maturing and unfolding in the minds of the creators. Day by day, month by month, year by year. Today, dozens of stories have been written with hundreds of characters throughout the history of mankind: Middle Ages, Feudal Japan, Victorian Age, Wild West, Biblical times... each story delves deeper into this complex and vast transmedia universe.

Lethal Honor Essence is the first approach in the form of an action video game. But there are a thousand stories to tell through comics, books, other video games of different genres (horror, survival, strategy) and, who knows, even TV shows and movies.  

https://www.instagram.com/lethalhonorgame/

https://www.facebook.com/LethalHonor/

https://twitter.com/lethalhonor

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjmb0wIocn7BLy5okvD-ooA

 

 We have a free demo on Itch.io!

Click to download the demo. It will be updated monthly for several months!!

The player will be an agent of Lethal Honor, an organization that investigates and destroys paranormal events all around the world.Prepare to discover the truth. Welcome to Lethal Honor.  The game will be released on Playstation 4 on March 2021, and three months later, on PC. The switch version depends on the corresponding stretch goal.  The game will be released in English and Spanish. We will add more languages as we reach more stretch goals; such as Russian, Korean, Portuguese, French... with the corresponding polls.   We are close to the next stretch goal... story:
Warm up!

Rollplay Football is a board game about football. It has 10 different teams and 110 unique player cards.

Pick your team and control your favourite players in a board that looks like a football pitch.

The rules are simple: score more goals than your opponent and win the match!

What you get:

  • 1 game board
  • 10 team cards
  • 110 player cards
  • 45 coach cards
  • 10 ball tokens
  • 5 black dice (1x d20, 2x d12, 2x d6)
  • 5 white dice (1x d20, 2x d12, 2x d6)
  • 1 rulebook

Kickoff!

You and your opponent take turns, first the attacker, then the defender. The attacker tries to pass the ball between his players, dribble and shoot to score a goal. The defender needs to move the players wisely, and choose the right moment to tackle to get the ball.

Each player has its own set of skills. Higher skills give you higher dice, thus a better chance to succeed in skill checks.

There are also special coach cards that can be played at any time to tip the balance to your side. Use them to turn opportunities into fantastic goals!

ARE YOU UP TO THE CHALLENGE?

8'
Player cards

Player cards represent football players. Each card has the player's team colors, the starting position for that player in the pitch, and a set of skills.

Like in real football each team has 11 players: 10 field players and a goalkeeper.

Field players have 4 skills: pass, dribble, shoot and defense. Goalkeepers have 3 skills: pass, defense and goalkeeping.

Skill values range from 1 (lower) to 5 (higher) and each player has a unique combination of values. For example, attackers usually have higher shooting whereas defenders have higher defense.

Player cards have two sides: black or white. If you are playing in the black spaces of the board, you use the black side of the cards. Otherwise, you use the white side.

17'
Game board

The game board is a football pitch 53x79 cm large. It has 31 black spaces and 31 white spaces to place the player cards. One team uses the black spaces and the other team uses the white spaces.

23'
Actions, skills and dice!

Players use their skills when they do actions. For example, if a player is passing the ball, the value of the pass skill represents how well he passes the ball.

Sometimes players have to do a skill check to see if the action is successful or not. Skill checks use dice. An higher skill has an higher dice, so an increased probability of being successful.

Help us making it happen!

We have been working on this game for the past two years. The game is ready to go, but we need your help to make it happen.

The total production costs for 1000 copies are near 20.000€.

We are hoping to raise 10.000€ from this campaign and, if we reach this goal, the project will go ahead and we will support the rest of the investment.

What comes next?

This campaign will run for 2 months.

We will have weekly updates with details about each individual component. While detailing each component we will further explain how to play the game.

And don't forget that we have special stretch goals if we meet our main objective!

CAN YOU HELP US SPREAD THE WORD? 

When will you get the game?

We are able to produce the game in 2-3 months after the campaign ends. 

You will get the game in the beginning of September.

For any other comments or questions, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@tabletipgames.com.

12.000€

Stretch Goal #1
Your country's team!  

If we reach 12.000€, we will include a team representing the country with most backers that is not already in the game.

15.000€

Stretch Goal #2
A better coach!

If we reach 15.000€, we will add a booster pack with special coach cards just for backers. Your team will have the best coach!

20.000€

Stretch Goal #3
An all-stars team!

20.000€, really?!! All backers will have an all-stars team! Why choose regular players if you can play with the best?

About the authors

André Pereira is a researcher in Human-Robot Interaction during the day. He has a natural interest in all kinds of games including football. He is one of the game designers.

Marco Vala is a software engineer during the day. He is a big board game enthusiast and also loves football. He teamed up with André as game designer. They had the original game idea.

Filipe Preto is a graphic designer during the day. He is the lead artist in the game and designed all the game components.

Ricardo Galvão is a portuguese cartoonist that does regular work for sports newspapers. He did the cartoon artwork for the game.

Tabletip Games is a portuguese game publisher. We published our first game - "Vem aí a Troika!" - in 2012 after a successful crowdfunding campaign in Portugal. In 2013 we published the Spanish and Greek adaptations. In 2014 we published an expansion named "Vem aí o Banco Mau!". "Vem aí a Troika!" and "Vem aí o Banco Mau!" sold more than 11.000 copies in europe.

story:
Build your own army, destroy your enemies and most of all, have fun!

Tiny Armies is small game with a lot of strategy but also balanced with a bit of luck.

I'm working on this game for a very long time and after many playtest, rules and graphic modifications, it's now ready to be launch and for this, I need your help!

So help me make this a reality by choosing one of the amazing rewards.
Thank you.


Specifications

  • Minimum Players: 2 Players
  • Maximum Players: 4 Players
  • Time: 20 to 40 minutes
  • Ages: 9+


Includes

  • 64 playing cards (1 1/6" x 2")
  • 4 army cards (4" x 6")
  • 50 small stars (7/8" x 7/8")
  • 1 regular dice
  • The rules (small booklet)
  • 1 box (4.5" x 6.5")



The game objective is to be the one at the end of the game who has earned the most stars. The game ends when all 50 stars have been won. When you play less than 4 players or you want to play a shorter games, use less stars.

There are two ways to get stars: 
  • By destroying an enemy unit
  • By stealing stars to other players

Setup

At the beginning of the game each player must have an army card on which he will put (during the game) his combat units. Each player draws three cards from the deck of cards and keeps them hidden from other players.

The game is played in the clockwise direction. To determine playing order, each player rolls a dice. The player with the highest dice roll will be the first to play.


On a turn...

During his turn a player must respect the following playing order:

  1. Draw one to three cards from the deck. At the end of this turn the player must have 3 cards in his hand. So if a player already has one card in his possession he must draw 2 cards to have a total of 3.
  2. Recruitment : add (if possible) 1 to 2 units on the army card
  3. Playing an action card (Missile or Spy)
  4. Attack an enemy unit (only 1 attack per turn)
  5. Discard 1 card (unless the player has no more cards in his hand)



Recruitment

To recruit a unit in his army, just place the card of this unit on a free space of the army card.

A player cannot stack soldiers on each other. So there should be only one unit per space.  See exception*.

In addition, once a unit is recruited, it can't be moved or switched to another space.

The recruitment phase is not mandatory. A player can decide to not recruit any unit and wait for the next turn.

Of course a player cannot recruit if the player has no units in his hand.

*During his recruitment a reserve soldier must absolutely be placed under another soldier already on the army card. So he cannot be placed on an empty space. When the soldier placed on top will be killed, the reserve soldier will automatically take his place and make a counter attack (see attack rules).


Attack rules
The attacking player must choose the unit that will attack and the enemy unit that will be attacked.

Then, the attacker rolls a dice.

If the score is equal or higher to the defense number, the player destroy the enemy unit and earns the number of star(s) indicated in the upper left corner of the destroyed unit. The destroyed unit is placed at the bottom of the deck. The attack ends.

If the attack score is lower than the defense number, the enemy unit is not destroyed and makes a counter attack. Then, the unit rolls the dice. If the score is equal or higher to the defense number of the unit that had previously attacked, it destroys this unit and wins the number of star(s) indicated in the upper left corner of the destroyed unit. The destroyed unit is placed at the bottom of the deck . If the counter attack score is lower than the defense number, the attack turn ends.


Particular case (reserve soldier)
In the event that an unit is destroyed but has under it a reserve soldier, the reserve soldier reply immediately with a counter attack.


The reserve soldiers, the regular soldiers and the gunners cannot attack enemy unit(s) in the 2nd line if there are still enemy unit(s) in the 1st line.




Here is the different kinds of cards in the game:


Back of the cards:


Card description:


Here is the Army Card (4x6 inches):






Risks & Challenges

The game is ready and I just need 500$ to start the production.

Why only 500$? Because I have an agreement with my regular printer who is ready to produce in small quantities if necessary.

Also as a graphic designer since 1998, I have a lot of experience in the printing industry.

If you have any question on this topic (or another one), don't hesitate to contact me.



Who I am?

I'm a professionnal illustrator and graphic designer with over 18 years experience. In the last 2 years I decided to follow my passion and dedicate a large part of my work at illustrating and creating games of all kinds.

story:
About Me

My name is Joesph Koen, (yes spelled Joesph - It's special.) 

I am 20 years old and a small time coder and dev.

I code for fun and code for friends. I help others code and fix many projects.

What is Project Virgil?

 This is Virgil. 

He is a P.A.I. (Partial Artificial Intelligence)

{P.A.I?} * P.A.I is a not fully made A.I. meaning it's smart, but only smart as the programmer makes it. *

Virgil is a A.I. in Halo 3 ODST. I liked playing the game and wanted to recreate this Awesome A.I. - He isn't a Cortana, but he is a Cool A.I. with various moods.

 

I want to make this Awesome A.I. come to life.

I am currently doing so.

Although it is limited right now, he is getting smarter everyday.

Why do I need funds?

Well, as i have basic tools and easy tools, making this is going to be a challenge.

I have some tools right now to keep on building, but in order to make Virgil come to life, i need more tools and power.

I need data clouds, computing clouds, and some dedicated servers. It's not cheap. A after crunching numbers, I got around $4.3K that will last about 2 years of keeping him alive, by then he will already be fully operational. If not well he will always be on my flash drive waiting to be alive again.  I will have other funding services going so $4.3K is what i need to get going, $5K isn't my full goal, it's just starter goal.

 

Just a Thought

Just think, waking up oneday, and saying Virgil, Lights. or Virgil, Open Blinds.

I want this to go big, and be awesome. Virgil - Update my facebook status "Good morning!" while being in bed, or having him read the weather to you, being your alarm.

 

Wait a second, this sounds familiar?

Indeed, it does. Some programmers are out there making something from the movie Iron Man, Jarvis. 

Why should I care about Virgil if Jarvis is going to be big before Virgil?

Well, sadly i can't compete with those devs and say and claim Jarvis wont outdo Virgil, but Virgil will be a free SDK for anyone to to use royalty free. After Virgil's  release, you'll be presented with some tools being able to shape and morph Virgil to your liking.

Vigil will NEVER cost you a dime. Besides the Donations or Backing this project, but spending a little helps a little no?

Perks

Here are what some perks means

Version Number Order.  Initial-release.Beta-Release.Alpha-Release.Post-Alpha-Release

Say if i have 1.2.4.234

1.x.x.x is Initial-release - Which every one will get access to.

x.2.x.x is Beta-Release - Which only backers get access to. (So if this number changes, only the backers get this release.)

x.x.4.x is Alpha-Release - """ (""")

x.x.x.234 is Post-Alpha-Release - """ (""")

 

Now I launch an update, 1.2.4.235

Only backers who backed the Post-Alpha-Release will get this update.

 

Now i update to 1.2.5.0

Only backers who backed the Alpha-Release gets access to Alpha-Release and Post-Alpha-Release updates.

story:
Zaron

Zaron is the first multiplayer role-play strategy game which is a completely new genre. In this game, you will be give one of 22 unique factions to control and to write its own story. We have developed a glamorous world with lots of mechanics and opened unlimited capabilities for every single memeber of the game. In fact, you will find intriguing what you can do in Zaron. First, you are able to customize all in-game objects such as clothes, weapons, structures and transport. Second, you are allowed to experience a fascinating turn-based battle system which is slightly different from other systems. Last but not the least, there is an amusing thing, which we call social element. Its main part are inhabitants of each faction, since every NPC in Zaron has his or her own personality. We can even call our game a simulator of the world and society. The history of Zaron’s universe is extremely interesting, and it will be not so easy to reveal it. Therefore, there is a system of “Key moments” and an archive to help you. Every person with a desire will be able to join the game, as there are only two turns in a real-life week. However, don’t think that the game is reluctant since we can assure you that the amount of content allows everyone to find an occupation for the whole time.

  • Get into a unique and completely new Zaron universe
  • Take one of 22 unique factions and their sub-factions under control
  • Explore breathtaking history of the world
  • Follow one of countless ways of development
  • Create anything you want, either instruments, clothes, weavings, buildings or transport (By the way, weapon and artifacts are also instruments, but the question is for what…)
  • Communicate with other players, who controls other sub-factions
  • Declare wars, make alliances and surprise your enemies – everything to increase your power
  • Change any faction and follow any goal you want from victories in wars, technological inventions, magical discoveries to diplomatic and trade achievements and so on.
  • Participate in any act with the help of “key moments” system
  • Build your character according to your demands
  • Remember, your actions also affect other players, so this makes the game even more interesting

 

The game process description

The beginning: When the session starts the game generates a completely new world filled with lots of objects, like ancient ruins connected to the world history or material deposits. All the factions of the game are also randomly situated in the world.

Factions: As it was said before, first thing that the player does when he or she joins the Zaron session is choosing a faction which he or she wants to play for.

Character: Then players need to describe the appearance of their characters, who later will be the leader of one of the inter-factional structures (either the government of the faction, guild of tradesmen, aristocratic family or anything else).

NPC: The game is filled with different structures and even more - NPC. Everybody in Zaron has his own system of goals and values, so it won’t be so easy to govern the faction and to demand on others.

Game process: When players got into the world, they should once at a turn give multidirectional orders, which can affect different aspects of the game. Every player receives an introductory at the beginning of the turn. Then they give orders to all NPC they have under control. Remember, every one of them has his or her own character and together they form a society.

Craft: The player can develop technologies and create new objects. Every faction possesses different technologies and different branches of development tree from the very beginning. In this “trees” players will get the access to materials and modules with which they are allowed to create a big variety of things. All in all, there are one technological, one social and 11 magical “trees” in the game.

Magic: Magic is one of the widest aspects of the game. Zaron theory is very laconic, but the practical part is quite vast. You’ll prove that to yourself during the game.

Leadership: The leadership of the faction almost always is given to the first player who joined it, but it doesn’t mean that the faction will obey that player. First of all, Zaron is a game about power, deceit and social interaction. Every willing person can become a leader and every willing person can conquer him (with a share of luck, of course). If a player does something, what contradicts the morality of the faction, he risks losing all his power in it. Every action has its serious consequence. In addition, all the player’s acts are evaluated by every NPC that knows you according to unique characters and systems of values, what makes the game multifaceted.

Multiplayer aspects: When a player meets another faction, after establishing the contact he or she is able to spread your influence (which is quite difficult), and the game will become more complicated. However, don’t think that players in your faction will be only helping you. You both can come to an agreement, starting a cooperation, or end up in the argument, declaring the war.

Dungeons: There are a lot of different places in the world, visiting which can really be interesting. There are opportunities to discover parts of Zaron’s history or get mighty artifacts in them. Each place has its own story and all the stories are combined into one vast world. But reconnaissance data can become obsolete, the recon team can be killed or bribed, and rumors can be deceptive.

Key moments: “Key moments” are one of the most interesting and important aspects of the game. The player can name every action as KM and play it from the first person. It doesn’t matter whether it is a battle or a guest visit, the player will get into a place where he’ll be able to interact with any object and change the world. Usually KM are declared in advance, and the world is described by one of the duty dungeon masters.

History: There are a lot of scattered books and texts, including fragments of past history events. The collection of your own library is an important part of the game, and it will become a real challenge for every player, who wants to know the real history of Zaron’s universe.

Session: Zaron session lasts for a long period of time and ends when one of the players collects enough power to control 90% of the intellectual planet population. But don’t care about it, the main part is the game process and the world exploration. The capabilities are amazing with their diversity, so use them. We have everything: the plot, magic system, technologies and the mechanics, in secret not just for fun. We can assure you that it would be really interesting for you to discover it yourself by collecting everything from pieces, and to realize that everyone has his or her own truth. Change the world and live a unique life as everything is in your hands.

Community goals:

12000$ - Faction interface Braided by lianas or immersed into the sea depth - faction interface will be in special stylistics

12500$ - 3D markers for maps (what can be better?)

13000$ - Character development tree (“Everybody is unique” - game characters will have their own development trees)

13500$ - Voice chats (“Text is great, but voice is better” - we’ll make voice chats for Key moments)

14500$ - Impulse KM (If you want to play an interesting KM not connected to the game - it is for you)

15000$ - Alchemy/farming/blacksmith's craft

15500$ - 3D view of Key moments

17000$ - Archive illustrations

17500$ - In-game translator 

18000$ - Free platform for creating Key moments (Only for you and your friends)

20000$ - Zaron BattleGrounds (1st person view for KM)

 

Thank you: Thank you a lot for your help, we’ve been working on this project for already half a year and it would be great if we finally succeed. With your contribution, Zaron is destined to become an amusing game with lots of great mechanics and interesting history, so we hope for all your support.

story:
Intro

Well...
Everybody who plays Texas Hold’Em Poker, is aware of the excitement and the adrenaline rush this card game offers.

But how many times have you thought ...

“what if there could be a legal way to cheat?”

“Wish I could take a look at my opponent’s hand?”

“What if this ace of spades was an ace of diamonds?”

“Oh god, i want to kick this guy out for this round!”

For those of you who actually had these thoughts, the POKERISH add-on card game to the Texas Hold’Em Poker is made for you...cheaters... 

Short Summary

We love Texas Hold'em !!!!

We love card games !!!

We love giving life a little twist !!!!!

You will love Pokerish

How Pokerish Works

Pokerish is an add-on card game which joins a regular Texas Hold'Em Poker game night. 
Pokerish though doesn't cut the rhythm off of the poker game. It is silently embedded into your game, and brings up the adrenaline and the excitement, using only some basic rules.

At the beginning of the game each player gets dealt 2 POKERISH cards clockwise starting first with the small blind.

You may now start playing regular texas hold'em poker. 

The general rule of the game is that each player can play any card, WHILE HE IS ACTIVELY PARTICIPATING IN A ROUND.

Each player can play only one card, until the dealer button changes player.

Each card used goes to the “used cards” deck face down.

When there are no cards left at the “card’s deck” the “used cards” deck get reshuffled and the cards are back into play.

When the dealer button makes a full circle, each player (starting again with the dealer) can draw up to 2 cards from the POKERISH deck in order to have again 2 in his hand. 

The Cards 

Pokerish cards are designed respecting poker's rules and traditions. The names of the cards and the descriptions, aim to entertain the player by referring to wild wild west and several other historical facts.  They are not intended to offend any race, culture or group of people.

Image above: Cards illustration process

Image above: Sample Card and Back of the Deck


Image above: Sample cards. The rest will be a surprise. 


Why do we need your help?

In order for Pokerish to reach the shelves (online or real life) we need to make this into a real business.
We have done the initial work, the illustrations and now we are on the verge of launching Pokerish to the world. And we need your help for that.
Most of the funds will go for production and redeem of perks. You will be the first Pokerish owners and we want to thank you as much as we can.
Production 31%
Marketing 10%
Online sales setup 2%
Company setup 21%
Perks 28%
Platform fees 8%
Of course, we require money to setup a company for Pokerish, pay up platform fees and promote the product (marketing). 
Most of all, you will give us the ability to produce the first 1000 units of Pokerish decks to hit the shelves!!!
AND on top of that not only do you support Pokerish, but also our start up company dedicated to making awesome board games! Already 2 games are in the stage of illustration and 1 in the stage of game design and continuous play-testing.

The Perks

These are the perks we offer when you support Pokerish. 

Stretch goals will be announced shortly.

Testimonials

We've performed numerous mock play testing before launching Pokerish on Indiegogo. Here's what some of them wrote on the comments sheet:

"It was a great game. Designed with a lot of thought, and the cards are hilarious" Nick P.

"After playing two times with the group, I must admit that I can't think of playing Texas Hold'Em Poker without Pokerish anymore. Haha!!! Great fun" Frank A.

"Simply AMAZING addition to Texas Hold'Em. Mind blown." Peter K.

"Great game, awesome illustrations. Funny and strategic." Steve J.

"I managed to piss off my brother and beat him at Hold'em. Win win!!!" The Cat


Other Ways You Can Help

We can't say how much we appreciate the support even if it's not coming from a donations.

You can help us immensely by sharing our campaign to your social media (remember to use the Indiegogo share buttons) 

Spread the word to all your friends, players or not.

story:
Short Summary


CHILDREN HAVE A KNACK FOR SOLVING PROBLEMS IN SIMPLE WAYS.

             Growing up we would always trade video games back and forth with other kids because we were to young to work a job as a means to buy games. As we grew older our disposable income increased while fewer people where around to trade games with.

              "There should be a way to expand the trading process we used to do when I was younger. A service that opens up the amount of people to trade with over the barriers of distance, age, and acquaintance."


AFTER 2-3 MONTHS OF EFFORT, AS OF 2016 THAT SERVICE IS FINALLY HERE.

JAMIE JONES(FOUNDER) - VIDEOGAMESTASHBOX.COM

"We Invested in ourselves to Build it. You Invest in us now to Grow it."


"Leme hol dat" videogames facilitates the secure trade & exchange of videogames between gamers. After you send in a valid functioning game you are allowed to pull out any game you want. (See: FAQ)

  • No negotiation or haggling required! 
  • Put a game in, pull a game out!

Example: How does this service work?
3 step process



What We Need & What You Get

Now that the service(videogamestashbox.com) is up and running the goal is to do three key things within the current year.
1. Solidify our position & quality
  • Increase the in house number of games offered.
  • Testing equipment(to make sure games we receive function).
  • Upgrade from stamps to bar-codes in order to track orders and lower price.
  • Round-trip Insurgence for games that we both store & ship.
  • Increased storage capacity & security.
  • Efficient packing & shipping equipment.
  • Legal review of online service for liabilities.
  • Licence Fees.
  • Software design, development, & implementation of additional services.
  • Pay down current non-monthly recurring overheads.
  • Server and productivity software fees paid down and ready for 2017. 
2. Raise awareness of the service
  • 2 month Targeted gamer websites ad campaign
  • 2 month Facebook ad campaign 
  • 2 month Twitter ad campaign
  • 2 month Google adsense campaign
  • 2 month Youtube ad campaign
3. Become profitable
  • All we need here is hard work, well wishes, and your patronage.

In return we are offering a range of free and discounted uses of the service it self! 
Before giving us anything, we offer you a discounted trial....
  •  Coupon code: "indigogocampaign" (%20 off trade envelope)


The Impact

With our service we meet you half way in that you can see the service right now. It's not an idea or dream, it's a fully functioning service you can try today!
www.videogamestashbox.com
In the event we reach our goal the impact will be seen around 45+/- days after receiving funds in 3 ways directly observable by the customer.
  1. More games will be ordered and listed in the service. (Serves as a means of enticing more people to try the service for the first time.)
  2. The 2 month ad campaign will begin across multiple venues (Raises awareness to the new service and games recently purchased)
  3. Transition from stamped envelops to traceable bar-code envelops.

The Long range impact will be seen by...
  • Reinvest into the growth of business in order to provide local employment.
  • Use profits to add a software development arm to the core service.
  • Finish senior year of software engineering at Auburn University.
  • Return home to Birmingham AL and train locals in computer programming.


Risks & Challenges


What are alternative solutions for those people?

  1. Buy the game new
  2. Buy the game used
  3. Online rental service
  4. Neighborhood rental
  5. Trade with current friends


What makes this solution better than the alternatives for those people?

  1. It's less expensive to trade for the game than buy it new
  2. It's less expensive to trade for the game than buy it used and there is a bigger selection of games then a store would provide.
  3. It's less expensive to trade for the game than pay a monthly service fee for an online rental service; which charges the customer even if they are not currently using the service.
  4. It's less expensive to trade for the game than pay a fee for a rental that you get to keep for a limited amount of time.

story:
I went to Maldieves for honeymoon in Nov 2014. During my vacation, the amazing view of two-colored ocean, beaches with soft and white sand, incredible water-front villa really got me shocked. I asked myself 'Is it possible to enjoy such a thrilling view without costing so much money or taking so long time?' Then a project called 'Maldee' started to get planned! 

After I received Oculus Rift CV1, I learnt Unreal Engine4 for almost two years. Today project 'Maldee' is not a dream but actually a VR-vacation-experience with steady design-and-development progress. And now with your help, the project would include even more interesting features!

Hope all of you could enjoy this project, and of course subscribe and support it!

 

- Put on your HMD and controller to take an island vacation in no time
- There's no need to worry about the 'cost', the only thing you need to do is to enjoy
- An ocean-viewing water villa with private service housekeeper for you
- Unlock more activities and facilities by collecting more member points in order to get a higher member level
- Speed boat\bicycle\buggy, several transportation methods
- Large public swimming pool\greeting arriving building\resteraunt\pier, several interesting facilities 
- Beach volleyball\Snorkeling, and more activities

 

Once the game is launched, you'll soon find yourself on a speed boat heading to an island named 'Maldee'. As mentioned in the above list, there are many things worth to explore and enjoy. Never mind about the 'cost'. Just stay as long as you can! The island itself is not so small --- It will take you about 10 minutes to have a round tour. Try these interactive items and activities at the island, and some of them will lead to increase of your member points. There are several membership levels on 'Maldee'. The greater your level is, the more items and activities would be unlocked. Enjoy yourself whenever you start a 'Maldee' vacation! 


The up-to-dated open island map is posted below:

 

I.About the price:

The VR game 'Maldee' would NEVER have any DLCs. If you like it, I'll try to continually add new features, enhance graphic performance and do game optimization. The final game price would be $9.99. But since I really need time to work step by step, a lowest price would be set at first. I'll never set the price to $9.99 unless the features make me satisfied.

 

II.There are sereral perks you can choose:

You can found them to the right side.

 

III.Also goals and prizes are listed below:

 

I.Development:

Both Oculus Rift and HTC Vive should be supported.

I have two PCs: Ryzen 7 2700x + 32G + 1080ti \ Core i7 6820HK + 16G + 980M with which could be used to go on tests for greater graphic effects and optimizing for better performance.

II.Approximate Release Schedule:

A DEMO version of 'Maldee' with several unique scenes would be released in September 2018 due to plan.

An open BETA version would be released around November 2018.

The early access version would be released around Feburary 2019.

The formal version would be released around mid 2019.

I planned to introduce latest progress every two weeks.

Normally I'll release an update each month.

 

Page: https://www.facebook.com/Maldee-170198503693830/  [International]

Mail: wzspdw@gmail.com

Twitter: https://twitter.com/MonduzGaming

 

 

WZSPDW (Me myself):

A crazy video game player who is actually a PM in real life, and is about to become a professional indie-game creater in close future. Up to now, I design game, create audio effects\musics, and do other things including drawing, modeling\riging and skinning\making animations, setting game levels and programming(vba\gml\blueprints\c#\c++). I sincerely hope you like my games!

 

Monduz:

A game studio started by me myself in 2014, and it includes only 1 staff (Yes that’s me) in most of the time. Here lists the games made by Monduz:

  1. Monduz Battlezone: A rounded based strategy game running on MS Excel, LAN based multiplier game supported!
  2. Monduz City Guardian: A 2D clicker and strategy idle game which had been greenlit on Steam.
  3. Project Windmill: A Windmill simulator on mobile platform.
