If you have played some fighting game, then you should know: each character has its own fight tactic: set of techniques to defend and attack. Every unit has weak and strong sides.
Of course you able to miss a couple of kicks if you have good armor or you are mighty kid with magnificent health. Such fight system provides many opportunities to play as a thief without armor or as a heavy tank. Everyone has its own bonuses like speed, critical hits and so on. So, flimsy thief can bring you notable damage (till you hit him a couple of times). All of these things work in the opposite situation too. Character characteristics, weapon weight, the Close Fight Cards, Effect Cards -  no sense to describe all the list of possibilities you will have. There will be a detailed manual for this part.
Few last extra details: you can use two-handed weapons as one-handed (if you have enough strength). Also there is no limit to have two-handed weapon in each of hand, but keep in mind – weapon weight affects endurance.
Knowledge and Learning.
Everything can be learned and every action has counteraction. If you have learned many Cards, you will have many rooms for fighting. If you have studied a certain group of creatures, then you know weak and strong enemy sides. You will gain an advantage on the battlefield. The Witcher game Bestiary could be more useful, because it has a great potential. We will fix this part of the game in our Book and will make it your best friend in surviving. If you are strong in crafting or brewing, you have wide space to protect yourself or improve your characteristics, or get rid of some effects. Some of knowledge you learn thanks to completing Events; some of knowledge you will learn during the battle, some of knowledge you can simply buy for money.

The book is initially aimed to the medical side. Such knowledge and visual art has a significant component as does an element of the game.  
If you are intrigued let's move to the goals and I will show you what you get
 
 
 
Goals

Most the game content, which has been already done, is related to the final goal. So we do not even think to cut something just because we won't be able to deliver it in the StoryLine
The project is huge and  nothing happens from the air(Alas!). So it takes time. Development period about 3 years(that is standart time for a huge game with huge content). 
In my opinion, better to wait a bit to get good game at the end unlike do not wait nothing at all,right?
I hope you share this  
Project costs overview

 
 
Rewards
In game NPC: one of the NPC will get your lineament.

The main idea:  if you are speaking with such NPC you will see full size page with the face.
By clicking on such Face you will be able to move to Facebook page(if you like) and people will see the Prototype of the NPC(You). So, maybe one of the NPC is your friend or neighbor :)  
We have common character reward or key character reward. The key character is a person which you will see more often in the game.
Sponsor Reward:
Your name on the first page of the Book: Every time the people open Main Menu they will see your name(by hitting the name you can  move to FB page to look at the person ). If you do not want the link,we will disable it.

 
Titles reward
Your name in titles.We will have to sections of the Titles:Disbelievers Section:This option for people who want to say the word like : "I TOLD YOU!"
Maybe you don't beleive in the project quality(or something else)  and want to say the world that you was Right!(Perhaps you are a true predictor? Let the people know!)
Believers Section: Maybe you just want to help the project but not interested in the game...or If you haven't enough money(I hope you are OK)
 

Risks & Challenges
Just a few words. One of my character traits is "Saying the Truth no metter how much it will cost". So, I will say you as it is.
I am working on the project for two years(29 of May was 2 years date).
I have made already:

more then 50K lines of code to make parts of the game working
200+ pages of content(Fight Card Texts,Effect Cards, Items, Location Descriptions, etc)
2000+ of Art Images(Location Places, Cards, Items, Effects, Unique Armor Parts, etc)
300+ Sounds related to Fight;
and a lot of other things(databases, item structures with all the data)

All of this things I made ALONE. Yeap, friends say that I'm a fanatic.
And YES, I am ready to finish what I have started. I have a storyline, a raw content to work with, the skills to write the story, code, draw an Art, but I am really need your  help. I have only two hands. Content is a very time-consuming part. It would be impossible to work on the Project and have additional  work to pay the bills. That's why I am here and asking for your help. Using your support I will be able to finish on the biggest projects I will work on. If the Second Goal will be reached I could use some extra help. Having more human power I will be able to concentrate on the story you will get.
My final goal: "kids" should get the game at the end.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
The project runs under ZERO marketing budget. Usually the games you see (you know who we speaking about) spend half of the project budget for this(included to price you pay) . I want you pay for content you get, not for advertising. So, if you able to share the link - I will be more then happy for your help! Just copy a link to project or use  Indiegogo Share Tools, it will help a lot!

story:
1. Our Story

A few months ago the founder of the internet, Sir Tim Berners Lee, expressed concern that ‘the web’s undeniable benefits seem to come with far too many unacceptable risks: to our privacy, our democracy, even our mental health. (#ForTheWeb: fortheweb.webfoundation.org)

 

 

His aim is to reverse that negativity.

Our idea to help is to create an alternative, and more interesting idea, that generates positivity.

By creating a brain healthy game that everyone can play - and contribute the majority of the proceeds of that game to brain healthy charities and organisations - we think a positive message can begin to replace that negativity.

 

 

As a brain healthy game, Mahjong Solitaire doesn’t require any undesirable actions in order to entertain, which makes it suitable and inclusive for all age ranges; yet it’s also a brilliant, complex mental challenge, in a focused, yet super calm environment that isn’t, in any way, dumbed down because it’s healthy.

By celebrating those things through a World Mahjong Solitaire Championship - and using the championship to fundraise for charities and organisations who support those less able to celebrate - the negativity from the internet that currently affects our mental health could start to be reversed. 

 

 

2. Where does all the negativity come from?

In 2012 a book was published called the Chimp Paradox.

You may have heard of it.

In short, it uses a simple idea to describe how our usually healthy brains can misbehave due to the influence of an excitable, frequently irritable, and surprisingly influential chimp part of our brains: that tends to hijack our healthier thought processes.

This idea has become popular in recent years as a way of understanding how humans think.

 

 

As the internet is filled with information created by humans, it stands to reason that, in time, the information on the internet will begin to resemble humans.

Positive ideas still exist on the internet, but all too often they get 'hijacked' by the internet’s ‘chimp’.

If the hijacked parts are not challenged, they eventually become the new source of our future information gathering - perpetuating negativity and making it increasingly difficult to reverse.

The reason we so often accept the hijacked ideas of our chimps is that the hijacked ideas are often all we see.

 

3. How a new conversation about mental health could work.

It’s rare for the subject of mental health to appear in a headline that isn’t negative. Generally the tragedies of poor mental health are focused on, which makes engaging with conversations about mental health difficult, even for those who genuinely want to help.

Up until now Mahjong Solitaire has not been particularly good at self promotion.

Which, coincidentally, makes it a lot like conversations about mental health.

This is why we think the two would make rather good companions.

 

 

If one of them could be helped to ‘get out’ a little more, the other might follow.

So, we’d like to carefully lower a great big positive mental health party, that can’t be ignored, into the middle of every negative mental health conversation in the world. 

And we’d like to invite:

(1) individuals who want some healthy brain exercise and a high level mental challenge for their own brain; to share their experience of that exercise and challenge, and talk about how good it makes them feel with

(2) their friends and relatives,

who will interact with

(3) their friends and relatives

to become

(4) even larger groups of people who might be able to

(5) influence an enormous POSITIVE conversation across the internet. 

And we'd like all those people to know that, in doing so, all of the money they paid to qualify for the World Mahjong Solitaire Championship (a $10 entry fee for the app) is going to help groups and organisations and charities all around the world who work directly in the field of mental health and mental health services every day.

And, of course, not forgetting that one of those people will become a World Champion!

 

4. So, how can we create it?

1. At the centre of our project is the World Mahjong Solitaire Championship app: the place where you can practice Mahjong Solitaire games any time, wherever you are, and even play along with Championship games even if you're not part of the competition, but, more importantly where you compete to qualify and, if you succeed, compete in the finals. To build the competition app we need 42,000USD.

2. Then we need 100,000€ (115000USD) to host the finals, including network security and hiring of the venue which we hope to be in the beautiful city of Paris at the end of July. At the moment we’re preparing for 5000 finalists, plus guests - for a really big celebration of positive mental health!

If we don't reach our goal, the app will come first as this is also a way of raising funds: registration for the Championship will be 10USD and we would like to ensure that as much of that goes to supporting mental health services as possible, so maybe the finals will be a little smaller in this first year, and maybe in a colder part of the year :)

As for cutting costs elsewhere, we’ve designed other Mahjong Solitaire apps before, so we could probably steal a bit from those. If you want to see our other Mahjong Solitaire app you can find it here in the AppStore http://itunes.apple.com/app/id1286992644 - though it is for English students, so it looks a bit different to normal Mahjong Solitaire games.

 

 

To give you an idea of the level of challenge for our World Championship we'll be using some of the levels from our Clever English Mahjong app in our World Mahjong Solitaire Championship.

Beyond that, we’re trying to keep operational costs to a minimum to provide as much support as we can. This idea is just an app (albeit a quite complicated one) which more or less looks after itself. And, of course a big event at the end. No office staff, or complicated business set up.

And if we receive any additional funding above our goal it will go to providing more support for mental health organisations, and trying to get even more people to register for the World Mahjong Solitaire Championships.

 

5. What you get in return :)

 

 

Our perks include something for all levels of contribution - from acknowledgements for your support on the first page of our app - which will always be displayed, however many times the app is updated - to limited edition badges, and very limited edition World Mahjong Solitaire Championship tiles, with your name on, that will be used in all of our World Championship competitions. We hope you can find something that interests you.

And, of course, you get the opportunity to be a World Champion!


6. Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge comes from trying to coax Mahjong Solitaire and mental health conversations out of the shadows.

Both hide themselves very well. 

How withdrawn they have become, and whether they have already become too withdrawn, only time will tell - but we hope that everyone who has read this far will be inspired enough to spread the word as positively and as widely as possible over the next few months to help encourage them, and bring this exciting and ultimately beneficial project alive.

In terms of risk, we’ve tested the main parts of the app and designed it to be resistant to cheating - which is an important consideration in a competition app - as well as being as easy to use as possible for everyone who takes part.

The rules of Mahjong Solitaire are beautifully simple so as to not require lots of translations into different languages, which is usually very expensive and, in this case, would take money away from our goal of supporting work in mental health services. And the distribution of the app will be managed, at worst (in terms of costs) by the AppStore and GooglePlay, or our own website which will help to keep even more money for our fundraising.

We hope we’ve explained our idea clearly enough, but please see our FAQs if we haven’t been able to answer your questions here.

If you want to know more you can contact us on our Facebook page: 

http://facebook.com/worldmahjongsolitairechampionship 

which will give general help for this crowdfunding project, and, if we’re successful, support for the championship when it’s up and running.

 

 

Thank you very much for your interest in our World Mahjong Solitaire Championship :)

story:
We’re Jobesk, a software house and we’re planning on creating the first-ever game, where you can fight to Earn real cash. If you’re interested in playing for fun and earning at the same time, we beg off you to kindly join us in this quest by clicking the big Red Button, “Back it” and become one of the first to have in possession the first-ever paid fighting game as well as other exciting perks.

Welcome “The PAID FIGHTER – the first and the only game, where you fight to earn”.

 

 

Yes, that’s it! It's about a fighting game where you can fight to earn – not only virtual coins but even money all by winning tournaments.

WHAT IS PAID FIGHTER

“THE PAID FIGHTER” is a groundbreaking fighting game that seamlessly connects ten (10) fighters from different countries fighting to win a tournament.

 

HOW DOES IT WORK

The game itself is very simple and fun to play. First, you’ll have to create your profile, this will be visible to all your opponents. It will contain information about you, they’ll see your rank as well as your winnings.

 

Then you select from the arrays of free fighters to start with or buy a fighter with better fighting abilities and prowess.

 

You can also customize your fighter to your taste.

 

Then the tournament…

To win the tournament, there are twenty (20) matches to play, at each stage is a new player to fight. And there’ll always be a clear winner.

 

Won’t you get tired fighting 20 players in a stretch? Don’t worry, after every five (5) matches, you can refill your energy and continue the tournament. Awesome! Right?

 

HOW TO EARN

First, “THE PAID FIGHTER” has two kinds of tournaments, and you can earn from both tournaments.

  • Free Tournaments

 

 

Winning the free tournament gets you coins, i.e. money to buy items like Powerpack and other items internally.

  • Paid Tournament

 

 

This is the sweetest part! This is where you get rewarded for your passion. Winning the paid tournaments affords you the opportunity to earn cash rewards. And guess what? You can cash out at any time without reserves. Awesome, right?

 

CHARACTERS

  • Free Fighters: there are a host of free fighters to select from. Each has been specifically created with unique skills and abilities.

 

  • Paid Fighters: this is the real deal, asides from having multiple options of fighters to buy, you can also build them to your taste, once acquired to make them a perfect fighter.

 

 

ITEMS

In need of health coins, or more power packs to continue? Don’t worry. We’ve got you!

 

 

FORMAT

Wondering what format the paid fighter would come? Don’t worry. It will be accessible to all, as it will be an app that can be downloaded on Google Play store as well as Apple Store for iPhone friend users. Go on and play on the go!

WHY YOU’LL LOVE IT!

  • You get to choose your opponent

 

 

  • Daily and Weekly Tournament

 

 

  • Cash Rewards

 

REWARDS!

There are different rewards on different Levels of game. 

Cash Rewards

Item Rewards

power Portions

Internal Coin Rewards

All Characters t shirts and cups are available and they will dispatched earlier than the release  of the game. 

 

OTHER WAYS TO HELP

Love our campaign, but no money to support? Don’t worry! We can relate… if money is totally out of it, then you can pledge your support by:

  • Giving us constructive suggestions.
  • Sharing this on your social media page {awareness of our projects is as important as every penny}
  • Referring like-minded people to this campaign page

 

SOCIALIZE WITH US!

Got a question about this campaign or the paid fighter game? We’re just a click away. Kindly connect with us across all our social media channels. We’re such a great community. If you have any comments, or other feedback - please feel free to let us know. We want to hear from you so we can make "THE PAID FIGHTER" even better together

 

Thank you for taking the time out to read our campaign and for contributing generously to it.

And that’s all to it!

 

RISK AND CHALLENGE

This is our first Indiegogo campaign, so we’re figuring it out as we go. Making a game app is not a walk in the park, that itself is a given. Challenges can ensue at any point in time, however, be rest assured that we’ve incorporated this into our planning processes. Our Team has the knowledge, experience, and commitment to see things through.

story:
Do you have what it takes

to be a rocklegend?

We need you, to help us build the best music game ever.

You can already play the open beta here: rocklegend.org !

A free to play music game, right in your browser (and later on your mobile phone too!). You can play when you want, where you want and what you want!

the story of rocklegend.

rocklegend is a free online music game. If you like games like Guitar Hero, Rockband, Frets on Fire or the legendary Jamlegend, you'll love rocklegend.

We're working with artists to get them onboard, and are also talking to labels in order to create a diverse song catalogue.

It all started back in October 2013 when Patrick, the founder and developer of rocklegend decided that the time for a new online music game has finally come. He started developing the core of rocklegend.

This was the very first version of the rocklegend player (nostalgia ;))

In March 2014 Michael, a good friend of Patrick and a marketing and sales expert joined the project and is now Co-Founder of rocklegend. He started talking with bands and labels, and now, we have a catalogue of 17 artists and 56 songs (growing)! 

Now, more than a year has passed an it's been exciting to see how this project grew from a little side project to a project which has many fans and passionate players.

We went through a closed alpha in which about 1.000 Users joined us and started playing around with the track editor, and later began to battle for highscores!

On the 30th November 2014 we opened rocklegend for everyone, and in just one month, more than 500 users joined us already and are playing the game :)

We went through a closed alpha in which about 1.000 Users joined us and started playing around with the track editor, and later began to battle for highscores!

what's next, and what do we need?

We're currently at a point where we got the basic mechanics of the game done, a growing user base and lots of ideas. The current design of the rocklegend website and game was made by a developer (Patrick) and it's main purpose was to make "feature" tests possible for the closed alpha phase of the project.

It doesn't look great, and implementing new stuff into the current website is a pain (navigation structure is horrible, everything looks different, it doesn't have a "game" - feel).

We want to pay a designer to create the new screen- & player-design for rocklegend.

This is going to help us with a few things:

  • the website is going to be faster, due to the new way we are going to code and deliver the new version
  • new features can be implemented more quickly
  • a consistent design where nothing looks out of place
  • new player style will allow custom designs
  • rocklegend is going to look better than ever!

For this we need $ 4.250,-. This includes costs for perks, payment to indiegogo and the payment provider. There's also a small amount reserved to be safe if something we didn't think about comes up.

We want to implement a ton of new features.

Since the stuff you see on rocklegend.org is just the beginning, there's a lot of planned features coming to rocklegend in 2015.

6.000 $ - multiplayer mode - play against friends or strangers in realtime

10.000 $ - a revolutionary fan/experience system. realtime competition between all players. you can win and loose fans. some people say it reminds them of bitcoins system.

12.000 $ - performance recording. got a great score? post it on youtube without opening a screen-recording tool!

25.000 $ - rocklegend mobile. keep playing rocklegend anywhere you want.

50.000 $ - "Beat-Legend". Upload your songs, play them instantly with automatic track conversion.

And there's also a few other things we're going to implement this year:

  • moderation system - mods will keep the community an awesome place to be.
  • improved managament and communication system for trackers
  • improved track editor to make it easier, faster and more fun to create tracks
  • improved player: custom designs, performance improvements
Yes, there's going to be premium content.
Keeping rocklegend online costs money. We thought a lot about how to implement a business model which won't block anyone and found a way to provide additional content, which is not pay to win, for users who like rocklegend and want to get the most out of it.
Examples for premium content:
  • High Quality Audio
  • Special Emoticons
  • Custom Designs
  • Special Venues (this has to do with our upcoming fan system)
  • Custom Playlists
  • Private Chat rooms

legendary perks

Most of the perks are pretty self-explanatory :)

  • All badges will be awarded by the end of the campaign

  • Premium content will be available in late 2015.

  • Guitar picks and drumsticks will be delivered in april/may 2015.
At higher perk levels you get a pair of rocklegend signature drumsticks or a rocklegend signature pick!

This is a preview of how the drumsticks are planned to look like:

You may tell us if you have any strength preferences for the picks!

who we are.

Patrick aka flipace - Founder, Developer

Michael aka MBandMedia - Co-Founder, Marketing and PR specialist //mgr

    risks and challenges

    We love this project, and therefore we are not going to quit working on it :)
    We know how much we have to pay for our designers and we know what they are capable of - therefore the risk of not getting a design done (or the design is not good enough) is extremely small.
    There are known risks for:
    - stretch goal: video recording. it's possible that we need to redevelop the whole player in order to make this work. 
    - stretch goal: beat legend. it's possible that there's going to be much more effort to implement this system. we already have a few working demos though and are dedicated to implement this feature since it's something we'd love to use too.
    We're very communicative, so if you have any ideas, or want to help us in any way - you can write us a mail to office@rocklegend.org anytime!

    ex-jamlegend player?

    We have a thread in our forums where you can post your previous username and clan from the old jamlegend days: http://forum.rocklegend.org/index.php?p=/discussion/11/calling-all-jamlegend-players

    No money to spare, but a voice that can be heard?

    Great! Thank you so much for reading this and thinking about supporting us in any way you can!

    Here are a few things you can do to help us without spending a single dollar:

    • Share this campaign with your friends, on facebook, twitter, by mail, or send a carrier pigeon to your folks (we might start a trend!) !
    • Like our facebook page and follow us on twitter for the latest updates on rocklegend!
    • JOIN US RIGHT NOW - on rocklegend.org and start playing :)

the story of rocklegend.

He started developing the core of rocklegend.


This was the very first version of the rocklegend player (nostalgia ;))

story:
Features

The feature this whole thing is about: Profiles. With it, you can define custom resolution/dpi/over-scan to be applied right before launching the app/game you want. Just draw the app gesture to launch it with the aforementioned profile. You can draw it anywhere over any app/game/window opened or even on your home screen. Just tap "Dotty" and draw your gesture. Voila! It's done :)


We quickly realized the potential of the gesture thing. So instead of stopping there, we went on a decided to use gestures for everything else! Below is a short video showing example of using Dotty to call someone. We've made only this version with the basic functionality till now (using the gestures to do separate actions ), but with your sponsor we'll be able to finish it soon if Allah wills :)
 

But throwing an ugly icon on your screen to just do this?! It has to be done with style!We've gathered more than 150 themes for our little Dotty to suit everyone's styles. And still, there are probably more to come!


Other features are mostly more stuff to do with gestures. Based on how much fund will we get, we'll be making more shortcuts that you suggest in your feedback.

How does it work?

When you open our application, you'll see one screen with three tabs: Settings/Gestures/ and Themes. In Gestures tab, you can ad new custom gesture to your list:

After clicking "Add new gesture", a new screen will appear, in-which you'll draw a gesture of your choice and associate it with a certain app/action -and optionally choose custom resolution to be applied before the app is opened. Click save and Voila! you're done :)


Now, you can go anywhere now and click on Dotty (if not visible, get it from the notification bar) and draw your gesture ... The action will take place immediately! If you no longer need Dotty or just don't want it to be visible now, just long click on it and it'll disappear and patiently wait for you again in the notification bar.


Finally, you can change Dotty' size and choose whether or not to show the most/recent used gestures in the "Setting" tab.





Who is NOMone ?

We are a couple of experienced developers who love making great games and apps that change the world one tiny bit at a time.

What is NOMone "Gesture Dotty"

We were thrilled by the good feedback we received from the good folks using NOMone Resolution Changer. To indie developers like us, this is the best motivation to keep us working. We've received lots of feature requests and we decided that we have to do at least some of them. That's why we're here today.


NOMone "Gesture Dotty" is going to be the application's successor if Allah wills. It should be easier, faster and with more features. We have all the experience we need to do this, all we need is your support :)


So why making a campaign?

We're making this campaign for two reasons:
  • Put money issues off the table! We made all our work free as long as we could afford it. It takes a lot of courage to admit, but we can't afford doing this for the time being. We need you to sponsor us!
  • Getting valuable feedback! We need to know your opinion about these new features, how far you are satisfied and willing to use/buy it . It's very reassuring knowing our work and efforts won't go in vain :)
Your feedback is important to us :)
Even if you don't like Dotty or not satisfied with it's features, your feedback is very important to us. Tell us about the problem and what is missing... This will help us improve it and satisfy more users :)

Cautions!!!

  • Before buying any perks you MUST try Resolution Changer first to ensure that your device can run these features in Dotty. 
  • When changing resolution, you might get stuck in a boot-loop due to SystemUI crashing. If you know how to use ADB and have usb debugging enabled you may be able to recover from this without factory resetting or restoring backup.
  • Changing resolution requires root on Android 4.3 and higher.
  • Virtual button requires root on all platforms.


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. So, kindly get the word out and spread the word about our campaign :) Share it everywhere. It's a great help for us :)

Thanks for your interest in our project :)
NOMone Team.

story:
Overview

DB Hounds is a 2D coop-oriented action game where you and up to 3 friends fight waves after waves of enemies and destroy huge bosses, unlocking new and interesting characters along the way. With 30 stages, each one with a challenge, and over a dozen of characters to unlock, the game is jam-packed with content to enjoy! 

The Game’s EARLY BETA demo is out right now!  Download it here: https://masked-hero-studio.itch.io/db-hounds

Developer: Masker hero Studio

Platform: PC

Release date: 2019

Players: 1-4

 

 

Hordes of strange and powerful monsters started invading Earth! But it turns out that Earth wasn’t their only target. The “Dimension Busters”, huge beings that command an army of bizarre creatures, were invading not only Earth, but a lot of different Worlds in different Dimensions too.

An Inter-Dimensional organization to hunt down and dispose of these beings, the DB Hounds, was formed with select warriors from each Dimension, with their base on Planet Earth. Their job is clear: to go to any World that might be being invaded by the Dimension Busters, get rid of them, and recruit any warrior that might be willing to join the fight.

After destroying a Dimension Buster, we can use the remains to extract data about their Prime Dimension, after enough data has been collected we can transport to their own dimension and end this war once and for all!

 

Meet some of the NPCs that will guide you on your journey:

 

 

ARCADE

On every stage, there are many waves of incoming enemies to defeat, using the unique qualities of your character and cooperating with the other players, while evading any hazard that might be in place.

There are power ups and items that will help on surviving the waves, either dropped by the defeated enemies or provided by vending machines.

In the final wave there will be a boss to conquer, much powerful that the other enemies, once it is destroyed the stage will be completed. Clearing a stage will unlock new ones to try and might unlock new playable characters.

The player has a certain level of control about what stage to play next, so the game doesn’t need to be linear.

There are 6 dimensions with 5 stages each, on the final stage of every dimension there will be a Dimension Buster. After defeating all 6, the final boss , the biggest challenge in the game, will be accessible.

 

CHALLENGE

After any stage is defeated, a special “challenge mode” for that certain stage becomes available. The challenges vary wildly from stage to stage, like dealing with a super hard wave on a single room, replacing every enemy with one harder to kill, only being able to use bombs and all sorts of crazy things!  

These present a new world of challenge for those daring and skilled players that want a harder experience and some characters can only be unlocked by clearing certain challenges.

 

 

SURVIVAL

A special survival mode will be available for certain stages; here the players will face unending waves of monsters and bosses, trying to set a new record. This is the ultimate challenge of the game, as the waves will become progressively harder and eventually much harder than the normal game.

 

 

 

24 PLAYABLE CHARACTERS

You start with 4 characters and soon you start unlocking more, either by beating a specific level or challenge.

Characters are different in many ways: having a distinctive look, health, speed and special recharge rate, however the biggest way characters differentiate from each other are their main attack and special.
The main attack is their normal shoot ability, which varies wildy from one character to another and it’s what you will be using the most. The special is a unique ability which can have many different uses, whenever it is for helping the party or disposing of enemies.

 

Here are some of our characters:

6 DIMENSIONS WITH 30 STAGES IN TOTAL

Your mission to terminate Dimension Busters takes you to 6 different dimensions, each with a different look, feel, hazards and set of enemies.

Each dimension has 5 stages, and you don’t have to do them all in order, beating a stage will grant you Data, and as long as you have enough data you can challenge a stage in another dimension, so you have a lot of freedom about progressing through the game!

The Dimensions are:

DB Hounds Base

Lost Island

Forgotten Castle

Mystic Forest

Frozen Palace

Alien Realm

FEARSOME ENEMIES

On every stage you will find wave after wave of dangerous enemies that you will have to defeat to be able to proceed to the next one, some of these critters are simple to deal with and some of them will require you to use certain tactics to crush them!
The different dimensions each will have their unique enemies, but you can also find special, “Irregular” version of basic enemies, that adapted to the different worlds, and are both stronger and harder!

Some of our enemies are:

Some examples of irregulars are:

POWERFULL BOSSES

At the end of every world you will find the cause of the calamity, a Dimension Buster, a supreme being. Defeating these is your biggest challenge, and doing so will always reward you with an amazing character!

After defeating all 30 stages and 6 Dimension Busters, you will have enough data to enter their Prime Dimension, and challenge the final and strongest Dimensional Buster in a duel!

Some of our bosses are:

 

 

$5000 – The game is fully funded! Thank you very much!

  • 24 characters
  • Arcade mode
  • 30 stages
  • 13 bosses
  • Special challenges
  • Survival mode

 

$7500 – Post game Content!

  • Super hard extra dimension with 5 new stages  (Total of  35)
  • All new enemies!
  • All new Bosses! (total of 15)
  • BOSS RUSH mode!
  • Special Survival coliseum
  • 4 extra characters (Total of 28!)

 

$10000 – OMEGA BOSSES AND BATTLE MECHS!

  • Small Robots that the player can hop into!

You will find the DB Mechs scattered through the levels and you might get one sent to you if you get a high combo! These mechs have their own health, different and cool ways of attacking and different abilities (some might hover, some might be faster, etc.)

  • All new Bosses! (total of 17)
  • Special OMEGA versions of some of the basic bosses!
  • Bestiary
  • Character profiles
  • 4 more characters (Total of 32!)

 

$12500 – Fully fledged Story mode, with cutscenes and dialogs!

  • Fully explorable DB Hounds base with the backer’s characters
  • Another Extra dimension with 5 new stages (Total of 40)
  • All new enemies!
  • 4 more characters (Total of 36!!!)

 

$15000 –Final Ultimate Challenge content!

  • CHARACTERS GRAPHICS OVERHAUL!!!!

DB Hounds was conceived with the idea of having LOTS of playable characters, which made us choose a somewhat minimalistic graphic style for our characters for practical purposes, however if we reach this goal, we’ll be able to go for more detailed, bigger and beautiful sprites!!!

  • Extra MEGA hard dimension with 10 Stages! (TOTAL OF 50)
  • New Ultimate Bosses! (TOTAL  OF 21)
  • More OMEGA versions of basic bosses!
  • 4 more characters (Total of 40!!!!)
  • 5 characters skins (selected by backers)
  • Special character episodes, with dialog, cutscenes and specific challenges!

 

$20000 – Impossible Goal!

  • Some characters will receive a special unlockable super powerful EX version (characters will be chosen by backers)
  • All bosses omega mode
  • 10  special skins
  • 5 more characters (Total of 45!!!!), these last 5 will be community created by  backers

 

 

 

 

  • $1 or more – Recruit

 Thank you very much! Your name will appear on the game’s credits.

 

  • $10 or more – Cadet

Thank you very much! You receive every reward up to this tier and a key of the game on steam when it’s released.

 

  • $30 or more –Soldier

Thank you very much! You receive every reward up to this tier and can send a photo of yourself; we will make a portrait of you and hide it somewhere in the game! It can also be found in the in-game gallery. You will appear as “Soldier” in the credits. (The portrait will be 25x25)

 

  • $50 or more –Captain

Thank you very very much! You receive every reward up to this tier and you can design an enemy and name it yourself! (the guidelines are in the FAQ). You will appear as “Captain” in the credits.

 

  • $75 or more –Colonel (30 available)

Thank you very very much! You receive every reward up to this tier and you can name a stage of the game (the guidelines are in the FAQ). You will appear as “Colonel” in the credits.

 

  •  $100 or more –Commander (20 available)

Thank you very very much! You receive every reward up to this tier (except naming a stage) and will be able to design your own playable character for the game (the guidelines are in the FAQ, but we are in general pretty open to anything you can think about) and our eternal gratitude. (These characters are extra, and different from the ones from the stretch goals.) You will appear as “Commander” in the credits.

 

  • $150 or more –Dimension Buster (10 available)

 Thank you very very very much! You receive every reward up to this tier (except naming a stage) and will be able to design your own boss for the game (the guidelines are in the FAQ). You will appear as “Dimension Buster” in the credits. (The portrait will be 50x50)

 

  • $200 or more –Omega Dimension Buster (6 available)

 Thank you very very very much! You receive every reward up to this tier (except naming a stage) and will be able to name a world of the game (this are the guidelines). You will appear as “Omega Dimension Buster” in the credits. (The portrait will be 75x75)

 

  • $500 or more –Supreme Master of all Dimensions (1 available)

Thank you very very much from the bottom of our very hearts! You receive every reward up to this tier (except naming a stage and world) and will be able to name the final boss of the game and the commander of DB Hounds (the guidelines are in the FAQ, but we are in general pretty open to anything you can think about) and our eternal gratitude. You will appear as Supreme Master of all Dimensions or whatever you want in the credits. (The portrait will be 75x75)

 


SPECIAL STATUES AND BUSTS:
There will be special statues and busts for the first backers that pledge over a certain amount!

First 6 backers to pledge 10 or more:  Bronze statues or Bronze bust (you can choose either one)

First 6 backers to pledge 20 or more: Silver statues or Silver bust (you can choose either one)

First 6 backers to pledge 50 or more: Gold statues or Gold bust (you can choose either one)

First backer to pledge 100 or more: 1 Giant Platinum statue

Note about portraits: They are going to be hidden in different places in stages, and also accessible through a gallery. Depending on the stage and the size of the portrait, it might be an image on a screen, a wanted poster, a painting, etc.

an example:

IF THE STORY MODE STRETCH GOAL IS REACHED ($12500): every backer from Soldier and up ($30) will have an NPC on the DB Hounds base with their name.

 

 

 

Masked Hero Studio Is a two-man effort, composed by Guillermo Barrionuevo (Programmer) and Franco Perez (Graphic Artist), two young college students from Argentina that have only dreamt of making games since they have use of memory. Having playing videogames since we could pick up a joystick or use a keyboard and up to this very day, to say that we love videogames is an understatement.

We decided on being game developers 3 years ago, and with 0 experience in the field and nothing but love and determination, we learnt little by little by our own mean how to actually make videogames, participating in a lot of game jams along the way. We each take care of our area of expertise, and all the other factors (game design, writing, etc.) are done by both of us together.

Now we finally feel ready to tackle or first official, commercial project together and we are extremely happy to present this campaign to you.

A little bit about us:

 

 

 

Being students from Argentina, publishing the game by ourselves is just completely out of our reach, that’s why we chose crowd funding as the mean to make our dream a reality.

With the money from the campaign we can sustain and devote ourselves full time to the project and finish it in a timely manner, buy new hardware (which we really need), pay for the game’s music and sounds and take care of all the publishing costs.

 

 

There is already a playable beta of the game, so you can try for yourself and see that we are fully capable of reaching our goals.

While this is the first commercial project we get our hands on, we are 100% set on making the best product we possibly can and deliver it on time. We have improved tremendously these last years and will hopefully continue to do so.

We love videogames, and we love making videogames, so we assure to do our best to make a videogame you can love too!

 

 

You can contact us here in our indiegogo account or in social media:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/masked_hero_st

Email: MaskedHeroStudio@gmail.com


Or you can join our discord server:  https://discord.gg/q5VpJXC

DB Hounds is a 2D coop-oriented action game where you and up to 3 friends fight waves after waves of enemies and destroy huge bosses, unlocking new and interesting characters along the way. With 30 stages, each one with a challenge, and over a dozen of characters to unlock, the game is jam-packed with content to enjoy!  

The Game’s EARLY BETA demo is out right now!  Download it here: https://masked-hero-studio.itch.io/db-hounds

Developer: Masker hero Studio
Platform: PC
Release date: 2019
Players: 1-4
 
 
Hordes of strange and powerful monsters started invading Earth! But it turns out that Earth wasn’t their only target. The “Dimension Busters”, huge beings that command an army of bizarre creatures, were invading not only Earth, but a lot of different Worlds in different Dimensions too.
An Inter-Dimensional organization to hunt down and dispose of these beings, the DB Hounds, was formed with select warriors from each Dimension, with their base on Planet Earth. Their job is clear: to go to any World that might be being invaded by the Dimension Busters, get rid of them, and recruit any warrior that might be willing to join the fight.
After destroying a Dimension Buster, we can use the remains to extract data about their Prime Dimension, after enough data has been collected we can transport to their own dimension and end this war once and for all!

 
Meet some of the NPCs that will guide you on your journey:


 
 
ARCADE
On every stage, there are many waves of incoming enemies to defeat, using the unique qualities of your character and cooperating with the other players, while evading any hazard that might be in place.
There are power ups and items that will help on surviving the waves, either dropped by the defeated enemies or provided by vending machines.
In the final wave there will be a boss to conquer, much powerful that the other enemies, once it is destroyed the stage will be completed. Clearing a stage will unlock new ones to try and might unlock new playable characters.
The player has a certain level of control about what stage to play next, so the game doesn’t need to be linear.
There are 6 dimensions with 5 stages each, on the final stage of every dimension there will be a Dimension Buster. After defeating all 6, the final boss , the biggest challenge in the game, will be accessible.

 
CHALLENGE
After any stage is defeated, a special “challenge mode” for that certain stage becomes available. The challenges vary wildly from stage to stage, like dealing with a super hard wave on a single room, replacing every enemy with one harder to kill, only being able to use bombs and all sorts of crazy things!  
These present a new world of challenge for those daring and skilled players that want a harder experience and some characters can only be unlocked by clearing certain challenges.
 

 
SURVIVAL
A special survival mode will be available for certain stages; here the players will face unending waves of monsters and bosses, trying to set a new record. This is the ultimate challenge of the game, as the waves will become progressively harder and eventually much harder than the normal game.  

 
 
24 PLAYABLE CHARACTERS
You start with 4 characters and soon you start unlocking more, either by beating a specific level or challenge.
Characters are different in many ways: having a distinctive look, health, speed and special recharge rate, however the biggest way characters differentiate from each other are their main attack and special.The main attack is their normal shoot ability, which varies wildy from one character to another and it’s what you will be using the most. The special is a unique ability which can have many different uses, whenever it is for helping the party or disposing of enemies.
 
Here are some of our characters:


6 DIMENSIONS WITH 30 STAGES IN TOTAL
Your mission to terminate Dimension Busters takes you to 6 different dimensions, each with a different look, feel, hazards and set of enemies.
Each dimension has 5 stages, and you don’t have to do them all in order, beating a stage will grant you Data, and as long as you have enough data you can challenge a stage in another dimension, so you have a lot of freedom about progressing through the game!
The Dimensions are:
DB Hounds Base

Lost Island

Forgotten Castle

Mystic Forest

Frozen Palace

Alien Realm

FEARSOME ENEMIES
On every stage you will find wave after wave of dangerous enemies that you will have to defeat to be able to proceed to the next one, some of these critters are simple to deal with and some of them will require you to use certain tactics to crush them!The different dimensions each will have their unique enemies, but you can also find special, “Irregular” version of basic enemies, that adapted to the different worlds, and are both stronger and harder!
Some of our enemies are:

Some examples of irregulars are:

POWERFULL BOSSES
At the end of every world you will find the cause of the calamity, a Dimension Buster, a supreme being. Defeating these is your biggest challenge, and doing so will always reward you with an amazing character!
After defeating all 30 stages and 6 Dimension Busters, you will have enough data to enter their Prime Dimension, and challenge the final and strongest Dimensional Buster in a duel!
Some of our bosses are:

13 bosses
Special challenges
Survival mode

Super hard extra dimension with 5 new stages  (Total of  35)

BOSS RUSH mode!

Small Robots that the player can hop into!

You will find the DB Mechs scattered through the levels and you might get one sent to you if you get a high combo! These mechs have their own health, different and cool ways of attacking and different abilities (some might hover, some might be faster, etc.)

All new Bosses! (total of 17)
Special OMEGA versions of some of the basic bosses!
Bestiary
Character profiles

Fully explorable DB Hounds base with the backer’s characters
Another Extra dimension with 5 new stages (Total of 40)

CHARACTERS GRAPHICS OVERHAUL!!!!

DB Hounds was conceived with the idea of having LOTS of playable characters, which made us choose a somewhat minimalistic graphic style for our characters for practical purposes, however if we reach this goal, we’ll be able to go for more detailed, bigger and beautiful sprites!!!

Special character episodes, with dialog, cutscenes and specific challenges!

Some characters will receive a special unlockable super powerful EX version (characters will be chosen by backers) 
All bosses omega mode

Thank you very much! You receive every reward up to this tier and a key of the game on steam when it’s released.

Thank you very much! You receive every reward up to this tier and can send a photo of yourself; we will make a portrait of you and hide it somewhere in the game! It can also be found in the in-game gallery. You will appear as “Soldier” in the credits. (The portrait will be 25x25)

(These characters are extra, and different from the ones from the stretch goals.) You will appear as “Commander” in the credits.
 
$150 or more –Dimension Buster (10 available)
 Thank you very very very much! You receive every reward up to this tier (except naming a stage) and will be able to design your own boss for the game (the guidelines are in the FAQ). You will appear as “Dimension Buster” in the credits. (The portrait will be 50x50)

 
$200 or more –Omega Dimension Buster (6 available)
 Thank you very very very much! You receive every reward up to this tier (except naming a stage) and will be able to name a world of the game (this are the guidelines). You will appear as “Omega Dimension Buster” in the credits. (The portrait will be 75x75)

 
$500 or more –Supreme Master of all Dimensions (1 available)
Thank you very very much from the bottom of our very hearts! You receive every reward up to this tier (except naming a stage and world) and will be able to name the final boss of the game and the commander of DB Hounds (the guidelines are in the FAQ, but we are in general pretty open to anything you can think about) and our eternal gratitude. You will appear as Supreme Master of all Dimensions or whatever you want in the credits. (The portrait will be 75x75)
 SPECIAL STATUES AND BUSTS: There will be special statues and busts for the first backers that pledge over a certain amount!First 6 backers to pledge 10 or more:  Bronze statues or Bronze bust (you can choose either one)First 6 backers to pledge 20 or more: Silver statues or Silver bust (you can choose either one)First 6 backers to pledge 50 or more: Gold statues or Gold bust (you can choose either one)First backer to pledge 100 or more: 1 Giant Platinum statueNote about portraits: They are going to be hidden in different places in stages, and also accessible through a gallery. Depending on the stage and the size of the portrait, it might be an image on a screen, a wanted poster, a painting, etc.an example:IF THE STORY MODE STRETCH GOAL IS REACHED ($12500): every backer from Soldier and up ($30) will have an NPC on the DB Hounds base with their name. 
 
 
Masked Hero Studio Is a two-man effort, composed by Guillermo Barrionuevo (Programmer) and Franco Perez (Graphic Artist), two young college students from Argentina that have only dreamt of making games since they have use of memory. Having playing videogames since we could pick up a joystick or use a keyboard and up to this very day, to say that we love videogames is an understatement.
We decided on being game developers 3 years ago, and with 0 experience in the field and nothing but love and determination, we learnt little by little by our own mean how to actually make videogames, participating in a lot of game jams along the way. We each take care of our area of expertise, and all the other factors (game design, writing, etc.) are done by both of us together.
Now we finally feel ready to tackle or first official, commercial project together and we are extremely happy to present this campaign to you.
A little bit about us:




 

 
 
Being students from Argentina, publishing the game by ourselves is just completely out of our reach, that’s why we chose crowd funding as the mean to make our dream a reality.
With the money from the campaign we can sustain and devote ourselves full time to the project and finish it in a timely manner, buy new hardware (which we really need), pay for the game’s music and sounds and take care of all the publishing costs.
 
 
There is already a playable beta of the game, so you can try for yourself and see that we are fully capable of reaching our goals.While this is the first commercial project we get our hands on, we are 100% set on making the best product we possibly can and deliver it on time. We have improved tremendously these last years and will hopefully continue to do so.We love videogames, and we love making videogames, so we assure to do our best to make a videogame you can love too! 
 
You can contact us here in our indiegogo account or in social media:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/masked_hero_st
Email: MaskedHeroStudio@gmail.com
Or you can join our discord server:  https://discord.gg/q5VpJXC

story:
Warleader - Tales of Heroes is approved for release on Steam !

 

A Quick Summary

Enter the battle: crush the enemy with devastating attacks and spectacular spells.

Command your troops: master the battlefield using highly diverse unit types.

Build your army: customize your forces, choose heroes and squads to join the fight.

Master your destiny: epic campaigns unfold one mission at a time; replay missions you liked and improve your odds in later battles

 

An unusual combination

  • action role-playing games meets squad tactics
  • fight as a powerful hero, use awesome attacks and spells
  • command squads of soldiers that help you achieve victory

Innovative campaigns

  • beat each mission once, then replay it to unlock powerful rewards or just for fun
  • customize your heroes, upgrade your squads, discover magical items and spells
  • many possible army compositions, none is perfect, none is useless

An episodic game

  • campaigns will be episodic, with episodes released regularly
  • each installment will add new missions, heroes, units, enemies and environments
  • your ideas and feedback will continuously shape the story and the game

The hard part is over

  • the core of the game is already working: you can play missions, one hero class and a few troops and enemies are in a demo that'll soon be available for download
  • the game has been approved by Steam Greenlight: big thanks to all our voters !
  • there will be bugs, polish may be lacking in some parts - your feedback is needed to make a game you'll love !
  • what's missing from the game are campaigns and customization: for this, your help is vital !

Warleader - Tales of Heroes is a passion project made for gamers, by a gamer. Its development is already very advanced and the game has been Greenlit by the Steam community. Now the time has come to build the team that will churn out missions, heroes, units, enemies.. and only your support can make that happen.

 

A Tale of War

The battle rages and you feel defeat is near. Though countless enemies are slain, still more keep coming. Your mastery of magic, your superhuman combat skills... they are not enough. Weakened, you fall back as the foes advance to deliver the final strike. But they will not win today, for your own legions are finally at hand !

Warriors thunder into position and raise their shields between you and the enemy, a wall of steel in harm's way. Elsewhere, heavy cavalry picks up speed and charges into the writhing enemy flank. Expert crossbowmen send screaming bolts into the enemy host and each strikes true. Behind it all, you direct your forces as the tide of battle begins to turn.

Your thirst for vengeance now takes over. With replenished strength you throw yourself into the fight. Again and again, enemies fall to your deadly blows. Powerful magic crackles and burns. Your emboldened warriors press the attack even more.

Then, suddenly, it is over. The great host has melted away and the day is yours. As the red mist clears, you prepare to take advantage of another battle won, another step forward in the great struggle...

 

About The Game

Warleader - Tales of Heroes is  a hybrid, a combination of genres. You've got your hero which you control directly on the battlefield, like in any action RPG. Your hero attacks enemies and uses spectacular special skills; if your hero dies, you've failed the mission.

But you're more than a hero: you're the warleader. You lead soldiers into battle and you use them to achieve victory. You spend scarce resources to reinforce your squads and control them like in any real-time strategy game.

In between battles, you reap the benefits of your efforts. From your victories, you gain experience and gold which you use to improve your forces. Both your heroes and your squads level up and get upgrades; you unlock more weapons and armor for your heroes, more squads and even other heroes that join your warband.

All this allows you to tailor your army to the mission at hand and to your personal preference. You pick which hero fights the next battle and what troops will be available. Maybe you will use the Sorceress to rain death from a distance, with a line of Swordsmen defending you from harm. Or perhaps, with the Assassin, you will weaken the enemy before heavy cavalry ride them down. Or stand fast as a Shieldmaiden while crossbowmen pick off the enemy one by one ? Each combination has strengths and weaknesses, each can bring victory, each can fail epically.

In this game, you will play freeform campaigns where progression through the storyline happens only as and when you choose. All missions contribute to the storyline the first time you win them, but then they can be repeated any number of times so you can try to achieve all their bonus objectives and unlock all rewards. You can rush through the campaign without replaying a single mission or you can farm out each and every reward until your army is unstoppable: the choice is yours alone.

Each campaign will have its own epic storyline, as your band of unlikely heroes and faithful soldiers defy the odds again and again. The world is shattered and divided, and each campaign will happen in a different setting, with different heroes and unit types. Indeed, you'll be using units and heroes in one campaign, which you've faced as enemies in some other... although maybe not exactly the same ? Only time and your feedback can decide !

 

 

What's the Plan ?

This game is currently a one-man job. I've come up with the concept, designed, programmed and playtested a working gameplay demo. I have outsourced art and I am fortunate to have friends with Extreme Awesomeness +10 who helped me enormously; without their skill and effort, none of this would be possible.

Yet, to make a game like Warleader - Tales of Heroes, it takes more than that. This game requires a team of experienced developers: programmers, artists and designers working full-time to make it happen. And to put that crack team together, I need your help.

So far, this project has been entirely self-funded. A demo mission is almost ready for release, which will showcase just what a mission in Warleader - Tales of Heroes will look and feel like. The gameplay is pretty much final, the visual effects as well, combat balancing and tuning are in progress and getting there.

Now, with your help, we'll build the team that churns out missions and campaigns for you to play. Each campaign will be available to purchase on Steam, one episode at a time, as soon as they are finished. Depending on your contribution, you will receive free early access, Steam keys to the first few chapters, to the first campaign or even to everything we will ever make !

 

 

Into the Future

The initial funding goal will pay for the creation of a great team that will make the first chapter of the first campaign. But if you like this game and want to see more, here are some stretch goals you might like !

If we hit $110,000, we will have both genders for each hero class. While the Crusaders are an exclusive order of warrior monks, women have been known to rise in their ranks, defying danger and prejudice alike; Shieldmaidens have their male counterparts, the mighty Shieldbearers that live to defend their people from harm; and so on, each class will no longer be gender-locked, without breaking the world's coherence and atmosphere.

If, again with your support, we hit $125,000, troops of various other races will make an appearance. You'll be able to choose what kind of army you want: a monolithic host of uniform origin and character, or a gathering of many kinds of warriors, fighting together for survival and glory ?

If we manage to hit $150,000 we will add my own personal favorite: free cosmetic customization for all units and items in the game. We'll add skins to each hero and unit, available to all players at no additional cost. You will choose what your army looks like, and you'll be able to paint it too ! Fancy a purple glow on the Crusader's sword ? Will the Warlord ride a bay or a chestnut destrier ? Or maybe a ghostly mount of mist and shadow ? Whatever you prefer.

There are more ideas for improvements to the game. Also, and this is very important, your input is extremely valuable ! Useful ideas will be rewarded with the "Knight Commander" perk for free, which will allow you free access to any and all content we release for this game ! So brainstorm on and let us hear from you !

 

 

Your Turn !

We are super grateful if you choose to support this game. But there are many more ways you can help make this game a reality:

Spread the word ! Sharing is caring: you can help us a lot by sharing our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, etc. The more buzz we build around Warleader - Tales of Heroes, the bigger the chances to get it funded and into your hands.

Give us a piece of your mind ! Our end goal is to make a game that you want to play. We welcome your comments, as well as emails and any other way that you can send us your ideas and feedback.

Finally, I'd like to add a special word of thanks to everyone who helped take this project this far. Everyone who spared a few hours of their time to contribute, each Steam user who voted for us on Greenlight, each and every one of you who supports us and helps this game along... in the end, this is your game and it'll be great !

Thank you !

story:
First "free-to-play" genre parody!

 

Yes, VideoPirate is about establishing and running your own video salon.

No, VideoPirate is not one more "farm","cafe", "airport" or other "free-to-play" sh*t.

Moreover, VideoPirate is the first “farm-games” genre parody.

 

Plot and idea

It is mid-80s and you have just establishe your own video salon!

But there is one huge problem: you don't have movie to rent out yet.

Gamer has to tune in different channels and create movies made of previously unrelated scenes.

 

Innovative mechanics

 

 

VideoPirate game is going to be “as mobile as it gets”.

VideoPirate combines few genres such as strategy, simulator and hidden object

with a creative accelerometer- based game mechanics.

 

Moviegoers eye candy

VideoPirate brings us back to a 80s-90s VHS-era while

gamer launches his own videosalon with agenda to become a major studio boss someday.

While VideoPirate is full of vibrant original pixel-styled content it has lots of easter eggs

for hardcore moviegoers.

 

Creative and funny

VideoPirate offers enourmous options and endings of each movie created by a gamer

during a gameplay. 

Even if a gamer makes a mistake or a false level execution there would be no regrets because of 

hilarious pixel-movies gamer can create, enjoy and share.

VideoPirate combines few genres such as strategy, simulator and hidden object
with a creative accelerometer- based game mechanics.
 

Moviegoers eye candy
VideoPirate brings us back to a 80s-90s VHS-era while
gamer launches his own videosalon with agenda to become a major studio boss someday.
While VideoPirate is full of vibrant original pixel-styled content it has lots of easter eggs
for hardcore moviegoers.
 

Creative and funny
VideoPirate offers enourmous options and endings of each movie created by a gamer
during a gameplay. 
Even if a gamer makes a mistake or a false level execution there would be no regrets because of 
hilarious pixel-movies gamer can create, enjoy and share.

story:
Short Summary

How your contributions will help:

  • My name is Josh Trino. I have been designing and learning programming on my own for 5 years now. I can now proudly say I have learned a multitude of coding languages after hard work.
  • I have been working as many hours as I can put into it for almost a year now. I have made great progress and feel it is time to display and see if it has appeal!
  • All contributions are greatly appreciated. They will be going to fine tuning animations and giving the game a better overall professional feel. Cutscenes etc. Along with this, reaching my goal means I am able to release on Steam, XBOX and PS4!!

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • I am looking for $3,000 as a goal. This Will help with beautiful animations and the ability to put our game on the console store. 
  • ALL Contributors of $10 and up will receive an early release and their name in the credits if they would like, as a contributor. Greater donations of $100 and above will have voting rights in what they may want to see in an episode, naming the game and all following DLC content.
  • ALL funds will be used along with my own to make this happen.

The Impact

  • I feel this is a very unique concept that is not a one dimensional game. The player is taken on a ride that only great writing and thought and work can provide.
  • I currently have my Google Developers License and have released multiple small games on the app store.
  • I've finally reached a point in the game that I feel it is time to share with the world and see the response!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Just simply get the word out and make some noise about the game!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for reading and more of all, your consideration!

story:
My name is Damien and I am a Freelance Mobile Game Developer, My day to day business involves building custom games for clients all over the world and I love every bit of my working day. In my job, I get asked frequently, how do I promote my app?, how do I get it noticed?, how do I get more downloads? Well the answer is to stand out from the crowd and that is what this Indiegogo project is about to do.

Outside The Box Marketing is a start up business designed specifically for the app download market. Placing your app icon directly in the hands of excited beings on the most joyful day of the year. Holiday Gift wrap!

Whats the business plan? The idea behind this new concept is to get your app some extra special exposure. giftAPPing.com will become the home of the new marketing company and we will sell adverting space in the form of your app icon and professionally print it on some luxurious wrapping paper. The gift wrap will then be distributed through outlets including mobile phone stores, shopping malls and other venues that are specific to the mobile market. Giving your icon the direct exposure it needs to generate some serious downloads.

So why do I need Indiegogo to launch such a business?
Indiegogo is great to reach out to a large audience and spread the word. Using indiegogo to launch this will allow me to reach out to developers all over the world using its network of pledgers and allow me to launch this with as little as 100 advertisers. With this in mind, I am able to bring the product to the table for as little as $35 per advertiser and launch this in time for Christmas 2016. Thats a saving of 60% off the retail price!

Where are we in terms of set up?
I have already designed the background and icon templates, website is built and ready to go, all artwork is print shop ready and print supplier sourced. All I need is your icon and your word of mouth and we are ready to go!

So what do I get in return for my Indiegogo pledge?
In return for your pledge, you will have your app icon printed on 3000 sheets of gift wrap. Depending on your pledge, you will receive 10-30 sheets of the paper for your own use delivered to your door (worldwide) ready in time for Christmas 2016.

Funding Goals:

4000 - Campaign success and pledges listed will be fulfilled

5000 - Additional Gift Tags! You will receive a Gift Tag per sheet

7000 - Additional Gift Wrap! Your icon will be printed on 4000 sheets and you will receive an extra 5 sheets per pledge plus gift tags!

10000 - Double rewards! Double Gift Wrap, Double Gift Tags and printed on 6000 sheets!

What next?
Make your pledge, select your reward and ill be in touch to collect your icon!
Please also don't forget to share this campaign with your friends, the more successful it is, the more rewards you will receive!
