story:
About Topsy: our Amazing Team & Unique Culture

Topsy Games is a lean startup in the mobile gaming space, with grand visions. We aim to be a world leading game development company, and with your support we will positively disrupt the gaming industry. Our amazing team of artists and developers have formed an what we believe is the best possible startup culture, entirely focused on you.

Our team puts your user experience first, and we do that by putting our dreams and ideas into practice through innovation & disruption whis is the heart & soul of our focus; leveraging our great ideas and our unique approach to game design & development, and the integration of digital currencies like Bitcoin, into mobile gaming.

When you play Kings vs Queens, you will instantly see that we have handcrafted every single aspect & element of this game, with the greatest possible Love, Passion, Creativity and Dedication, to give you an amazing and unique user experience.

If you have a strong mind and a soft heart like our giant in Kings vs Queens, we ask that you join us and please support this campagin - help us take this game to the world, we want you to be part of this amazing project, we want you to come with us on this exciting journey.

Kings vs Queens

An EPIC mobile strategy game that you will love and play for very long time. We put User Experience at the core and center of our focus and attention to deliver a high quality product to our respected user and  ensure they love it and play it for many days to come.

 

 

 

Once upon a time, in a cyber space universe far far away, there was a magical kingdom lead by a legendary King and beautiful Queen. Unfortunately although life in the kingdom appeared blissfully peaceful from the outside, over time the King and Queen inevitably fell out of love due to constant arguements and bickering about who was more powerful, who was the most intelligent, and who was best suited to wear the crown and lead the kingdom.

 

Our beautiful Queen, an insanely smart, super confident leader with a love for her people, and a life long passion for improving life in her kingdom, was a little naive in some aspects of political life, but when angered - you don't want to be the one standing in her way! She is fierce, loyal and skilled with a mace, and her eyebrows are the stuff of legend and are an important tool of expression - one frown can convey a very clear message mere mortals from far and wide.

Our legendary King, famous for his leadership and prowess on the battlefield, is as you might expect, a firecely narcissistic character, he's very full of himself and he has an ego the size of a planet. He is as famous for his sword skills in battle, as he is for stopping in front of every shiny reflective surface to flex his muscles and admire his ripped physique.

 

 

As are so many kings, ours is brave in a kinda stupid way, in typical male style, he just charges at things because he knows he is too good to be killed in the battlefield, with the view that he is destined for great things and legendary deeds. Throughout the kingdom he's known for saying out loud to anyone who will listen "I'm the most handsome and most powerful person in this kingdome".

 

 

One day the King and Queen were yet again arguing fiercely and loudly with each other in the throne chamber of the castle, yet again about who did something wrong, who got it right and who should lead the kingdom. But this time the argument ended in the inevitable decision that they should separate, and go their own ways before they did something terrible to each other or their loyal subjects.

After years of bickering and arguing, the inevitable happened and they finally decided to go their own ways, to go off and build their own Kingdoms, to engage in epic battles, and finaly prove once and for all, to the each other and their clans, just who really was the strongest, the most intelligent, and the greatest leader in the kingdom.

They have been separated and each of them decided to start their own kingdom and build their own empire. At the beginning of the game, you'll are given option the select your side and lead the army of your choice.

 

So now that you know the background of the story let us introduce you to our company, our team, and our technology and why you should join us by backing our campaign and coming along with us on this exciting journey and in turn recieving your personal rewards in the process.

 

Influencer Early Access Programme

So you’ve invested time & effort in developing a loyal community of followers across social media, youtube, forums or blogs? We salute you! We admire your drive & we would love to work with you.

Join our early access Influencer Programme and get to work closely with our developers, designers, and  gain early access to the latest editions of Kings vs Queens in return for advertising and promotion of the game.

If you think you have what it takes to be an Influencer, and are interested in participating in our early access Influencer Programme, we would love to hear from you - please register your interest now with an email to influencers@topsygames.com

 

Game Engine

We are developing this amazing game using Unity Game Engine.

Platform Availability

For the initial release we are making the game available on both iOS and Android devices; moving forward we do plan to make it available on other platforms depending on player demand.

    

 

 

The Game

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Rules of Battle

Despite their separation, the King and Queen were not crazy and both still shared a sense of fair play. So to ensure there was no possible risk of either of them claiming the other had gained an unfair advantage in any Battle, they both agreed on common set of rules of engagement and both agreed to play fairly and adhere to the rules at all times. Those rules are:

 

Rule #1
Your most valuable asset is the Town Hall, if an attacker destroys an opponents Town Hall, the attacker is considered to be the winner and is awarded the Town Hall Destruction medal (shown above).

 

Rule #2
An attacker must to inflict more than 50% damage upon the opponents Kingdom in order to be a winner; if you inflict damage between 50% and 75%, you will also receive the Bronze Medal of honor (shown above).

 

Rule #3
Any attacker who inflicts more than 75% damage, and less than 100% damage, will be awarded a Silver medal (shown above).

 

Rule #4
Any attacker who inflicts 100% damage, will be awarded the Total Destruction Gold medal; this medal comes with VIP Points which allow you upgrade your VIP status (shown above).

 

Rule #5
Depending on the level of  opponent's Town Hall, if you inflict 100% damage within 90 to 120 seconds, you will receive the Rapid Destruction medal, as well as VIP points (shown above). Timing of any damage inflicted is subject to change during updates and are based on a player's feedback.

 

Building your Kingdom

Upon seperationg, the King and Queen immediately began building their own Kingdoms. They both decided to select an area of land with magical properties, which can rebuild any damaged building (called the Terrain), but before building anything, they have to remove a set of obstacles to then be able to start building.

They each soon discovered that building their respective kingdoms was not an easy job, and not one which could be completed alone. They quickly learn that they need help. Luckily a group of resident Goblins offered to join in the challenge, to help remove the many obstacles, and construct new buildings, but would only agree to do this work in return for a Goblins most prized delecacy, magic Clovers, which help Goblins to energize themselves so they can quickly finish the work they undertake for either the King or Queen.

 

The Builder's hut

You will quickly learn that Goblins and Villagers are settled in the builder's hut. Your villagers collect Clovers for the Goblins, to incentivise them to work faster.

 

The Town Hall

As you would expect, your Town Hall is your Command Center, everything is centered around your town Hall. The Town Hall is the main building of each kingdom, not only because it is the command center, but also because by upgrading it you can unlock new features, building and knowledge.

There is a huge dependency on this building and its level; more importantly, in every battle as soon as you destroy the opponent's Town Hall you get one star and you are considered winner while continuing the remaining battle time making more damages for more stars.

During the battle, if attacker destroys your Town Hall, you' lose the battle and if you destroy opponent's Town Hall, you'll win the battle.

As you upgrade the Town Hall, you'll unlock new troops and new features. 

 

The Barracks

Your Barracks are where you train your troops; you can have more than one depending on the level of your Town Hall. As you play, you can upgrade your Barracks to unlock new Troops and increase the training queue of your barrack.

 

Army Camp

Your Army Camp is where your trained troop will gather together to get ready for you to take them to the battle. population of your army is controlled by level of your Army Camps; upgrade your Army Camps to increase population of your army.

 

Blacksmith

You'll need to upgrade your troop's Armor and Attack Power; we designed Blacksmith that you can use to upgrade your troops and make your army stronger; as you upgrade your Blacksmith new troops upgrades will become available. 

 

Troops

Mighty Knight: He is a narcissistic individual, fond of himself and with big ego. He is the type that will flex his muscles in the mirror. Think Johnny Bravo - type.

He is brave in a kinda stupid way - he just charges at things because he knows he is too good to be killed at the battlefield. He is destined for legendary deeds. 
 

 

 

Dwarf: He's a dwarf and when you are born a dwarf, there are only couple of occupations you can choose in life - and they all focus on gold and treasures. Started his career as a jeweler but discovered he is way too energetic for life behind the desk. He ditched his job, trained for couple of months, made himself a one-of-a-kind shoes... and became a professional thief. Not many people expect his speed and sneakiness. Those people pay the price. 


 

 

Paladin: Paladin is a confident character, with an internal need of making world better. She is kinda naive in some aspects of life, but when angered - don't stand in her way!

Fierce, loyal to her Queen and skilled with her mace (seriously, this thing is HEAVY). Her brows are important tool of expression (think: Emilia Clarke reference). 

 

Red: sometimes called Redei, Oh, what a nice child you are! Where is your mum? Oh, you are all by yourself here? Please be careful. Have this candy, bye! Wait, where is my wallet? 
You'd never suspect her and that's her selling point. She knows her assets and she knows her business. I know, I know, children are growing too fast these days. And they are way too clever.
She is still a kid though. She has a weak spot for long midday naps and stuffed toy animals.
Her favorite are dogs and wolves. 
 

Ranger:  Ranger is one of those girls that always bump into something. You know, the one that will always have bruises on her elbows and knees, knock the polka-patterned vase you like and smash your mug that you kinda liked but not that much. The fact that her fringe is obscuring her eyes might be a factor.She loves animals and can befriend beasts that would scare others. She's the outdoor type. 

 

Viking: “Sweet girl that you don't want to cross” would be probably the best description. She likes pretty dresses, makeup and flowers but her occupation as warrior prevents her from manifesting this as much as she would like to.

She's tough and reliable for her friends. And, boy, she can really swing that hammer of hers!

The bear's name is Bojo and people are joking he should have been born a panda bear - he likes to munch on veggies and is kinda slow. Watch out during a fight though! 


 

 

Barbarian: Not very intelligent, this one. You can kinda tell when looking at his face. Big forehead, small eyes, forward jaw. He should have been born in times where muscles were all that mattered (so, I guess, 80s?). He likes crude clothes and jewelry, preferably made from parts of his dead enemies. Only one thing was able to penetrate his thick skull and discover the fragile heart within - it happened the moment he saw the Viking for the first time. 

 

 

 

 

 

Wrecker: Wrecker is...ah, hard to describe. It's not that he likes destroying things, nothing simple and crude like that. I guess he is just very angry at, well, most of the world.

He's not young but his speed and toughness will surprise you. He is like the living memory of this old neighbor that you were underestimating and making fun of while being a kid until you accidentally hit his window while playing.

You know what this big, green guy says? "That's my secret, I'm always angry".
I think it fits Wrecker very much.

 

 


 

 

Boomer:  Sweets is the girl that dresses as if Halloween is a year-round event. She's in love with candy-themed stuff, cute dresses, striped stockings, bright colored hair...oh, and explosives.

Mind you, she likes her explosions to be pretty too. That's why she spends a lot of time designing them so you really want to keep the distance from her workshop. The New Year fireworks are majestic though. 

And she's not crazy, if that is what first look is telling you. She's just...very focused on things that sparkle and have potential to destroy a city.

 

Dragon and Squire: Young, scared of his steed (hey, it’s a dragon!), inexperienced. Big front teeth. He is a squire of the Knight. Looks up to the Knight and wants to be like him, despite already handling much more (he is riding a DRAGON, remember?). Knight is very happy with the fact that the Squire admires him and wants to keep it that way. He will show the Squire (mostly useless) tricks like throwing his sword up in the air and catching it (barely). Squire would sit on the grass and his eyes would be all shiny because Knight is such a hero for him. Knight is afraid of the dragon, that’s why he makes Squire do the job. He will never admit that Squire is doing it great, because he wants to keep Squire admiration - it feeds his vanity, so Squire doesn’t really believe in himself.

The Dragon - angry, mean beast. It will use every opportunity to try to escape or play a trick on the Squire, because it thinks he’s annoying. Much like a horse when it decides it doesn’t like you, but stronger and breathing fire.

 

The Summoner:  Nobody really know who and what Wizard is. There must be a face somewhere below his hood, right? Right? And did anyone ever heard him talk?

Actually, yes. Wizard likes to talk and likes for people to listen to him. He will give a lot of advice, mostly unsolicited. Lots of topics too, from mechanics of best swordfight style to preferable way of peeling potatoes.

People will roll their eyes when he’s mentioned but will listen when he talks to them, because they fear of being turned into frogs. He can do pretty powerful magic, that Wizard.

His magic is a little out of this world - rays of light and green lighting
 

The Witch:  Born with power to control the Fire, she grew up with not a lot of friends, because people were scared. She is very confident, even cocky, because of her (reasonable) belief she is able to defend herself. Likes to show her abilities. Kinda vain too, very obsessed with her looks. She eats only veggies and nobody really knows where does her strength really comes from.

Deeper inside, she wants some people to acknowledge and like her - this is why she is very proud of her companions and will fight by their side till the very end.

Quote: “Fire, walk with me”


 

And many more unique and amazing characters, some of which will be designed by help from our respected Backers.

 

The Power of Magic

We blended the power of troops with power of great and powerful magics that you can leverage to increase the power of your army and increase your chance of winning.

 

Magic Hall

You prepare the magics in magic hall, upgrade your magic hall to unlock new magics and to increase the speed and queue of the magics.

 

Magic Spells

we tailored great and powerful magics for the game play to increase the fun and power of your army.

 

Temple

This magical building is used to upgrade the power of your magics; make sure to build and upgrade it to unlock new magic upgrades and increase the power f our magics.

 

Defense Units

We game you any kind of defense unit you may need to protect your kingdom from Cannon to Mortar to Air Defense, Ground and Air Bombs, Archer Tower, Freeze Tower, Lighting Tower, Walls and more to come in the updates.

Upgrade your defense units to increase their Attack Power and HitPoints, make them stronger against enemy attacks to  protect your Kingdom.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Traps

We added traps in the game, so you can trap the enemy troops and defend your village against their raid.  you have all kind of options, hidden bombs, freeze trap, fire trap, so feel free to learn them a lesson, freeze them, burn them, toast them, ??????? and wait for more new Traps to come.

 

 

 

The Kingdom is now in your capable hands and smart brain; implement a great strategy to protect your Kingdom, attack your enemies and move up to the ladder of leader board for our great prizes.

 

Empire & Empire Castle

Nothing is more important than teaming up with great players and establish your great Empire; it all starts with your Empire Castle, build it and establish your Empire.

 

You can support your alliance by sending them troops and magics to help them protect their kingdom and to increase the power and strengths of their army. 

 

Empire

You Can build an Empire to invite your friends and alliances to the Empire, together you can fight against other alliances and Empire for pride and victory.  

Create your own Empire or join an existing Empire.

Search the existing Empires based on many different factors and find the one that suits you to join.

 

Or Create your own Empire from scratch and lead others to join your Empire and team up together for success:

Design a stunning and stylish flag for your empire; so everyone can recognize your Empire.

 

 

Game Economy

Gold

Collect Gold from unlimited underground resources by building and upgrading your gold mines; you can also collect golds in the battler by attacking opponent's gold mine and gold storage. You can use Gold to:

  • Upgrade your Town Hall
  • Build and upgrade your defense units
  • Find an Opponent 
  • Upgrade your traps

Gold Mine:

Build and upgrade them to collect Gold from underground resources.

 

Gold Storage:

Store your gold in the storage and keep them safe from Dwarf and Redei; thy just look for your Gold and Mana.

 

 

You can also buy clovers in different packs from the shop to speed up their building and upgrade process, or you can watch optional ads to get extra clovers without spending money.

 

A gist of User Interface:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our talented and committed team is partnered with few different talented studios for finishing the touches of game art and it's trailer to bring you the best and most amazing game and user experience. 

 

3D Brigade

3D Brigade is a creative studio trusted by many different big names in Gaming industry including but not limited to EA (Electronic Arts), Microsoft, Activision, UbiSoft and Disney; 3D Brigade's talented artists are working with us on texturing the buildings, texturing the characters for sprite animations and animating the troops for creating the troops sprite animations. 

 

Gold Tooth Creative

Gold Tooth Creative is a creative and talented studio based on Vancouver that is currenctly helping us for making great promotional images and creating the game trailer. Gold Tooth Creative is trusted by many of the big brands you may know including but not limited to Machine Zone, Activision, CAPCOM, Disney, Disney and many more; watch some of their cool and great game trailers below; we will be working with them to make the  game trailers for Kings vs Queens.

 

 

Sound FX & Music

Legendary producer Greg Dombrowski will produce musics of the game; checkout his portfolio at www.secessionstudios.com/ and some of his works here. 
We are also giving you a copy of Greg's Lock Buster Music tracks to our backers to enjoy plus it's ring tone.

 

Principal Audio

Principal Audio is also working with to produce the game sound effects (SFX) and some of the musics. Here's an example of their work for your review:

 

 

You can see their complete portfolio on their website at http://principleaudio.com/en/ 

With these amazing partnerships working with our talented and experienced team, we are focused on delivering the best mobile strategy game you've ever played.

 

 

Fortunately the precedent of funds it’s pretty straightforward: virtually all of the initial $500,000 will go into developing the game, with the exception of the 8% we need to pay for IndieGoGo service fees.

 

 

From the total amount, $40,000 will go to IndieGoGo for their platform services and  transaction fees; the remaining amount of $460,000 will be spend on finishing and publishing Kings vs Queens, this includes:

  • Finishing final stages of product development
  • Finishing 3D modeling, texturing and animating of the remaining troops
  • Remaining In Game Visual Effects
  • Finishing and Rendering Game Logo
  • Localization 
  • Finalizing SFX and Musics
  • Pre-Production Testing and QA
  • Publishing 

 

 

 

 

Toe Dipper

$5: Wallpapers

Show you for your support, we’ll send you a set of limited edition and beautiful wallpapers to decorate your desktop with.

 

Supporter

Show you for your support,  we will send you a set of limited edition and beautiful wallpapers to decorate your desktop with plus the Block Buster music track produced by legendary sound producer Greg.

 

 

Advocate

  • Limited Edition Wallpapers

  • Kings vs Queen Ring Tone

About Topsy: our Amazing Team & Unique CultureTopsy Games is a lean startup in the mobile gaming space, with grand visions. We aim to be a world leading game development company, and with your support we will positively disrupt the gaming industry. Our amazing team of artists and developers have formed an what we believe is the best possible startup culture, entirely focused on you.Our team puts your user experience first, and we do that by putting our dreams and ideas into practice through innovation & disruption whis is the heart & soul of our focus; leveraging our great ideas and our unique approach to game design & development, and the integration of digital currencies like Bitcoin, into mobile gaming.When you play Kings vs Queens, you will instantly see that we have handcrafted every single aspect & element of this game, with the greatest possible Love, Passion, Creativity and Dedication, to give you an amazing and unique user experience.If you have a strong mind and a soft heart like our giant in Kings vs Queens, we ask that you join us and please support this campagin - help us take this game to the world, we want you to be part of this amazing project, we want you to come with us on this exciting journey.Kings vs QueensAn EPIC mobile strategy game that you will love and play for very long time. We put User Experience at the core and center of our focus and attention to deliver a high quality product to our respected user and  ensure they love it and play it for many days to come.   Once upon a time, in a cyber space universe far far away, there was a magical kingdom lead by a legendary King and beautiful Queen. Unfortunately although life in the kingdom appeared blissfully peaceful from the outside, over time the King and Queen inevitably fell out of love due to constant arguements and bickering about who was more powerful, who was the most intelligent, and who was best suited to wear the crown and lead the kingdom. Our beautiful Queen, an insanely smart, super confident leader with a love for her people, and a life long passion for improving life in her kingdom, was a little naive in some aspects of political life, but when angered - you don't want to be the one standing in her way! She is fierce, loyal and skilled with a mace, and her eyebrows are the stuff of legend and are an important tool of expression - one frown can convey a very clear message mere mortals from far and wide.Our legendary King, famous for his leadership and prowess on the battlefield, is as you might expect, a firecely narcissistic character, he's very full of himself and he has an ego the size of a planet. He is as famous for his sword skills in battle, as he is for stopping in front of every shiny reflective surface to flex his muscles and admire his ripped physique.  As are so many kings, ours is brave in a kinda stupid way, in typical male style, he just charges at things because he knows he is too good to be killed in the battlefield, with the view that he is destined for great things and legendary deeds. Throughout the kingdom he's known for saying out loud to anyone who will listen "I'm the most handsome and most powerful person in this kingdome".  One day the King and Queen were yet again arguing fiercely and loudly with each other in the throne chamber of the castle, yet again about who did something wrong, who got it right and who should lead the kingdom. But this time the argument ended in the inevitable decision that they should separate, and go their own ways before they did something terrible to each other or their loyal subjects.After years of bickering and arguing, the inevitable happened and they finally decided to go their own ways, to go off and build their own Kingdoms, to engage in epic battles, and finaly prove once and for all, to the each other and their clans, just who really was the strongest, the most intelligent, and the greatest leader in the kingdom.They have been separated and each of them decided to start their own kingdom and build their own empire. At the beginning of the game, you'll are given option the select your side and lead the army of your choice. So now that you know the background of the story let us introduce you to our company, our team, and our technology and why you should join us by backing our campaign and coming along with us on this exciting journey and in turn recieving your personal rewards in the process. Influencer Early Access ProgrammeSo you’ve invested time & effort in developing a loyal community of followers across social media, youtube, forums or blogs? We salute you! We admire your drive & we would love to work with you.Join our early access Influencer Programme and get to work closely with our developers, designers, and  gain early access to the latest editions of Kings vs Queens in return for advertising and promotion of the game.If you think you have what it takes to be an Influencer, and are interested in participating in our early access Influencer Programme, we would love to hear from you - please register your interest now with an email to influencers@topsygames.com Game EngineWe are developing this amazing game using Unity Game Engine.Platform AvailabilityFor the initial release we are making the game available on both iOS and Android devices; moving forward we do plan to make it available on other platforms depending on player demand.      The Game      The Rules of BattleDespite their separation, the King and Queen were not crazy and both still shared a sense of fair play. So to ensure there was no possible risk of either of them claiming the other had gained an unfair advantage in any Battle, they both agreed on common set of rules of engagement and both agreed to play fairly and adhere to the rules at all times. Those rules are: Rule #1Your most valuable asset is the Town Hall, if an attacker destroys an opponents Town Hall, the attacker is considered to be the winner and is awarded the Town Hall Destruction medal (shown above). Rule #2An attacker must to inflict more than 50% damage upon the opponents Kingdom in order to be a winner; if you inflict damage between 50% and 75%, you will also receive the Bronze Medal of honor (shown above). Rule #3Any attacker who inflicts more than 75% damage, and less than 100% damage, will be awarded a Silver medal (shown above). Rule #4Any attacker who inflicts 100% damage, will be awarded the Total Destruction Gold medal; this medal comes with VIP Points which allow you upgrade your VIP status (shown above). Rule #5Depending on the level of  opponent's Town Hall, if you inflict 100% damage within 90 to 120 seconds, you will receive the Rapid Destruction medal, as well as VIP points (shown above). Timing of any damage inflicted is subject to change during updates and are based on a player's feedback. Building your KingdomUpon seperationg, the King and Queen immediately began building their own Kingdoms. They both decided to select an area of land with magical properties, which can rebuild any damaged building (called the Terrain), but before building anything, they have to remove a set of obstacles to then be able to start building.They each soon discovered that building their respective kingdoms was not an easy job, and not one which could be completed alone. They quickly learn that they need help. Luckily a group of resident Goblins offered to join in the challenge, to help remove the many obstacles, and construct new buildings, but would only agree to do this work in return for a Goblins most prized delecacy, magic Clovers, which help Goblins to energize themselves so they can quickly finish the work they undertake for either the King or Queen. The Builder's hutYou will quickly learn that Goblins and Villagers are settled in the builder's hut. Your villagers collect Clovers for the Goblins, to incentivise them to work faster. The Town HallAs you would expect, your Town Hall is your Command Center, everything is centered around your town Hall. The Town Hall is the main building of each kingdom, not only because it is the command center, but also because by upgrading it you can unlock new features, building and knowledge.There is a huge dependency on this building and its level; more importantly, in every battle as soon as you destroy the opponent's Town Hall you get one star and you are considered winner while continuing the remaining battle time making more damages for more stars.During the battle, if attacker destroys your Town Hall, you' lose the battle and if you destroy opponent's Town Hall, you'll win the battle.As you upgrade the Town Hall, you'll unlock new troops and new features.  The BarracksYour Barracks are where you train your troops; you can have more than one depending on the level of your Town Hall. As you play, you can upgrade your Barracks to unlock new Troops and increase the training queue of your barrack. Army CampYour Army Camp is where your trained troop will gather together to get ready for you to take them to the battle. population of your army is controlled by level of your Army Camps; upgrade your Army Camps to increase population of your army. BlacksmithYou'll need to upgrade your troop's Armor and Attack Power; we designed Blacksmith that you can use to upgrade your troops and make your army stronger; as you upgrade your Blacksmith new troops upgrades will become available.  TroopsMighty Knight: He is a narcissistic individual, fond of himself and with big ego. He is the type that will flex his muscles in the mirror. Think Johnny Bravo - type.He is brave in a kinda stupid way - he just charges at things because he knows he is too good to be killed at the battlefield. He is destined for legendary deeds.    Dwarf: He's a dwarf and when you are born a dwarf, there are only couple of occupations you can choose in life - and they all focus on gold and treasures. Started his career as a jeweler but discovered he is way too energetic for life behind the desk. He ditched his job, trained for couple of months, made himself a one-of-a-kind shoes... and became a professional thief. Not many people expect his speed and sneakiness. Those people pay the price.   Paladin: Paladin is a confident character, with an internal need of making world better. She is kinda naive in some aspects of life, but when angered - don't stand in her way!Fierce, loyal to her Queen and skilled with her mace (seriously, this thing is HEAVY). Her brows are important tool of expression (think: Emilia Clarke reference).  Red: sometimes called Redei, Oh, what a nice child you are! Where is your mum? Oh, you are all by yourself here? Please be careful. Have this candy, bye! Wait, where is my wallet? You'd never suspect her and that's her selling point. She knows her assets and she knows her business. I know, I know, children are growing too fast these days. And they are way too clever.She is still a kid though. She has a weak spot for long midday naps and stuffed toy animals.Her favorite are dogs and wolves.  Ranger:  Ranger is one of those girls that always bump into something. You know, the one that will always have bruises on her elbows and knees, knock the polka-patterned vase you like and smash your mug that you kinda liked but not that much. The fact that her fringe is obscuring her eyes might be a factor.She loves animals and can befriend beasts that would scare others. She's the outdoor type.  Viking: “Sweet girl that you don't want to cross” would be probably the best description. She likes pretty dresses, makeup and flowers but her occupation as warrior prevents her from manifesting this as much as she would like to.She's tough and reliable for her friends. And, boy, she can really swing that hammer of hers!The bear's name is Bojo and people are joking he should have been born a panda bear - he likes to munch on veggies and is kinda slow. Watch out during a fight though!   Barbarian: Not very intelligent, this one. You can kinda tell when looking at his face. Big forehead, small eyes, forward jaw. He should have been born in times where muscles were all that mattered (so, I guess, 80s?). He likes crude clothes and jewelry, preferably made from parts of his dead enemies. Only one thing was able to penetrate his thick skull and discover the fragile heart within - it happened the moment he saw the Viking for the first time.      Wrecker: Wrecker is...ah, hard to describe. It's not that he likes destroying things, nothing simple and crude like that. I guess he is just very angry at, well, most of the world.He's not young but his speed and toughness will surprise you. He is like the living memory of this old neighbor that you were underestimating and making fun of while being a kid until you accidentally hit his window while playing.You know what this big, green guy says? "That's my secret, I'm always angry".I think it fits Wrecker very much.    Boomer:  Sweets is the girl that dresses as if Halloween is a year-round event. She's in love with candy-themed stuff, cute dresses, striped stockings, bright colored hair...oh, and explosives.Mind you, she likes her explosions to be pretty too. That's why she spends a lot of time designing them so you really want to keep the distance from her workshop. The New Year fireworks are majestic though. And she's not crazy, if that is what first look is telling you. She's just...very focused on things that sparkle and have potential to destroy a city. Dragon and Squire: Young, scared of his steed (hey, it’s a dragon!), inexperienced. Big front teeth. He is a squire of the Knight. Looks up to the Knight and wants to be like him, despite already handling much more (he is riding a DRAGON, remember?). Knight is very happy with the fact that the Squire admires him and wants to keep it that way. He will show the Squire (mostly useless) tricks like throwing his sword up in the air and catching it (barely). Squire would sit on the grass and his eyes would be all shiny because Knight is such a hero for him. Knight is afraid of the dragon, that’s why he makes Squire do the job. He will never admit that Squire is doing it great, because he wants to keep Squire admiration - it feeds his vanity, so Squire doesn’t really believe in himself.The Dragon - angry, mean beast. It will use every opportunity to try to escape or play a trick on the Squire, because it thinks he’s annoying. Much like a horse when it decides it doesn’t like you, but stronger and breathing fire. The Summoner:  Nobody really know who and what Wizard is. There must be a face somewhere below his hood, right? Right? And did anyone ever heard him talk?Actually, yes. Wizard likes to talk and likes for people to listen to him. He will give a lot of advice, mostly unsolicited. Lots of topics too, from mechanics of best swordfight style to preferable way of peeling potatoes.People will roll their eyes when he’s mentioned but will listen when he talks to them, because they fear of being turned into frogs. He can do pretty powerful magic, that Wizard.His magic is a little out of this world - rays of light and green lighting The Witch:  Born with power to control the Fire, she grew up with not a lot of friends, because people were scared. She is very confident, even cocky, because of her (reasonable) belief she is able to defend herself. Likes to show her abilities. Kinda vain too, very obsessed with her looks. She eats only veggies and nobody really knows where does her strength really comes from.Deeper inside, she wants some people to acknowledge and like her - this is why she is very proud of her companions and will fight by their side till the very end.Quote: “Fire, walk with me” And many more unique and amazing characters, some of which will be designed by help from our respected Backers. The Power of MagicWe blended the power of troops with power of great and powerful magics that you can leverage to increase the power of your army and increase your chance of winning. Magic HallYou prepare the magics in magic hall, upgrade your magic hall to unlock new magics and to increase the speed and queue of the magics. Magic Spellswe tailored great and powerful magics for the game play to increase the fun and power of your army. TempleThis magical building is used to upgrade the power of your magics; make sure to build and upgrade it to unlock new magic upgrades and increase the power f our magics. Defense UnitsWe game you any kind of defense unit you may need to protect your kingdom from Cannon to Mortar to Air Defense, Ground and Air Bombs, Archer Tower, Freeze Tower, Lighting Tower, Walls and more to come in the updates.Upgrade your defense units to increase their Attack Power and HitPoints, make them stronger against enemy attacks to  protect your Kingdom.       TrapsWe added traps in the game, so you can trap the enemy troops and defend your village against their raid.  you have all kind of options, hidden bombs, freeze trap, fire trap, so feel free to learn them a lesson, freeze them, burn them, toast them, ??????? and wait for more new Traps to come.   The Kingdom is now in your capable hands and smart brain; implement a great strategy to protect your Kingdom, attack your enemies and move up to the ladder of leader board for our great prizes. Empire & Empire CastleNothing is more important than teaming up with great players and establish your great Empire; it all starts with your Empire Castle, build it and establish your Empire. You can support your alliance by sending them troops and magics to help them protect their kingdom and to increase the power and strengths of their army.  EmpireYou Can build an Empire to invite your friends and alliances to the Empire, together you can fight against other alliances and Empire for pride and victory.  Create your own Empire or join an existing Empire.Search the existing Empires based on many different factors and find the one that suits you to join. Or Create your own Empire from scratch and lead others to join your Empire and team up together for success:Design a stunning and stylish flag for your empire; so everyone can recognize your Empire.  Game EconomyGoldCollect Gold from unlimited underground resources by building and upgrading your gold mines; you can also collect golds in the battler by attacking opponent's gold mine and gold storage. You can use Gold to:
Upgrade your Town Hall
Build and upgrade your defense units
Find an Opponent 
Upgrade your traps
Gold Mine:Build and upgrade them to collect Gold from underground resources. Gold Storage:Store your gold in the storage and keep them safe from Dwarf and Redei; thy just look for your Gold and Mana.  You can also buy clovers in different packs from the shop to speed up their building and upgrade process, or you can watch optional ads to get extra clovers without spending money. A gist of User Interface:            Our talented and committed team is partnered with few different talented studios for finishing the touches of game art and it's trailer to bring you the best and most amazing game and user experience.  3D Brigade3D Brigade is a creative studio trusted by many different big names in Gaming industry including but not limited to EA (Electronic Arts), Microsoft, Activision, UbiSoft and Disney; 3D Brigade's talented artists are working with us on texturing the buildings, texturing the characters for sprite animations and animating the troops for creating the troops sprite animations.  Gold Tooth CreativeGold Tooth Creative is a creative and talented studio based on Vancouver that is currenctly helping us for making great promotional images and creating the game trailer. Gold Tooth Creative is trusted by many of the big brands you may know including but not limited to Machine Zone, Activision, CAPCOM, Disney, Disney and many more; watch some of their cool and great game trailers below; we will be working with them to make the  game trailers for Kings vs Queens. 


 
Sound FX & Music
Legendary producer Greg Dombrowski will produce musics of the game; checkout his portfolio at www.secessionstudios.com/ and some of his works here. We are also giving you a copy of Greg's Lock Buster Music tracks to our backers to enjoy plus it's ring tone.

story:
About the game:

SST is an exciting VR defense-shooting game designed for single and/or co-op gaming.

It’s action takes place in a sci-fi version of far future, where you take part in a fierce battle between mankind and a swarm of giant insects controlled by a single mind. With your participation, humanity has chance to turn the course of the whole war. At the stage of the finished beta version, you are presented with mission in which you will have to protect the base where the swarm Queen is kept until the evacuation transport arrives. With enough support, we plan to finish the whole game as it was planned - with full amount of missions, variety of enemies, NPCs and gameplay mechanics.

 

Base:

 

Your base is protected by mountains from three sides. Bugs, summoned by the Queen's call, are coming from the desert. They attack the walls and soldiers. The base has interactive objects that will help you and your brothers in arms in this unequal battle. You can request support troops from the orbital troop grouping.

 

 

You can use a stationary large-caliber machine gun.

 

 

Destroyed wall modules are promptly replaced by a repair robot.

 

 

Bugs:

 

The Queen is constantly calling for new waves of bugs. They try to break through the walls and destroy the power barrier that keeps the Queen in the container.

 

 

 

There are different types of bugs:

 

Most often on the battlefield you can see the soldier type of bugs. Soldiers come in packs and attack the walls of the base. After a segment of the wall is destroyed, soldiers rush into the base. They attack the force field restraining the Queen, sacrificing themselves in an attempt to overload the field generators. Soldiers are easily killed by any weapon.

 

 

Jumper bugs are easily recognized by their battle cry that they emit before starting its attack. Jumpers are aimed at disabling the enemy's manpower. They use the turmoil of the battle to quietly get close to their victims and explode in a jump to pour them with a rain of the boiling acid. Many soldiers of Terra consider the battle cry of a jumper the most terrible sound in the universe.

 

 

Flyer bugs are real death from above. They dive-bomb enemy soldiers with acid. Unlike jumpers, they are almost noiseless and you may never know what caused your death.

 

 

The strongest enemy on the battlefield is of course a tank. Tank bugs attack enemy soldiers shelling them with large balls of high-temperature plasma. Tanks are heavily armored and vulnerable to attacks only at the moment of a shot, when they open their plasma gland.

 

 

Weapons:

 

In this unequal battle, you will need your reliable weapons. You will have your pistol,

 

 

Assault rifle

 

 

and grenades.

 

 

 

 

Weapon ammo is not limited, but weapons overheat when fired non stop. Each weapon is effective in its own way. So assault rifles are better to use at long distances, but pistols and grenades - in a close combat.

 

Also, as we develop the game, we plan to introduce a large selection of weapons.

 

Stages of development

 

1) Game concept stage. The team defined the concept of the game - visual style (realism), setting (Sci-Fi, space, war with the alien enemy), genre (FPS, Defense)

During this stage:

  • Principal concept documentation was developed.
  • Core mechanics and vector of development were defined.
  • Game engine was defined.

Deadline: The beginning of January 2017.

2) Prototype stage. On the basis of the concept document, a primary prototype of the game was created. It included the necessary gameplay elements and mechanics, such as a map, basic enemies, weapons, player movement mechanics, the primary balance, etc.

During this stage:

  • The main mechanics were determined - shooting, moving between points
  • The engine was implemented with key game objects - basic enemies, weapons, elements of the environment that affect the gameplay  
  • A working prototype of the map was created and implemented
  • The first iteration of the game balance was introduced

Deadline: The end of February 2017.

3) Pre-alpha stage. We’re developing the gameplay and filling the game with content - new types of enemies are added, old ones are revised and new mechanics are added - we replace reloading mechanics and add an arsenal of weapons, rebuild the map, new interactive elements are added.

During this stage:

  • Preliminary models of different enemies and game environments, including those that do not affect the gameplay.
  • The basic AI of the main types of enemies has been worked out.
  • New mechanics are added, existing ones are tested and improved.
  • The game location (map) is finalized from the gameplay point of view.

Deadline: March - September 2017

4) Alpha stage. Based on the finished prototype containing all the main aspects of the core gameplay of the existing fragment of the game, a promo video will be shot to attract investment. The video fully reflects all aspects of the game.

During this stage:

  • All main types of NPC, their AI and art will be implemented into the build
  • All main types of weapons, their mechanics and art will be implemented into the build
  • All main interactive objects, their mechanics and art will be implemented
  • Using the "chromakey" technology, we will shoot and edit a video showing core-gameplay from the player's point of view

Estimated period:  October 2017 - January 2018

5) From alpha to beta. The prototype of the game will be be finalized in the "early" fully playable version, ready for distribution through the "early access" system. - basic game mechanics will be debugged, visual aspects - character models, objects on the map will be fine-tuned, UI will be  finalized. Training mode, script, cutscenes will be implemented. Leaderboards and multiplayer components will be integrated. Story and survival modes will be developed.

During this stage:

  • Core-gameplay, including mechanics, game modes and game balance will be debugged
  • All the visual aspects of the game (maps, weapons, NPCs) will be brought to the final state
  • Game UI will be developed and implemented
  • The training mode will be implemented
  • Story line will be implemented
  • Co-op mode and leaderboards will be implemented

Estimated period: - February - May 2018

6) Beta/beta-escrow stage.  User feedback will be collected, existing game functionality will be revised, bugs will be fixed, gameplay will be enhanced, a variety of missions and game mechanics will be added. We will bring the game to the final release stage. We will port the game to main gaming platforms (Oculus Rift, Vive Port, PSVR)

During this stage:

  • We will carry out a promo campaign
  • The game will be released in Early Access
  • Feedback from Early Access players will be collected
  • The expansion of gameplay - micromechanics, NPC, exc.
  • The game will be ported to target gaming platforms

Estimated period: May - July 2018

7) Release stage. Will be release the game on main platforms and continue work on game improvement, the release of patches and bug fixes.

During this stage:

  • Release
  • Release of hotfixes

Estimated period: July - September 2018

8) Post-release stage. Support of the game. Depending on the success of the project - expansion of the gameplay - the release of DLCs

During this stage:

  • Support
  • Development and release of DLCs, that expand the gameplay on new missions and

Estimated period: - October 2018 - February 2019

 

Campaign goals:

 

Currently, our project is at fourth stage. Depending on the amount collected, our project will evolve as follows:

 

150 000 - Project goes to stage 5 (playable prototype without narration, English localization only)

 

300 000 - Project goes to stage 6 (Game with all planned content, ready for beta testing)

 

600 000 - Project goes to stage 7 (Optimized and corrected game coming out on the main gaming VR platforms)

 

1 500 000 - Project goes to stage 8  (Development of DLC, which expand the gameplay)

 

Given a high level of interest and growth of the gaming community, we are going to develop the game in a full-fledged AAA project.




About us:

 

 

4 I Lab studio is developing games since 2011. The core staff consists of 8 people.

 

We are:     

        

 

Mikhail Yurchanka  - CEO/Analytic
Mikita Susha - Producer/CMO
Mikita Lauretski  - GameDesigner
Eugene Ivanitskiy -  3D Lead/Animator/Music
Alexandr Bereishyk -  3D modeller
Artem Kachanouski - Programmer
Hleb Rahoisha -  Programmer

Alexander Misilevich  - Community/Marketer

 

 

Since 2015, the studio is focused on the development of VR games and applications.

 

The studio has developed several well recognized award winning titles:

 

  • Time of Dragons was awarded as Best Multiplayer Game on Casual Connect in Tel Aviv 2015
  • Drunk or Dead was awarded as Best VR Game on White Night in Prague 2017
  • The X-Power project was awarded as the Best VR project for business.

The core staff consists of 8 people. We are:              Mikhail Yurchanka  - CEO/AnalyticMikita Susha - Producer/CMOMikita Lauretski  - GameDesignerEugene Ivanitskiy -  3D Lead/Animator/MusicAlexandr Bereishyk -  3D modellerArtem Kachanouski - ProgrammerHleb Rahoisha -  ProgrammerAlexander Misilevich  - Community/Marketer  Since 2015, the studio is focused on the development of VR games and applications. The studio has developed several well recognized award winning titles: 
Time of Dragons was awarded as Best Multiplayer Game on Casual Connect in Tel Aviv 2015

Drunk or Dead was awarded as Best VR Game on White Night in Prague 2017

The X-Power project was awarded as the Best VR project for business.

story:
We like games and movies, so we shot a movie and turned it into a game: a full-motion-video (FMV) game! It has the "best graphics" you can get, as our several user said and Hijacker Jack is even more than that! You get the things in your face in real-time!

COMING SOON on:     
 

  • control real-life videos
  • experience the celebrity life
  • explore locations, use objects, collect items and interact with your surroundings
  • conversate with NPCs, your choices having an impact on character development and karma
  • fight with multiple enemies controlling attack, defence and move combinations
  • do skill movements like parkour during a rooftop chase
  • aim and shoot during gunfights, car chases
  • control a small team on a mission
  • drive cars, quad and jet-ski, go rock-climbing or sky-diving through this thrilling story!

Action-packed game / real-time control
 

Jack is a millionaire celebrity who treats people like sh*t. Stereotypic, but don't worry, you won't have to play him. Instead, you'll be replacing him! A wanted man, he must find a body double who looks like him, and as you probably already figured out, that’s you!

Story trailer

Your mission? Live like Jack. Act like him. Speak like him. Do the things which he does and try to survive in a world where friends are wolves in sheep's clothing, and enemies are even worse. Can you remain true to yourself or money changes everything?

 

As we mentioned, a full motion video (FMV) is a video game narration technique that relies upon pre-recorded videofiles (rather than sprites, vectors, or 3D models) to display action in the game (Wikipedia). But it was never real-time before, right?

    Let’s go back to the 1980’s, when these good old-fashioned games were at their peak. That’s when I fell in love with this not so popular genre, even though my hunger for the games was never truly satisfied. FMVs have always missed something that can make them feel more like a hyper-realistic game than an interactive movie.

    Then 5 years ago we decided to find the missing ingredients which can shoot the FMV genre to the stars. We tried our luck and published a simple but cool post-apocalyptic FMV game, that was the SOV 1 and SOV 2, and it turned out that you loved it! Having more than a million downloads and 4.3 rating on Google Play, plus the endless of encouraging comments made us believe that you love our innovation: the real-time FMV games! Check out the gameplay content of Hijacker Jack:

    Training - console style controller

    Clickable objects - thousands of flawless decision points

    Fighting - real-time attack and defense combos

    Conversation and karma - alternate endings

    Different choices - having an impact on the story

    Subtitles in 9 languages

    And loads of fun...

    Based on the experience and feedback of our prototype games, we are improving Hijacker Jack with:

    • long gameplay with alternate endings
    • character development during the game
    • subtitles in 9 languages: Portugese, Russian, English, German, Italian, Spanish, Hungarian, French, Romanian
    • a new game engine – improved controls and stability
    • quests and hidden missions
    • professional actors and stuntmen with thrilling action-packed scenes
    • mind blowing locations (The Philippines, Malta, Hungary, UK)

    Download the prototypes or the trailer app here:

    • SOV 1 
    • SOV 2
    • Hijacker Jack (trailer and countdown to release)
       

    While managing some funds on our own and with help from some very supportive friends, we are still missing the necessary amount to fulfill this game’s true potential. Our goal? To revolutionize gaming with high-quality gameplay and mind-blowing scenes. We need your help to make this happen!

    Funds will mainly go towards helping us make the final action scene (Stretch Goals below) with:

    • car chase with 3 cars
    • crazy fight scene with professional stunts
    • special effects with explosions Michael Bay himself would be proud of!

    All this would be possible with the help of the guys at ExtremeEffects, who made some incredible work on movies like Assasins Creed, Troj and World War Z!
     





    1$ - Warm coffee for us (we like it) and a warm thanks to you from our team!


    4$ - Digital copy of the game once it's released. No ads, full features.


    10$ - Become a beta-tester of the game once we reach the testing phase before the release!


    25$ - Become an insider!
    Receive digital copy of:
    - full game 
    - script in pdf format with all the secrets
    - behind the scenes videos


    50$ - Wear your favorite game publisher's cool t-shirt and support us!


    75$ - Live like Jack. Go to parties with your cool and fun money-gun, shooting thousands of dollars into the crowd!


    100$ - Loved the logo of Hijacker Jack? Wear it on the beach or anywhere! Be cool like Jack.


    500$ - Your name will appear in the credits "SPECIAL THANKS TO"!


    1000$ - Name one of the NPCs in the game!


    2000$ - Play a real sub-role in the game!

     

    We appreciate any good words shared with us or your friends! Please feel free to:

    • spread the word and make some noise for Hijacker Jack by sharing them on your social network
    • use the Indiegogo share tools (above)
    • Support us by following us on FB, Instagram and YouTube
    • ask us anything and share your feedback

    Finally, we cannot say enough thanks, but let me try:

     :)

    Viktor Halla
    founder of NewIdeaGames

story:
About our team & our game.

  • My name is Kit Hoang. I have been in the industry since the 2000s. Please refer to (https://www.linkedin.com/in/kithoang/). Since 2014, I founded a small team TYS Studio (http://www.tysstudio.com) & making indie games.

  •  

  • We carefully crafted a Sci-Fi outerspace world, that is filled with living things, creatures inhabited the barren wilderness, the mighty mountains and the misty jungles. In the deep dark caves, there lurk horrifying monsters. It has day/night and seasonal cycles.

  • It is an action-adventure game played from a third person shooter perspective. The world is fully open and the player can freely roam the environment. There are vehicles such as buggies, motorcycles and Jetpacks that you can collect, to assist your survival in this harsh world, find powerful weapons and equipment, earn new stats, hunt creatures & questing.

  • Jungles should have umbrella-like canopies, with beams of sunlight filter through, moist, foggy ground covered with undergrowth. Sea of grass sway in the wind, stretching around you as far as the eyes can see. In the background, imposing mountain ranges resemble that of the Tibetan Plateau or the Gobi Desert. Or of another world in space, where remnants of meteorite impacts can still be seen. That's is what we envisioned and building.

  • An exotic alien landscape as far as the eyes can see, you can scale the mountains, conquer the peaks and discover things beyond the distant valleys.

  • Vehicle types including Buggies, Motorbikes & Jetpacks. There are so far three types of weapon categories, powerful close range, long rage & small arms. we will be adding more types that  inspired by real guns with Sci-Fi capabilities. Both vehicles & weapons can be upgraded & modified.

  • Vehicles need fuels & other resources to maintain, which you can obtain in different ways. They have different characteristics, for example the "Fuel Storage" buggy in the video, it doesn't need to be refueled, but drives slow & will blow up when gets it.

  • This forsaken minor space human colony is driven by mining and other resources plundering. It is a lawless frontier where human migrants were subjected to brutal exploitation, while the local inhabitants & human military machine engaging in a seemingly eternal conflict.

    There are back stories of the main characters. NPC from all segments of this society share their fragmented stories & experiences. Walking with them through joy & sorrow, pain & suffering. Piece together a picture of this planet's past & present, and your place in it.

  • 50 pages Digital Artbook. Help fill in the back story of Oh Nebula. (IPad not included).

  • The game will be released on PC, Mac & Linux (via Steam) first.

    If meets the Stretch Goals then XboxOne & PS4. We have all of the hardwares & done Microsoft XBoxOne port before.


  •  We have substantially invested in Oh Nebula. We Have been developing this game full-time for around a year, and covered all of the costs ourselves. As you can see in the video, this game is reaching a stage, where both visual & gameplay are on track to be something special. But we need your support to be able to make Oh Nebula complete & polished.

    Money raised will enable us to cover expenses relating directly to development, hiring additional help, buying equipment & tools. Should we raise funds above our target, it will allow us to develop some of the stretch goal features that we think will enhance the core game

 

Risks & Challenges

The risks and challenges are mainly coming from providing the basic incomes for each & every team members. We have a core team of a few guys on salary, plus contract developers. Game engine & frameworks are set. From now on all we need just taking contents from this rough stage, adding, polishing & iterating the game to completion, as bug free as possible.

Kit has been through these kind of grinds for decades. Backers will be able to access the promised delivery time if funded.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

A Retweet, a like or FB mention goes a long way & help our ranking, contribute to Oh Nebula's success.

story:
My best friend is a young, creative and extremely talented individual who started an indie game developing company in Kyiv. Even though the company began as one individual writing down his code ideas on a piece of paper during breaks between his classes, it has gained momentum and support. Now he has a team of hardworking individuals, who help him develop his new interesting  ideas and bring them up to life. I joined his team last year. 
Even though the company has grown, we still have a long way to go, as we lack a lot of resources. Since I joined the company, I know that my best friend has a big dream. He is always talking about building out an office that will have enough space for all of the coworkers to work cohesively together. Unfortunately, our company is pretty new and all the revenue goes toward funding new projects and covering our costs, which includes paying salaries to our programers and designers and our rent. 
I would love to make his dream come true, which is not possible without some sort of fundraising and help. I am not here to ask you to give me some money and promise that it will go towards a cause that will make you feel good about yourself. What I am here to propose is for you to get involved in a new movement. A movement that can gain momentum and reach a larger community of dreamers, who will be given the opportunity for their dreams to come true.

Every backer will become a member of a big friendly family of dreamers and get a lot of presents and respect from us. Everybody who will back $25+ will be given a DREAM CHANCE ticket. What does it mean? After the end of this campaign all owners of tickets will write me about their dreams and I will launch a weeklong voting for them. Then I am going to launch new campaign for the winner of the voting.

Funding from Indiegogo, with your help, gives me opportunity to make my best friend's dream come true. 

BASE GOAL - $10000. At this amount raised our new office will be fully equiped and web site for voiting will be created.

Shipping World Wide

Select T-shirt/Hoodie size at the End of the Campaign

1. Click Back this Project: Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge on the right side of the page or click here. Each backer may only make one pledge.

2. Payment: Enter your payment information. Your payment won't be effective until the very end of this campaign.

3. T-shirt/Hoodie size & Shipping Information: Don’t worry about that yet! You will get to select your Size and submit your Shipping at the very end of this campaign.

story:
The Concept:

This game is going to be a sci-fi type world. It will almost be like a mix between Star Wars, Rick and morty and monster hunter world. But what really sets it apart is the cryptocurrencies. By building the game to run on blockchain, all of our game items and currencies will be cryptocurrencies, allowing players to sell their loot for real world money, like a bitcoin, and make money just from playing video games. It will be a virtual economy, which will be far easier to understand that the real world economy that stocks are currently based on, creating much safer investment options for stock traders.

story:
My name is Richard Alme, founder and CEO of Dead Hills, LLC.  I am also the writer and developer of Devil’s Temple, our first Action-Adventure game for mobile phones.  This, I suppose, makes me the company number one “Dreamer” a title I readily accept.  Since I was a young lad, in high school I was a devoted fan of Ian Fleming’s James Bond books, reading everyone as soon as they were released (in paperback that is).  Being a farm boy in Wisconsin I could not afford anything other than a paperback.  Later, I became an addicted Jason Bourne fan in the trilogy (Identity, Supremacy, and Ultimatum) of the Robert Ludlum novels.  As a father of three boys, I was introduced to gaming and action-adventure games early in the gaming evolution or revolution.  By-the-way, they always won.  

My background includes a BS and MBA from the University of West Florida.  I spend my career in technology, working for Lotus Development, IBM, Sapient and Whitman-Hart Consulting.  I also spent several years consulting with Microsoft and was a member of their Partner Advisory Council.

Devil’s Temple is my passion and I want Lieutenant Colonel Alec Greeson to come to life.  I have spent two years of writing and research developing Alec, his background, team, advisories, and plot.  I have worked part-time early morning jobs to generate income to subsidize my love, to help pay for my graphic artist in Brazil.  At this juncture, I need your help.

story:
Summary

It was quite an interesting journey that I started on May 2020. It’s a lot to process & share, so first I’ll provide here my formal writing to introduce myself: Let’s start with many bits about me.

To begin things, I’m currently just a restaurant supervisor of my family’s Pho restaurant chain in California’s Orange County & a studious enthusiast of video games & all unique creativity of current pop culture. Many months ago in 2020 I watched a YouTube video that showed off many arcade games of the 90s. One of them was Time Traveler. I’m a huge fan of the creative 1991 arcade classic & I played it for the first time & many times later at Circus Circus & Mirage hotels in Las Vegas back in 1992. I loved Time Traveler for its innovative & unique creativity...

What We Need & What You Get

With the help of Indiegogo set for May 15th 2021, I plan to celebrate Time Traveler’s 30th Anniversary Celebration of its arcade release in November 11th 2021. The event will be fully non-profit & I’m personally organizing it with a special YouTube-live fan-gathering event here at a retro arcade/bar in Santa Ana CA where the remaining original cast of actors, Mr. Rick Dyer, the remaining original developers tell stories about how Time Traveler came to be & many other fun things with Q&As, photo ops, & autograph signings where most of the fans will cosplay as Time Traveler characters. What is most special is that each & every attending fan will each be given a memorable t-shirt & a collectible promo book which entails everything that pertains to Time Traveler, like newspaper stories & magazine articles & never before seen behind-the-scenes photos & actors’ photos where autographs be signed. For the kindest of fans, they will be given admission to attend my event...

So far, I have already reached out to 17 of the original acting cast & 14 of the original developers & they’ve all given me their positive & good-to-go response. They will all be fairly compensated for kindly giving their time for the love of Time Traveler & all their fans. I will also make sure they & all their family members are provided great lodging & travel arrangements…

Risks & Challenges

This is my very first time doing anything like this & I’ll do my best to provide the best & most comfortable experience for everyone. The real main focus of this event is not just a great reunion. This event is meant to restore the credibility, respects, recognitions, & immortalization that slipped away from the performers & developers of Time Traveler during 1991-1992 & to have Time Traveler welcomed back into the great industry that is the video gaming community of this current generation. I did buy Digital Leisure’s DVD game of Time Traveler & like the arcade version, it did not include End Credits. In the end & within the pages of the promo book, End Credits will be fully restored...

Other Ways You Can Help

There are so many things that I love to help have you catch up on & so much to share with all of you. I'll do my best to answer any & all questions on the official social networks of the 30th Anniversary Celebration of Time Traveler...

May you all be blessed always & always be safe during these turbulent times…

Summary
It was quite an interesting journey that I started on May 2020. It’s a lot to process & share, so first I’ll provide here my formal writing to introduce myself: Let’s start with many bits about me.
To begin things, I’m currently just a restaurant supervisor of my family’s Pho restaurant chain in California’s Orange County & a studious enthusiast of video games & all unique creativity of current pop culture. Many months ago in 2020 I watched a YouTube video that showed off many arcade games of the 90s. One of them was Time Traveler. I’m a huge fan of the creative 1991 arcade classic & I played it for the first time & many times later at Circus Circus & Mirage hotels in Las Vegas back in 1992. I loved Time Traveler for its innovative & unique creativity...

What We Need & What You Get
With the help of Indiegogo set for May 15th 2021, I plan to celebrate Time Traveler’s 30th Anniversary Celebration of its arcade release in November 11th 2021. The event will be fully non-profit & I’m personally organizing it with a special YouTube-live fan-gathering event here at a retro arcade/bar in Santa Ana CA where the remaining original cast of actors, Mr. Rick Dyer, the remaining original developers tell stories about how Time Traveler came to be & many other fun things with Q&As, photo ops, & autograph signings where most of the fans will cosplay as Time Traveler characters. What is most special is that each & every attending fan will each be given a memorable t-shirt & a collectible promo book which entails everything that pertains to Time Traveler, like newspaper stories & magazine articles & never before seen behind-the-scenes photos & actors’ photos where autographs be signed. For the kindest of fans, they will be given admission to attend my event...
So far, I have already reached out to 17 of the original acting cast & 14 of the original developers & they’ve all given me their positive & good-to-go response. They will all be fairly compensated for kindly giving their time for the love of Time Traveler & all their fans. I will also make sure they & all their family members are provided great lodging & travel arrangements…
Risks & ChallengesThis is my very first time doing anything like this & I’ll do my best to provide the best & most comfortable experience for everyone. The real main focus of this event is not just a great reunion. This event is meant to restore the credibility, respects, recognitions, & immortalization that slipped away from the performers & developers of Time Traveler during 1991-1992 & to have Time Traveler welcomed back into the great industry that is the video gaming community of this current generation. I did buy Digital Leisure’s DVD game of Time Traveler & like the arcade version, it did not include End Credits. In the end & within the pages of the promo book, End Credits will be fully restored...
Other Ways You Can Help
There are so many things that I love to help have you catch up on & so much to share with all of you. I'll do my best to answer any & all questions on the official social networks of the 30th Anniversary Celebration of Time Traveler...
May you all be blessed always & always be safe during these turbulent times…

story:
A "perfect throw," This project will give you a good mood!

The game has two decks of cards (gaming and bonus) and 6 game dice(5 colorful numeric and 1 bonus).

Participants are take turns throw dice and close the card matching the color and number.

Bonus dice allows you to use the bonus card.

Interest in the game "The perfect throw," adds 6 types of bonus cards with the help of these bonuses can help himself or hurt the opponent and not let him win.

This game is designed for 2 - 8 players. The more players the more interesting.

We believe that this project is of interest to you, please help us make it real.

Before starting the game two decks of cards are shuffled and placed on the table.

Players take turns on one game card and put ourselves in the open.

Each player should get a set of 5 cards.

The game has 5 colors playing cards with numbers from 1 to 6.

Cards match colored cubes 5 + 1 bonus dice.

Bonus dice gives the opportunity to take one bonus card.

In the game there are 6 types of bonus cards.

When you open 10, 20 or 30 any achievements we will add bonuses to your project.


Manufacture, package contents of the game and shipping, according to our calculations, will take about 2 months.Cards will be made in professional typography, the dices are also made to order. About all stages of production and shipment, we will inform You on our website Game-deko.com.

Russia and the CIS countries - for free.
Others countries - $5.
To calculate the cost of shipping multiple sets of the game please contact us.

Website:      Game-Deko.com

Facebook:   Facebook.com/groups/perfect.throw

Twitter:       Twitter.com/perfect_throw

Instagram:  Instagram.com/perfect_throw/

VK:                VK.com/perfectthrow

story:
AllyGamers.ca Online Community

AllyGamers has been around for over 4 years and have hosted many games and teamspeak servers for free since that time.  With the recent economy and personal financial situation of the server administrator (Tony aka Tonnic), he cannot support the servers anymore.     Tonnic is an excellent server administrator and all servers that we have hosted have proven to be top of the line for administration, scripts and setup.   We rent one dedicated server and have a proxmox virtual machine system for all of the servers we host!  Tonnic has never accepted donations from anyone over the years, and is only doing this as a last step towards keeping the community and game servers online!   Tonnic wasn't going to do this, but many people have expressed that we should.   We hope to be able to raise these funds, but if not, this way no-one will have donations that didn't go anywhere.  GoFundMe takes a % if the campaign is a success, if not, the funds are refunded!   Remember that this will allow our community to continue for another full year!!!   We can host ANY server that allows private dedicated servers.   

Some servers we currently run are:

  • ARK (http://ark.allygamers.ca/index.php)
  • ArmA3
  • Minecraft TPPI
  • Rust
  • Unturned


What We Need To Raise

We currently host a server through OVH and depending on the amount raised, we can keep the same server (stretch goal) or rent a little bit of a smaller server.  Pretty much all of our servers are run with amazing scripts and run a RAMDisk to ensure that the games are run with the most optimal settings!   The donations are higher than a $10 donation, as we are trying to save for the full year.  A $10/month equivalent donation is $110.00!

#1 - $1,560  CAD + GST (5%) + GFM Fees (4%) + Transaction Fees (3%)

  • OVH Enterprise SP-64 - 64G E5-1620v2 Server (Intel Xeon E5-1620v2 (4c/8t 3,7 GHz+/3,9 GHz+) and 64 GB DDR3 ECC 1600MHz).
#2 - $2,313.60  CAD + GST (5%) + GFM Fees (4%) + Transaction Fees (3%)
  • OVH Enterprise SP-128 - 128G E5-1650v2 Server (Intel Xeon E5-1650v2 (6c/12t 3,5 GHz+/3,9 GHz+) and 128 GB DDR3 ECC 1600MHz).
  • This is currently what we run our servers on.
If we do not reach our goal, you get your funds refunded! :)
