As you can see, the final release went above and beyond all the promises made in the campaign.When the game released in 2020, we really hoped that the sales would help fund the planned expansions. Unfortunately, despite consistently positive feedback from players, it seems to be an uphill battle for a new indie game to stand out from the crowd.We really believe in this game, so we've come to Indiegogo in the hope that we can get at least some of the planned expansions added. The game has incredible depth, as the world gradually opens up and reveals more and more depth of gameplay and hilarious wrestling references mixed with touching stories. The expansions will allow the game to explore some really fun aspects of professional wrestling that will hugely enhance the player experience. Let's face it, who doesn't want to dive into the rich world of Japanese Strong Style, Cruiserweights, Hardcore Wrestling or just plain ridiculous gimmicks!?The money we are raising will pay to keep Emma on board for the new graphics, and Rob for any additional chip tune music. If you don't have the funds to back the project right now, even just downloading the demo and adding the game to your Steam wishlist can help show your support.We try to always listen to our community, so if you have any feedback or suggestions please get in touch.    Above: Previous Kickstarter sprites Above: Previous Kickstarter champions Our FREE demo allows you to experience the first 15 - 45 minutes of Brass Town Wrestling - more than enough time to decide whether it's for you! Rest assured that there is plenty more to discover, as the game begins to open up as the demo finishes!   
The base game was already successfully funded and released, so in the worst case scenario you will receive a full game and t-shirt (if you ordered one).
The funds raised will pay for the graphics and additional music.
I give my time for all the programming without any expectation of making money. Unless something awful happens to me, then the funded expansions will happen eventually.

story:
M&W, IT’S ALL ABOUT THE PLAYER!

That is our creed, our 'lei motiv' that encouraged us to undertake this journey in the Gaming world. If you like video games, we're sure you’ll be interested in this story.

 

 
 

OUR VISION

EARN REAL MONEY JUST PLAYING A VIDEOGAME

No jokes. It's our vision, to democratize the Amateur eSports Games. Once our vision comes true, players will be able to compete against other Managers and get rewarded for their victories with real money, and sell digital assets created within the game to other players for real money.

It's simple as that. Who has not spent hours and hours playing to their favorite game for simple fun. Devoting effort and money to improve or unlocking characters, items, etc. What all that effort could be now monetized?

The world of video games is a constantly developing world, leading the use of new technologies. Nevertheless, we believe that most of the advances have been focused mainly on the game itself, its format, its use or its distribution.

This constant evolution in the gaming world, on the contrary, has not yet led to an ecosystem allowing players to generate profits within the game. The industry follows a total traditional scheme in terms of how to generate revenue, enabling only one-way channel that only allows game developers to profit from gamers.

 

Our Proposal

What if we could change the rules in the gaming industry?

The world of eSports has brought for the first time, the possibility for the players to become the real protagonists by generating real incomes from their participation in tournaments and other sporting events.

Our mission - IT'S ALL ABOUT THE PLAYER - is to extend that model to the world of amateur video games. To democratize the paid competitions of eSports, with the sole purpose of allowing the entire gamer community, and not only the professional ones, to monetize their skill and talent by playing video games. Are you signing up?

 

 

WHO ARE WE?

In fall 2018, MANAGE & WIN was founded by three video game lovers who wanted to create a new model that surpassed the traditional concept of gaming.

To do this, we contributed our modest savings, alongside some contributions from family and friends (yes the wonderful FFF, thank you from heart), and founded the company MANAGE & WIN, to share our vision with the gaming community around the world. In order to achieve this, we teamed up with AKAONI STUDIO, a Spanish video game developer, known for number one sales game in Japan, ‘Zombie Panic in Wonderland'. With everyone's joint effort, MANAGE & WIN finally released in autumn 2019 its first beta of the game 'MANAGE & WIN FOOTBALL' for the IOS universe, which has become the first stone in the gamer universe of MANAGE & WIN! You can download the first beta of the game at the link below!

https://apps.apple.com/es/app/manage-win-football-lite/id1473794427

 

The release received more than remarkable, certainly much better than any of us could expect, becoming the 64th most downloaded game of the AppStore within hours of its release.

This new vision that we want to share with the gamer community has attracted the curiosity of the media, even becoming the subject of a report on the program 'NewsWatch', issued on the  AMC Network last 28 February 2020.

Yes, it's the video you watched on the top of the page!

 

BUT WHAT IS M&W FOOTBALL?

M&W Football is a football simulator game that puts the spotlight on the match day. The player will experience what it is to become the coach of a professional football team, controlling every technical aspect of a match. Players can design their starting eleven, and through our intuitive and quite cool system they will be able to change a multitude of parameters during the match. The algorithm that brings the game's AI to life has been developed based on a 0% randomness - yes 0.00% promised - for the players to control each tactic, positioning, style of play, etc. in order to obtain victories. For the first time, we allow decisions to be transferred in real time to the match, with a real effect on the match. Players will have to learn reading the opponent's tactics and modify their style to beat them.

 

Winning or losing will only depend on the skill. In this regard, this algorithm adapts in real time the game AI to each and every modification made during the match.

To that purpose, each coach will use three tactical screens to configure the team, before and during the match.

 

Formation Screen

   

Through this screen the coach will be able to change the formation of the team (go from a typical 4-4-2 to an aggressive 4-3-3 just a simple tap) and perform replacements within the match.

In these screens you can also check the physical and mood status of your squad, as well as their affinity to the position in which you want them to play.

 

Offensive Tactics Screen

Through this screen you will manage, modify and adapt at each moment of the match all the offensive parameters of your team. It's your team, do it your style and leave your DNA on the field. Cholo, Zizu, Klopp, Guardiola, ... you choose, you decide.

 

Defensive Tactics Screen

Using this screen you will configure all the defensive parameters. You can modify were to put the defensive line, the takeout of the goalkeeper, the defensive markings, as well as the aggressiveness in the pressure and recovery of the ball. You want 'Catenaccio' Rocks! ... all yours.

 

And what if we mix football games with the world of RPGs... Come and try!

Indeed, we like football managers, but also role-playing games, especially the part of the cards (Power Ups) that you can unlock, collect, and throw in the middle of a game to crush your opponent!

 

Well, have designed and included in MW Football more than 40 cards -the number will increase in the future- that give your team a series of 'super powers' for a limited time during the match (physical, tactical, defense skill improvements).

 

 
 
In each match you can carry a deck of 5 cards pre-selected from the total unlocked and use against each opponent a maximum of 3 cards during the match. Their duration and effectiveness will depend on the category of the card (bronze, silver, gold or special category), as well as the type of training and tactics you are employing. For example, the Ram' card is very effective against closed defences, but much more so if you put on the field 'tank-type' strikers, and you raise the intensity level of your players.
 

 

Game system

Today the M&W Football format is set up as a free, multiplayer game where you can compete against other Managers around the world and fight to become the best and most famous eSports Football Manager.

Each player will configure all of their team's sporting parameters, from the starting Eleven, to any offensive or defensive tactics. You will select the Power Ups that best suit you for each match, and register for tournaments where you will compete online against other 'World Managers'.

With each victory you will receive experience points, that will make your team reach new leagues. On the other hand, defeats will subtract points. Every Manager will start his journey in the crowded 'College Yard League' and fight to get to the mythical 'League of Legends' where only the chosen ones enter.

With each upgrade, new players and Power Up cards will be unlocked, that will give you new and original chances to smash your opponent.

 

Player Pool 

 

The first version of M&W Football has been configured with a common player pool system for all Managers. Initially there will be a common 20-player pool from which each team's squad will be selected. This number of initial players amounts to 48, that will be unlocked with each team upgrade.

 

Each player has unique characteristics and abilities. There are more versatile ones that allow them to be aligned in different positions without losing any performance, others that are real starts in a certain role, but totally incompatible with a change of position. Someone are Skilled, others more resolute, fast, tactical players, smarties, toughies, explosives, strategists, chaotic ... all of them have their lights and their shadows. Choose the ones that best suit your style of play and lead your team to glory.

 

GOOD, WHAT NOW?

We are realistic, and we know that what we have achieved so far is only the first step of a long, long journey. The game we've released is a very preliminary view of the entire M&W universe we want to create. In order to take the next steps we now just need your support!

 

Developing a video game is a project that is especially difficult to undertake without a proper financial structure. Contrary to what many people think, developing a video game is not a matter of a few months, but years. During this phase the financial resources of the project, apart from the acquisition of computer equipment and necessary licenses, is mainly the labor cost arising from the salaries of the great professionals involved in this creative process ( computer engineers, graphic designers, backend and frontend programmers, musicians, and a long etc. of other professionals who are also involved in the development of the project).

As you can imagine, during this whole process of important investments no incomes are generated and therefore, on many occasions without a good management of resources many gaming projects perish during the programming phase. The unforeseen events that arise from the development are countless, and knowing how to manage them properly is often the key to the success or failure of the game.

When we decided to start this adventure we managed to raise between personal contributions, about 150K, and we had to carefully select the game areas in which we used such resources. We decided that much of the investment should be spent on areas that could be leveraged in the future game updates, so the initial investment would be as productive as possible. Thus, we decided that the vast majority of the budget should go to the development of the algorithm that gave life to AI, to the detriment of others such as design, UI, tutorials, graphic effects, etc. that we could not cover. We knew that allocating that budget to a back-end section of the game, which the user would not appreciate with the naked eye, it was quite risky, but as in everything in this life you had to make a decision, and we created a solid simulator. Only time will tell if we were right.

After 13 months of hard work, we gave birth to our first digital baby. Finally on November 29, 2019 we published in the App Store MANAGE&WIN FOOTBALL LITE, the first game of the M&W universe to show our vision upon competitive football games without randomization, mixed with RPG.

 

The acceptance, as we told you was better than expected, getting to put the game 64th most downloaded from the AppStore (yuhu!), but we actually knew of the shortcomings of this game version, and the reality soon knocked our door.

If we go into the graphics, we find areas of great improvement and innovation. From rendering matches in 3D, more cool visual effects when you launch a Power Up, customization options according to a premium game -clothing, shields, stadiums, etc.-.

We want to evolve towards  a Total Football Manager concept, where not only the sports tactics are developed, but also the possibility to manage the economy, budget, the 'rookies school'  and social area of the club in a more professional way, to be able to become not only a star of the sport but in a football tycoon.

We want to introduce a much more global and active player market, where a team of scouts will offer you young pearls to be trained until they become a new Messi or CR7. By means of specific trainings you will evolve your players and/or recover them physically and psychologically with a top-level medical team.

Anyway, we've shown that with a modest budget we've been able to survive the odyssey of a video game's conception, development and release - and we've loved the experience - but we're nonconformist and ambitious alike, we want to continue growing and improving. Now that you know this project, it's your time to decide if you give us the opportunity to turn our vision into reality.

 

WHERE WE'LL INVEST YOUR MONEY

In our growth strategy, we have compartmentalized and budgeted various development milestones. We have identified all those points that need to be implemented, modified or improved. Thus, we have positioned them in such a way that their development means less investment, but at the same time they bring to the game a direct improvement of the player's engagement and return on investment. It is true that this world is our passion, but only if we manage to make the game self-sufficient we could continue making the project growing and improving its quality.

Our dream is that this crowfunding campaign will give us enough funds to fully develop the vision that we have told you, but being realistic and starting at the beginning we have compartmentalized various phases of improvement and development that we will be able to carry out independently of each other with your help.

 

PHASE 1. IMPROVE GRAPHIC AND USER ENGAGEMENT. 40,000 EUR .

This first phase and that is the fundamental objective of the crowdfunding campaign will be to reformulate the graphic design and his quality, simplifying the internal structure of the game in order to improve its gameplay. In short, we want to improve the quality of the graphics and make playing much easier and more fun. What we'll do for it:

  • Redesign the art and design of many of the game's screens, creating a much cleaner, simpler and more intuitive UI.
  • Represent 3D embossed players during the match in the form of soda bottle plates. Cool eh!
  • Add customization elements for teams, new shields, t-shirts and items that are displayed during matches and allow you to create a skin of differentiation from other teams.
  • Create a series of equipment with special powers that you can take to each match and improve certain parameters of your team (resistance, speed, strength...). These kits will be ranked in different levels and will be unlocked as the team moves up from the league.
  • Improve visual effects when PowerUps are released during matches.
  • Create a simpler and more didactic interactive tutorial. Where every coach starts at a school for coaches and receives a hands-on session of all the sections he must know of the game, before going to the open sea to compete against other players.

 

PHASE 2. 3D REPRESENTATION OF MATCHES AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE GAME AI.  +60,000 EUR.

This second phase continues to deepen into the user experience, its engagement and gameplay. On the one hand, we want the matches to have a real 3D representation to improve the player's immersion in the match, and to be able to better see the tactics of your opponent, and on the other hand develop the algorithm of the game so that it has all the essential elements of a match football. See bellow our proposal for the future evolution of the game play!

 

 

  • 3D representation of football matches, giving the player the option to watch the match from different perspectives to be able to better analyse the tactics employed by the rivals.
  • Improve the AI of the game by continuing with the development of the algorithm that gives it life. In this phase, all the sections of a football match that have not been able to be implemented, such as fouls, offsides, corners, kicks, penalties, etc. will be added to the game.
  • A real-time monitor will be developed to represent the average attack and defence of your team and your rival. This will give the manager information during the match of how they evolve and affect the attack and defines of the decisions that are made, as well as the release of Power Ups.
  • An individualized graphical representation of the use of each PowerUp will be designed.

 

PHASE 3. EVOLUTION TO A TOTAL FOOTBALL MANAGER.  +250,000 EUR.

In this third phase, we want to evolve the functionalities of the game towards a Total Football Manager. Improving not only the management options of the sports plot, but also introducing new management areas, such as the economic, managerial, social and marketing areas of a club. Because we know that winning matches is cool but putting on Abramovich's shoes one day is cool so much more!

  • Programming the game on servers: To be able to bring life the management of all these areas and that interconnect among all users it is necessary that the information is accessible to all users. This only happens if the game is programmed and runs directly from the cloud, not on each of the mobile devices as it does now. Thus, we will schedule a new version of the game that meets the necessary requirements so that all users can be connected in a global community of Managers, perform transfers of players, stadiums, shields, etc.
  • Improved management of Sport Area:
    • Scout team and affiliate team: The club will be equipped with a scouting team who will be in charge of finding young promises to incorporate them into the club and evolve them into stars worldwide. The possibility of managing a subsidiary team to grow these young promises will be introduced. Yes, because the next Messi is out there waiting for you to find him.
    • Transfer Market: Create a virtual market for player transfers and other game items. You can sell and buy everything from skins, Power Ups, coaches, doctors, to stadiums. Earn revenue from the sale of any assets in your club, and buy in the market all the necessary elements to make the team of your dreams a reality.
    • Technical Team: The sports strategy of the game will be developed to make it similar to that of any great football team today. Physical preparers, psychologists, doctors, defensive, offensive, tactical coach, etc. Only by hiring the best professionals it's possible to optimize the evolution of your players by creating a highly competitive team in all sports areas.
    • Sports facilities: Sports facilities (gym, training camps, nursing, etc.) can be created and improved to make the evolution and progression of players faster and more effective.
  • Incorporation of the Economic strategy
    • Economic Management of the team: Only optimal and effective management of your team will allow you to increase your annual budget to sign the best players in the world. Management of wage costs, termination clauses, ticket sales, advertising on T-shirts and in the stadium, sales of drinks and food, opening of new own stores, sponsorship contracts with sports brands, ... Football is sport and passion, but also a business. Optimize these plots and become the Tycoon of world football... let's Abramovich be a simple fan by your side.
    • Football Stadium: Turn your team's stadium into a world-class benchmark. Improve your club's revenue, sponsorship contracts and access to better competitions. It all starts in a schoolyard, struggles to see built the stadium of your dreams.
    • Official Stores: Create a network of official club stores that generate sufficient resources to keep the team and grow economically and socially.
    • Marketing and Sponsorship Contracts: The more your team grows, the better the contracts you will have access to, from sports brands to stadium names. Be creative to optimize this important economic plot and be able to balance the club's accounts.
    • Food and Refreshment Sales: Do not underestimate this method of obtaining recurring resources. Manage sales prices and procurement. The better your equipment is ranked, the better sales prices you can offer.
  • Incorporation of the Social&Media Area
    • Supporters: Manage relationships with fans, only keeping them happy will your relevance in media will be important. Hold events with the fans, promotional activities, etc. so that your social mass supports your team inside and outside the stadium.
    • Press and Public Relations: Designs an optimal media policy. Improve the mood of your players with a good relationship with the press.

 

PHASE 4. VISION COME TRUE.  +350,000 EUR.

Just thinking that this could be done makes us cry out. Being able to bring our vision to your devices thanks to your support is something we could never forget.

The first thing to say is that this phase would be almost entirely dedicated to a backend phase, where substantial changes would arise from the implementation of a new game system that would allow players to monetize their skill and dedication to the game through a paid system of eSport Amateur championships, and the creation of a Real Market in a Virtual World, where you could sell in exchange for real money the digital assets that each of you has created (i.e. players, PowerUps, limited edition kits, etc.).

Implementing this new game system generates significant investments to bring legitimacy and security to all transactions performed. While similar systems exist in other fields, such as online casinos, their adaptation to the world of video games is not standardized and is therefore difficult and expensive.

 

The programming investment of this phase would be aimed at the creation of the following areas:

  • Creation of a paid system of championships and leagues: A system of tournaments and leagues must be implemented that allow the user to register in exchange for paying an entrance ticket. Depending on the player's evolution in the tournament, the profits earned will accrue in their individual account, which they can withdraw to their current account when they consider. A database with sufficient security and integrity must be programmed and maintained to ensure the legitimacy of all funds that are incorporated into the user's account as a result of their participation in paid tournaments.
  • Creating a Real Market in the Virtual World: How many hours we've spent playing our favourite video games to have better characters, better skins, unlock players, etc. And so far, they only served for the enjoyment of the user himself. Until now. At M&W we will create a real market in the virtual world, making all the digital assets that are created belong to the users themselves. Thus through a system of transfers and withdrawal clauses you can put in value your players, stadiums, coaches, PoweUps, Skins, etc. And if you are able to create the next CR7 or Messi the market should recognize it. Okay, maybe you'll get up one morning and Messi's disappeared from your club... ?  but in return you will have obtained a few dollars that you can deposit into your bank account whenever you want to ?. We all know that our time is worth money, but from now on you can charge for it. What do you think, you sign up?
  • Creating a two-way payment gateway: As the last step of the roadmap, a two-way payment gateway must be incorporated within the game, so that you can receive in your current account the revenue generated by your tournament triumphs or sale of digital assets. In the world of video games, you can count on the fingers of the hand adventurers who have incorporated a similar reward system. We must program and incorporate our own payment gateway that is totally reliable and secure for our users.

 

OUR PRINCIPLES AND VALUES

Last but not least, we want to share with you the principles and values that motivate each of the decisions we make.

These values fulfill define (promised) our games and our commitment to you and this wonderful world of video games.

 

“It’s all about the player”

Our main and only obsession is for players to enjoy the game, having fun by simply spending a moment of happiness. Getting that little smile on your mouth be drawned while you're playing, that's just our purpose. In this sense, you have our firm promise that all the decisions we make will have as a reference to improve the quality of your gaming experience. And we will accept all the criticisms you give us when we are wrong. yes, yes, we know we are all human and at some point we will screw up...

 

"Games for the years”

Who don’t remember those great titles of our youth like 'Street Fighter 2', PC Football, Commandos, etc., and not as old as WOW, Clash of Clans, ... many of which we continue playing regularly even if they have a few years behind them.

We want MANAGE & WIN to become a benchmark of the 'League Manager', through which the years pass like good wines, improving the present.

Today Mobile games have an incredible advantage over traditional games, they can be subject to updates without any restrictions for years, being able to surprise players constantly. MANAGE&WIN is and will always be constantly evolving. That's our commitment, first the players, and for this we will constantly invest much of our resources. We're here to stay, only if you want to.

 

"Skill before jam” 

In other words, the ability before the filly.

We want players' ability to determine their victories. To do this we develop our games with an algorithm with zero randomness (yes zero-zero, promised). Success will never be based on luck again. And at the same time defeats will have to be accepted without any excuse... do you accept the challenge?

 

"Bug Busters”

The first thing a game has to do is to work perfectly, without any programming flaws. We are aware of our human condition - we hope you too - and we know that at some point or another we will make failures in development. We apologize in advance, and promise that we will resolve them as soon as possible. However, we like to believe that mistakes make us better than we were before, so to paraphrase an Edison "I haven't failed 999 times, I've just found 999 ways how not to create a light bulb."

 

If you have come this far we want to thank you for the time you have spent valuing our project. Whether you decide to support us financially or not, thanks to people like you, passionate about this world, we find our motivation to continue fighting to make this dream come true. From the heart, thank you very much from the entire M&W team.

There are more versatile ones that allow them to be aligned in different positions without losing any performance, others that are real starts in a certain role, but totally incompatible with a change of position. Someone are Skilled, others more resolute, fast, tactical players, smarties, toughies, explosives, strategists, chaotic ... all of them have their lights and their shadows. Choose the ones that best suit your style of play and lead your team to glory. GOOD, WHAT NOW?We are realistic, and we know that what we have achieved so far is only the first step of a long, long journey. The game we've released is a very preliminary view of the entire M&W universe we want to create. In order to take the next steps we now just need your support! Developing a video game is a project that is especially difficult to undertake without a proper financial structure. Contrary to what many people think, developing a video game is not a matter of a few months, but years. During this phase the financial resources of the project, apart from the acquisition of computer equipment and necessary licenses, is mainly the labor cost arising from the salaries of the great professionals involved in this creative process ( computer engineers, graphic designers, backend and frontend programmers, musicians, and a long etc. of other professionals who are also involved in the development of the project).As you can imagine, during this whole process of important investments no incomes are generated and therefore, on many occasions without a good management of resources many gaming projects perish during the programming phase. The unforeseen events that arise from the development are countless, and knowing how to manage them properly is often the key to the success or failure of the game.When we decided to start this adventure we managed to raise between personal contributions, about 150K, and we had to carefully select the game areas in which we used such resources. We decided that much of the investment should be spent on areas that could be leveraged in the future game updates, so the initial investment would be as productive as possible. Thus, we decided that the vast majority of the budget should go to the development of the algorithm that gave life to AI, to the detriment of others such as design, UI, tutorials, graphic effects, etc. that we could not cover. We knew that allocating that budget to a back-end section of the game, which the user would not appreciate with the naked eye, it was quite risky, but as in everything in this life you had to make a decision, and we created a solid simulator. Only time will tell if we were right.After 13 months of hard work, we gave birth to our first digital baby. Finally on November 29, 2019 we published in the App Store MANAGE&WIN FOOTBALL LITE, the first game of the M&W universe to show our vision upon competitive football games without randomization, mixed with RPG. The acceptance, as we told you was better than expected, getting to put the game 64th most downloaded from the AppStore (yuhu!), but we actually knew of the shortcomings of this game version, and the reality soon knocked our door.If we go into the graphics, we find areas of great improvement and innovation. From rendering matches in 3D, more cool visual effects when you launch a Power Up, customization options according to a premium game -clothing, shields, stadiums, etc.-.We want to evolve towards  a Total Football Manager concept, where not only the sports tactics are developed, but also the possibility to manage the economy, budget, the 'rookies school'  and social area of the club in a more professional way, to be able to become not only a star of the sport but in a football tycoon.We want to introduce a much more global and active player market, where a team of scouts will offer you young pearls to be trained until they become a new Messi or CR7. By means of specific trainings you will evolve your players and/or recover them physically and psychologically with a top-level medical team.Anyway, we've shown that with a modest budget we've been able to survive the odyssey of a video game's conception, development and release - and we've loved the experience - but we're nonconformist and ambitious alike, we want to continue growing and improving. Now that you know this project, it's your time to decide if you give us the opportunity to turn our vision into reality. WHERE WE'LL INVEST YOUR MONEYIn our growth strategy, we have compartmentalized and budgeted various development milestones. We have identified all those points that need to be implemented, modified or improved. Thus, we have positioned them in such a way that their development means less investment, but at the same time they bring to the game a direct improvement of the player's engagement and return on investment. It is true that this world is our passion, but only if we manage to make the game self-sufficient we could continue making the project growing and improving its quality.Our dream is that this crowfunding campaign will give us enough funds to fully develop the vision that we have told you, but being realistic and starting at the beginning we have compartmentalized various phases of improvement and development that we will be able to carry out independently of each other with your help. PHASE 1. IMPROVE GRAPHIC AND USER ENGAGEMENT. 40,000 EUR .This first phase and that is the fundamental objective of the crowdfunding campaign will be to reformulate the graphic design and his quality, simplifying the internal structure of the game in order to improve its gameplay. In short, we want to improve the quality of the graphics and make playing much easier and more fun. What we'll do for it:

Redesign the art and design of many of the game's screens, creating a much cleaner, simpler and more intuitive UI.

Represent 3D embossed players during the match in the form of soda bottle plates. Cool eh!

Add customization elements for teams, new shields, t-shirts and items that are displayed during matches and allow you to create a skin of differentiation from other teams.

Create a series of equipment with special powers that you can take to each match and improve certain parameters of your team (resistance, speed, strength...). These kits will be ranked in different levels and will be unlocked as the team moves up from the league.

Improve visual effects when PowerUps are released during matches.
Create a simpler and more didactic interactive tutorial. Where every coach starts at a school for coaches and receives a hands-on session of all the sections he must know of the game, before going to the open sea to compete against other players.
 
PHASE 2. 3D REPRESENTATION OF MATCHES AND IMPROVEMENT OF THE GAME AI.  +60,000 EUR.
This second phase continues to deepen into the user experience, its engagement and gameplay. On the one hand, we want the matches to have a real 3D representation to improve the player's immersion in the match, and to be able to better see the tactics of your opponent, and on the other hand develop the algorithm of the game so that it has all the essential elements of a match football. See bellow our proposal for the future evolution of the game play! 

 

3D representation of football matches, giving the player the option to watch the match from different perspectives to be able to better analyse the tactics employed by the rivals.

Improve the AI of the game by continuing with the development of the algorithm that gives it life. In this phase, all the sections of a football match that have not been able to be implemented, such as fouls, offsides, corners, kicks, penalties, etc. will be added to the game.

A real-time monitor will be developed to represent the average attack and defence of your team and your rival. This will give the manager information during the match of how they evolve and affect the attack and defines of the decisions that are made, as well as the release of Power Ups.
An individualized graphical representation of the use of each PowerUp will be designed.
 
PHASE 3. EVOLUTION TO A TOTAL FOOTBALL MANAGER.  +250,000 EUR.
In this third phase, we want to evolve the functionalities of the game towards a Total Football Manager. Improving not only the management options of the sports plot, but also introducing new management areas, such as the economic, managerial, social and marketing areas of a club. Because we know that winning matches is cool but putting on Abramovich's shoes one day is cool so much more!
Programming the game on servers: To be able to bring life the management of all these areas and that interconnect among all users it is necessary that the information is accessible to all users. This only happens if the game is programmed and runs directly from the cloud, not on each of the mobile devices as it does now. Thus, we will schedule a new version of the game that meets the necessary requirements so that all users can be connected in a global community of Managers, perform transfers of players, stadiums, shields, etc.
Improved management of Sport Area:

Scout team and affiliate team: The club will be equipped with a scouting team who will be in charge of finding young promises to incorporate them into the club and evolve them into stars worldwide. The possibility of managing a subsidiary team to grow these young promises will be introduced. Yes, because the next Messi is out there waiting for you to find him.

Transfer Market: Create a virtual market for player transfers and other game items. You can sell and buy everything from skins, Power Ups, coaches, doctors, to stadiums. Earn revenue from the sale of any assets in your club, and buy in the market all the necessary elements to make the team of your dreams a reality.

Technical Team: The sports strategy of the game will be developed to make it similar to that of any great football team today. Physical preparers, psychologists, doctors, defensive, offensive, tactical coach, etc. Only by hiring the best professionals it's possible to optimize the evolution of your players by creating a highly competitive team in all sports areas.

Sports facilities: Sports facilities (gym, training camps, nursing, etc.) can be created and improved to make the evolution and progression of players faster and more effective.



Incorporation of the Economic strategy

Economic Management of the team: Only optimal and effective management of your team will allow you to increase your annual budget to sign the best players in the world. Management of wage costs, termination clauses, ticket sales, advertising on T-shirts and in the stadium, sales of drinks and food, opening of new own stores, sponsorship contracts with sports brands, ... Football is sport and passion, but also a business. Optimize these plots and become the Tycoon of world football... let's Abramovich be a simple fan by your side.

Football Stadium: Turn your team's stadium into a world-class benchmark. Improve your club's revenue, sponsorship contracts and access to better competitions. It all starts in a schoolyard, struggles to see built the stadium of your dreams.

Official Stores: Create a network of official club stores that generate sufficient resources to keep the team and grow economically and socially.

Marketing and Sponsorship Contracts: The more your team grows, the better the contracts you will have access to, from sports brands to stadium names. Be creative to optimize this important economic plot and be able to balance the club's accounts.

Food and Refreshment Sales: Do not underestimate this method of obtaining recurring resources. Manage sales prices and procurement. The better your equipment is ranked, the better sales prices you can offer.



Incorporation of the Social&Media Area

Supporters: Manage relationships with fans, only keeping them happy will your relevance in media will be important. Hold events with the fans, promotional activities, etc. so that your social mass supports your team inside and outside the stadium.

Press and Public Relations: Designs an optimal media policy. Improve the mood of your players with a good relationship with the press.


 
PHASE 4. VISION COME TRUE.  +350,000 EUR.
Just thinking that this could be done makes us cry out. Being able to bring our vision to your devices thanks to your support is something we could never forget.The first thing to say is that this phase would be almost entirely dedicated to a backend phase, where substantial changes would arise from the implementation of a new game system that would allow players to monetize their skill and dedication to the game through a paid system of eSport Amateur championships, and the creation of a Real Market in a Virtual World, where you could sell in exchange for real money the digital assets that each of you has created (i.e. players, PowerUps, limited edition kits, etc.).Implementing this new game system generates significant investments to bring legitimacy and security to all transactions performed. While similar systems exist in other fields, such as online casinos, their adaptation to the world of video games is not standardized and is therefore difficult and expensive. The programming investment of this phase would be aimed at the creation of the following areas:

Creation of a paid system of championships and leagues: A system of tournaments and leagues must be implemented that allow the user to register in exchange for paying an entrance ticket. Depending on the player's evolution in the tournament, the profits earned will accrue in their individual account, which they can withdraw to their current account when they consider. A database with sufficient security and integrity must be programmed and maintained to ensure the legitimacy of all funds that are incorporated into the user's account as a result of their participation in paid tournaments.

Creating a Real Market in the Virtual World: How many hours we've spent playing our favourite video games to have better characters, better skins, unlock players, etc. And so far, they only served for the enjoyment of the user himself. Until now. At M&W we will create a real market in the virtual world, making all the digital assets that are created belong to the users themselves. Thus through a system of transfers and withdrawal clauses you can put in value your players, stadiums, coaches, PoweUps, Skins, etc. And if you are able to create the next CR7 or Messi the market should recognize it. Okay, maybe you'll get up one morning and Messi's disappeared from your club... ?  but in return you will have obtained a few dollars that you can deposit into your bank account whenever you want to ?. We all know that our time is worth money, but from now on you can charge for it. What do you think, you sign up?

Creating a two-way payment gateway: As the last step of the roadmap, a two-way payment gateway must be incorporated within the game, so that you can receive in your current account the revenue generated by your tournament triumphs or sale of digital assets. In the world of video games, you can count on the fingers of the hand adventurers who have incorporated a similar reward system. We must program and incorporate our own payment gateway that is totally reliable and secure for our users.
 OUR PRINCIPLES AND VALUESLast but not least, we want to share with you the principles and values that motivate each of the decisions we make.These values fulfill define (promised) our games and our commitment to you and this wonderful world of video games. “It’s all about the player”Our main and only obsession is for players to enjoy the game, having fun by simply spending a moment of happiness. Getting that little smile on your mouth be drawned while you're playing, that's just our purpose. In this sense, you have our firm promise that all the decisions we make will have as a reference to improve the quality of your gaming experience. And we will accept all the criticisms you give us when we are wrong. yes, yes, we know we are all human and at some point we will screw up... "Games for the years”Who don’t remember those great titles of our youth like 'Street Fighter 2', PC Football, Commandos, etc., and not as old as WOW, Clash of Clans, ... many of which we continue playing regularly even if they have a few years behind them.We want MANAGE & WIN to become a benchmark of the 'League Manager', through which the years pass like good wines, improving the present.Today Mobile games have an incredible advantage over traditional games, they can be subject to updates without any restrictions for years, being able to surprise players constantly. MANAGE&WIN is and will always be constantly evolving. That's our commitment, first the players, and for this we will constantly invest much of our resources. We're here to stay, only if you want to. "Skill before jam” In other words, the ability before the filly.We want players' ability to determine their victories. To do this we develop our games with an algorithm with zero randomness (yes zero-zero, promised). Success will never be based on luck again. And at the same time defeats will have to be accepted without any excuse... do you accept the challenge? "Bug Busters”The first thing a game has to do is to work perfectly, without any programming flaws. We are aware of our human condition - we hope you too - and we know that at some point or another we will make failures in development. We apologize in advance, and promise that we will resolve them as soon as possible. However, we like to believe that mistakes make us better than we were before, so to paraphrase an Edison "I haven't failed 999 times, I've just found 999 ways how not to create a light bulb." If you have come this far we want to thank you for the time you have spent valuing our project. Whether you decide to support us financially or not, thanks to people like you, passionate about this world, we find our motivation to continue fighting to make this dream come true. From the heart, thank you very much from the entire M&W team.

story:
Short Summary

We are a young and talented game development team from Finland, Russia and Brazil. We are all riders and passionate about horses, and we want to develop the best virtual reality horse simulation game ever! We have developed a playable demo game that you can see in the introduction video. The work so far was made possible by a small DigiDemo funding from Finnish AVEK, an association promoting audiovisual culture in Finland, and our own drive. Because of our enthusiasm and passion, we have worked for months without funding to deliver the demo game. Now we need your help in funding the content development for a complete game. We want to output the highest quality game content for you!

What We Need

We need to find out if there are gamers out there who are eager to play this type of video game. If we get enough people to back us, we can start the full development, and score more funding from investors.

What You Get

You as a backer will get early access to the game via Steam, and if you are interested, you can contribute your ideas and opinions to the game development :) Together we can make this game the best horse game experience for us all! As the game is first launched through Steam, the supported devices are Oculus Rift and HTC Vive. If we get enough backers, we hope to launch the game also in Sony PlayStation VR.

Professional riders support us

The Finnish Riding Society and the Finnish Eventing Society are supporting us and giving us professional consultation on designing the cross country and show jumping courses for the game. We are going to offer replicas of some of the most famous venues in Eventing competitions, such as the Badminton cross country courses.

 

Here is a video of one of the horse 3D-models in the upcoming My Virtual Horse VR game

story:
WHAT IS CEREAL KILLAZ?

Cereal Killaz is a classic 2D fighting game featuring thinly-veiled characters from all your favourite breakfast cereals! Fast-paced and colorful, it's easy to pick up but with enough tactical depth to satisfy even the most hardcore fans of the genre.

Our current aim is to secure enough funding to make a fully playable demo version of the game, a chance for players to experience for themselves how the final product will feel and play. We plan to include two characters with full move-sets, artwork and backstory.

RISE AND SHINE!

Obsessed with discovering the secret to eternal life, the nefarious Dr K has spent decades tinkering with human and animal DNA in his secret laboratory. Now the results of his previous experiments are threatening to come back to bite him in a frighteningly literal way…

Now, from his private island of Waki Waki, he invites a selection of supernatural warriors and his own failed experiments to compete in a fighting tournament for a prize that none of them can refuse. 

 

OFF THE BOX & ON THE RAMPAGE!

 

 

"You might wanna buckle in, things are about to get Grrrrr-uesome!

Terror T was a GI during the last days of the Vietnam War. Mortally wounded, he was placed in the care of the notorious Dr K and revived using the DNA of a Sumatran tiger and the doctor’s “Secret Recipe,” gaining the beast-like characteristics of a Tiger in the process.

Don’t let his bulky stature fool you, he’s a precise heavy hitter who can fire off a flurry of fist and claw-based attacks to shred his enemies to pieces. And just like a tiger, he knows how to draw in his prey for the kill...

Gameplay: Terror T will have a rush down play style so make sure to utilize his tools to get in on your opponent’s and overwhelm them with pressure! Once you’re in you’ll have to commit so make sure you have a plan of attack!
 

 

 

"The day you cross Mclucky, is the day you'r luck runs out."

When the fairy folk left Ireland, they refused to take the murderous McLucky with them, cursing him instead to wander the realm of man forever. Now the only way he can gain enough power to open a doorway to the otherworld is by defeating powerful rivals and imprisoning their souls within the many grisly ‘charms’ he carries about his person.

Mclucky likes to keep his distance. Using the magical abilities of his charms, he focuses on projectile based assaults to throw his enemies off guard before closing in for the finishing blow!

Gameplay: McLucky will have a zoning play style easily keeping his opponents out but he knows how to put on the pressure. Make sure to utilize his long range normals appropriately but be careful that randomly throwing out attacks can result in big punishes!

 

Will there be more characters in the future?

While the Demo will initially focus on Terror T and Mclucky, should we meet our stretch goals, we'll be able to implement even more characters getting us closer to a full build of the game!​

 

GAMEPLAY STYLE:

*Not Final Design

Cereal Killaz will have 4 button system which is Light, Medium, & Heavy attack, along with a “skill” button. For the demo, this will be a 1v1 style fighting game that will play similarly to the versus series. Meaning lots of chain combos on the ground and air. Each character will have a variety of special moves and supers for all kinds of crazy combos.

The Demo will only focus on localized play, however online play is planned for a potential full game release.

Our Demo will also feature: 

  • 2 player localized VS experience,
  • A brief tutorial story mode unique to both Terry and McLucky (as well as stretch goal characters if those goals are met.)
  • A special bonus stage vs the endurable punching box Training Oates!

     

    Gameplay Mechanics:

    Skill/Technique Button: A skill button is a mechanic that will add something unique to a character. These skills can give a character a boost in damage, a new attack, or an extra move to help them maneuver around in a match.

    Throws: Each character will have a forward and back throw. This is something most of you should be familiar with!

    Special Moves: Each character will have a variety of special attacks integrated in their move-set. Enhanced versions of a special move will cost half a bar of meter.

    Super Moves: Each character will have a level 1 super(s) and level 3 super.

    Break -Fast: This is a mechanic that is used in tough situations. If you are feeling the pressure and want your opponent to get off you, spend 1 bar of meter to push them off.  If they really annoy you spend 2 bars of meter to push them off and follow up with a full combo!


    *Names Not finalized

WHO ARE WE?

Cereal Killaz is being developed by a team of industry professionals whose long-standing passion for fighting games and breakfast foods has led them to collaborate on making the game of their dreams!

Mikhail "Mythallica" Sebastian 

Project Lead

ROLE: Creator/Creative Director

COMBAT STYLE: Defensive Long-range, Offensive Close Range

SPECIAL MOVE: Foresight

FAVORITE FIGHTER: Magneto MvC

BREAKFAST OF CHOICE: Eggs, Oatmeal and Toast! Or, a good protein shake.

BIO: Mikhail Sebastian is an Illustrator Animator and and Glyph Award Winning published author with an undergraduates in Illustration from the Savannah College of Art and Design. He’s who’s done work for The Los Angeles Clippers, Carl Jones, Universal Pictures, Noir Caesar and the United States Census Department just to name a few. While he’s contributed to the visions of many great minds, it is his own ideas that he has committed his time, effort and resources towards the most.

WEBSITE: https://mythapparel.com/

Michel Mony 

Programmer

ROLE: Programmer and stuff

COMBAT STYLE: Langschwert

SPECIAL MOVE: Gambit

FAVORITE FIGHTER: Smoke (MK9 2011)

BREAKFAST OF CHOICE: Bagels

BIO: Michel is a freelance game developer credited on over 100 projects to date. He has worked with Ubisoft, Riot Games, Capcom, Hasbro, Sony, and many more, in various capacities ranging from Producer, Designer and Programmer.

WEBSITE: https://www.linkedin.com/in/michelmony/

 

 

Andrew "Hien" Rattanakongkham

Lead Animator

 

ROLE: Lead Animator & Gameplay designer

COMBAT STYLE: B-boying

SPECIAL MOVE: Fire Footwork

FAVORITE FIGHTER: Ryu from Street Fighter

BREAKFAST OF CHOICE: He doesn’t eat breakfast…(Strange one)

BIO: Andrew is a freelance artist who has worked heavily in pixel art animations under a variety of projects and games. His love of fighting games has ushered his passion straight into the creative force that drives our visceral animations.

WEBSITE: https://www.artstation.com/xhienx

 

Corey Rivera 

Background Artist

ROLE: Background Artist and UI Design

COMBAT STYLE: Spike Fiend

SPECIAL MOVE: Suck and Cuck

FAVORITE FIGHTER: King K. Rool (SSB5 2018)

BREAKFAST OF CHOICE: Pancakes and Bacon

BIO: Corey is a freelance illustrator recent graduate from Scad. Indie games and animations fuel his inspiration in character design and background art to create illustrations lively in color and design.

WEBSITE: https://www.crivera.net/ 

 

 LEE WILLIAMS

Writer

COMBAT STYLE: Origami

SPECIAL MOVE: Feign Injury

FAVORITE FIGHTER: Blanka from Street Fighter 2

BREAKFAST OF CHOICE: Bacon and eggs

BIO: Lee is a writer and narrative designer with many years of experience, having previously worked on titles published by Ubisoft, Devolver Digital and Choice of Games among others.

WEBSITE: https://www.leewilliams.eu/ 

 

WHERE WILL YOUR MONEY GO?

Walking into this project, we knew we had one and one goal only: TO MAKE THE GAME. We've seen countless campaigns falter from biting off more than they could chew. Our Goal is simple: To create a fully functional demo that we can shop to potential publishers for a full game in the future. Should we receive the funds to produce a full build ourselves, then that's exactly what we'll do. The game is the goal! TLDR: If you help us fund this project, we WILL make this game. Simple as that!

 

REWARDS

*Physical Items: We know you want them, and as awesome as many of the physical items we have planned are, the current global situation would only further complicate the process of making this game. Which is our main priority. We've instead created a batch of Digital Rewards completely exclusive to the backers of this campaign that we fill will peak your interest all the same! The Estimated dates attached to the perks ONLY apply to the digital deliverables (OST, Digital Artbook, Digital Comic Book, Wallpapers etc) Dates for build releases will be announced at a later date.

 

STRETCH GOALS!

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Some risks involved have been mentioned by the community prior to the launch of this campaign. While cease & desist letters are certainly possible, we are confident that our project meets the criteria for protection under Section 107 of the US Copy right law and thus is protected under satirical fair use. However, we know that this won’t prevent potential threats from being made. We’ve reached out to a trademark lawyer to assist us with any and all legal processes that could arise in the future. We understand the real risk of C&D threats, so if a situation arises to where changes to our characters will need to be made, that also means we'd have to change their animations from the ground up. We are prepared to tackle any situations should they arise.

The main risk involved in making Cereal Killaz would be the potential of conflicting schedules due to the adverse effects of the current global pandemic. Our team is small and dedicated however, we are all fulltime workers in our designated careers. While that will not inhibit the overall production of the game, it could occasionally affect our working schedules. The more successful the campaign however, the more time our team would be able to dedicate to the game (in most of our cases, even making it our full-time job), which would help reduce scheduling conflicts. There’s always the risk of something unexpected and outside of our control slowing the development of the game, but such possibilities become remote once Mythallica Inc. has funding to work with.

Each character will have a variety of special moves and supers for all kinds of crazy combos.The Demo will only focus on localized play, however online play is planned for a potential full game release. Our Demo will also feature:  
2 player localized VS experience, 
A brief tutorial story mode unique to both Terry and McLucky (as well as stretch goal characters if those goals are met.)

A special bonus stage vs the endurable punching box Training Oates! Gameplay Mechanics:Skill/Technique Button: A skill button is a mechanic that will add something unique to a character. These skills can give a character a boost in damage, a new attack, or an extra move to help them maneuver around in a match.Throws: Each character will have a forward and back throw. This is something most of you should be familiar with!Special Moves: Each character will have a variety of special attacks integrated in their move-set. Enhanced versions of a special move will cost half a bar of meter.Super Moves: Each character will have a level 1 super(s) and level 3 super.Break -Fast: This is a mechanic that is used in tough situations. If you are feeling the pressure and want your opponent to get off you, spend 1 bar of meter to push them off.  If they really annoy you spend 2 bars of meter to push them off and follow up with a full combo!*Names Not finalized

WHO ARE WE?Cereal Killaz is being developed by a team of industry professionals whose long-standing passion for fighting games and breakfast foods has led them to collaborate on making the game of their dreams!
Mikhail "Mythallica" Sebastian Project LeadROLE: Creator/Creative DirectorCOMBAT STYLE: Defensive Long-range, Offensive Close RangeSPECIAL MOVE: ForesightFAVORITE FIGHTER: Magneto MvCBREAKFAST OF CHOICE: Eggs, Oatmeal and Toast! Or, a good protein shake.BIO: Mikhail Sebastian is an Illustrator Animator and and Glyph Award Winning published author with an undergraduates in Illustration from the Savannah College of Art and Design. He’s who’s done work for The Los Angeles Clippers, Carl Jones, Universal Pictures, Noir Caesar and the United States Census Department just to name a few. While he’s contributed to the visions of many great minds, it is his own ideas that he has committed his time, effort and resources towards the most.WEBSITE: https://mythapparel.com/
Michel Mony ProgrammerROLE: Programmer and stuffCOMBAT STYLE: LangschwertSPECIAL MOVE: GambitFAVORITE FIGHTER: Smoke (MK9 2011)BREAKFAST OF CHOICE: BagelsBIO: Michel is a freelance game developer credited on over 100 projects to date. He has worked with Ubisoft, Riot Games, Capcom, Hasbro, Sony, and many more, in various capacities ranging from Producer, Designer and Programmer.WEBSITE: https://www.linkedin.com/in/michelmony/  Andrew "Hien" RattanakongkhamLead Animator ROLE: Lead Animator & Gameplay designerCOMBAT STYLE: B-boyingSPECIAL MOVE: Fire FootworkFAVORITE FIGHTER: Ryu from Street FighterBREAKFAST OF CHOICE: He doesn’t eat breakfast…(Strange one)BIO: Andrew is a freelance artist who has worked heavily in pixel art animations under a variety of projects and games. His love of fighting games has ushered his passion straight into the creative force that drives our visceral animations.WEBSITE: https://www.artstation.com/xhienx Corey Rivera Background ArtistROLE: Background Artist and UI DesignCOMBAT STYLE: Spike FiendSPECIAL MOVE: Suck and CuckFAVORITE FIGHTER: King K. Rool (SSB5 2018)BREAKFAST OF CHOICE: Pancakes and BaconBIO: Corey is a freelance illustrator recent graduate from Scad. Indie games and animations fuel his inspiration in character design and background art to create illustrations lively in color and design.WEBSITE: https://www.crivera.net/   LEE WILLIAMSWriterCOMBAT STYLE: OrigamiSPECIAL MOVE: Feign InjuryFAVORITE FIGHTER: Blanka from Street Fighter 2BREAKFAST OF CHOICE: Bacon and eggsBIO: Lee is a writer and narrative designer with many years of experience, having previously worked on titles published by Ubisoft, Devolver Digital and Choice of Games among others.WEBSITE: https://www.leewilliams.eu/  WHERE WILL YOUR MONEY GO?Walking into this project, we knew we had one and one goal only: TO MAKE THE GAME. We've seen countless campaigns falter from biting off more than they could chew. Our Goal is simple: To create a fully functional demo that we can shop to potential publishers for a full game in the future. Should we receive the funds to produce a full build ourselves, then that's exactly what we'll do. The game is the goal! TLDR: If you help us fund this project, we WILL make this game. Simple as that! REWARDS*Physical Items: We know you want them, and as awesome as many of the physical items we have planned are, the current global situation would only further complicate the process of making this game. Which is our main priority. We've instead created a batch of Digital Rewards completely exclusive to the backers of this campaign that we fill will peak your interest all the same! The Estimated dates attached to the perks ONLY apply to the digital deliverables (OST, Digital Artbook, Digital Comic Book, Wallpapers etc) Dates for build releases will be announced at a later date. STRETCH GOALS! Risks & Challenges Some risks involved have been mentioned by the community prior to the launch of this campaign. While cease & desist letters are certainly possible, we are confident that our project meets the criteria for protection under Section 107 of the US Copy right law and thus is protected under satirical fair use. However, we know that this won’t prevent potential threats from being made. We’ve reached out to a trademark lawyer to assist us with any and all legal processes that could arise in the future. We understand the real risk of C&D threats, so if a situation arises to where changes to our characters will need to be made, that also means we'd have to change their animations from the ground up. We are prepared to tackle any situations should they arise.The main risk involved in making Cereal Killaz would be the potential of conflicting schedules due to the adverse effects of the current global pandemic. Our team is small and dedicated however, we are all fulltime workers in our designated careers. While that will not inhibit the overall production of the game, it could occasionally affect our working schedules. The more successful the campaign however, the more time our team would be able to dedicate to the game (in most of our cases, even making it our full-time job), which would help reduce scheduling conflicts. There’s always the risk of something unexpected and outside of our control slowing the development of the game, but such possibilities become remote once Mythallica Inc. has funding to work with.

story:
The Dead Division is an online web-browser game that tries to best simulate what it would be like to live in a world, where every day can be your last. You will be given the opportunity to have lives of others in your hands and to build a thriving settlement. You‘ll make serious decisions, that can have fatal consequences, or fight for your live with hordes of undead and raiders from other settlements, that will try to kill you. 

WEB: https://thedeaddivision.com/

FB: https://www.facebook.com/TheDeadDivision/

YT: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCf_K2KrcJvir_PK7LDuuBaQ

 

    The Dead Division is a multiplayer survival RPG game that’s situated in the near future. The player will became a leader of one of the groups, which have survived deadly disease, and they must build a settlement to provide them with security from the outside threats. The game will run on a 12-hour cycle and will include seasonal changes. Every change of weather and also the day/night changes will affect the course of the game. These changes will randomly change the difficulty. The game will be based on the real use of electric and thermal energy.

​-------------------------------------------

BUILD YOUR SETTLEMENT

​-------------------------------------------

    Build a safe hideout for your people from the remains of a former settlement, where they can defend themselves even from the greatest threats. With a growing settlement, new opportunities will open up for the player, that will help him get food, produce weapons for defense and hunting, and allow you to become self-sufficient. In addition, it will allow you to trade with merchants visiting the settlement.

​-------------------------------------------

RADIO TOWERS

​-------------------------------------------

    Although the construction of a radio tower takes a certain amount of players time, it’s completion will give the player possibility to chat with other players. Individual players will be able to communicate with each other through chat, which will include private messages and chat with other players on the map. The towers will have to be repaired as all other buildings, either as a result of attacks or due to bad weather. If it is damaged enough, the player will lose not only the minimap but also the possibility to communicate with other players. You will need to make the necessary corrections to reconnect, but this will take several times bigger amount of time. If the player does not do so, he will only see the nearby surroundings of his settlement.

​-------------------------------------------

METEOROLOGICAL STATION

​-------------------------------------------

    In The dead divison weather will have a major impact on the game's progress. The climate changes, that our planet has undergone in recent decade, have caused extreme weather events over a period of time. Thanks to the weather station, the player will know what the weather will be like in the next 7 days, allowing him to react quickly to changes and prepare himself for them. Thanks to the weather knowledge, he will also be able to capture the right time to send explorers to areas outside the settlement. The accuracy of the forecast will decrease with each subsequent day of the forecast. The forecast will provide the player with informations about current temperature, weather and current game time.

​-------------------------------------------

CURRENCY AND TRADE

​-------------------------------------------

    Medicaments are the official game currency, replacing worthless money from pre-disaster times. Vaccines will serve as premium currencies. Once certain conditions have been met, the player will be able to trade with the corporation and will gain the access to weapons and technology that he or she cannot normally obtain. The player will be free to choose whether he will use the vaccines for trading, or to remove the symptoms of his fellow workers affected by the disease. Untreatment of the disease will result in death and the need to teach a new expert in the field. Learning will take some time and will have a negative impact on the running of the settlement. Therefore, a player should consider being willing to take such a risk.

​-------------------------------------------

ITEMS

​-------------------------------------------

    There are currently about 100 items in the game. Their base consists of simple weapons, components to simplify the life of settlers and materials needed for their production. The player will acquire them by looting objects, eventually making them by the right combination of items.

 

​-------------------------------------------

MAP DESIGN

​-------------------------------------------

    The map will contain approximately 100 sectors. Each of them will have different sizes and different living conditions. The sectors will be divided into those in which players will have the possibility to build a settlement and those in which hostile raiders will be located. The remaining sectors will include unexplored areas in which settlers will be able to obtain the raw materials and objects needed to run the settlements. Individual parts of the map will gradually unlock with the arrival of new patches. ! THE FINAL VERSION OF THE MAP CAN BE DIFFERENT FROM THE CURRENT ONE AND WITH NEW UPDATES IT WILL CHANGE ITS DESIGN!

​-------------------------------------------

LOOTING SYSTEM

​-------------------------------------------

    Acquisition of items will be done by sending explorers to areas outside the settlement. Upon arrival of the explorer at the destination, the player will receive a notification and a list of items found. An explorer may be attacked by enemy raiders or undead during his mission. In case of danger it will be up to the player whether he will stands up to the enemy or runs away and leaves objects found behind. Explorers will provide the resources needed to run the settlement. They will even provide the player with informations about newly found areas and treasures that hides in them, and help reveal the past that preceded the disaster. For some information, it will be possible to obtain medicines, vaccines or equipment from the corporation. In the future, we plan to change the looting system to make it more interactive. The player will have to manually search through the individual objects, and will depend on his observation skills whether he finds all the objects that are there. There may be a situation where the noise will bring unwanted guests to react.

​-------------------------------------------

CRAFTING

​-------------------------------------------

    Convert seemingly useless waste to weapons and useful items to help you survive and protect yourself from danger. Grow your own plants and with the help of research create stimulants that will heal injuries or temporarily improve settlers' performance in different ways.

​-------------------------------------------

UPGRADE

​-------------------------------------------

    Each building in the settlement will have a number of improvements, thanks to which, for example, would be possible to increase food production, improve settlement defense, or speed up explorers on the map. Weapons will also have several levels of enhancement that will only be available to the player after the conditions for their research will be met. At the same time, the player will have to manually perform simple repairs and use the raw materials obtained to maintain them.

​-------------------------------------------

EXTENSION OF ITEMS

​-------------------------------------------

    By expanding the number of items, players will be given new opportunities to increase the chance of successful run of the settlement and settlers security. New items will be added that will be necesary for completion of quests and to make progress on storyline, and new technology enhancements and weapons that the player will be able to obtain from the corporation. New crafting components will also be added.

 

 

​-------------------------------------------

1000$ - SOUND EFFECTS WITH BETTER QUALITY

​-------------------------------------------

    At the moment, we are unable to create our own audio material for the game, and we are reliant solely on free sound effects. Your support will allow us to purchase higher quality effects that will enhance the game experience.

​-------------------------------------------

1500$ - STORY

​-------------------------------------------

    The game will include a full story in which the player reveals a past that explains the origin of the disease and the events before the epidemic. Proceeding in the story finds out what future the fate prepared for him. All of the important informations the player will gain through collecting newspaper articles, dialogs with other survivors and by performing tasks. The story will gradually evolve by unlocking new locations.

​-------------------------------------------

2000$ - SUPPORT FOR ANDROID AND IOS

​-------------------------------------------

    Create an application that allows players to run The Dead Division on their mobile devices and tablets.

​-------------------------------------------

2500$ - MULTIPLAYER

​-------------------------------------------

    Multiplayer will contain multiple modes, depending on the number of players. They will be able to try how difficult it is to build a better, prosperous and safer settlement. One mode will be tower defense, in which players will need to manage the common territory and work together to survive. They will be threatened not only by frequent undead and outlaws attacks, but also by their opponents for approximately 10 minutes. The winner team will be the one, that will manage to get a better score, based on the amount of raw materials obtained, enemies killed, and the level of their settlement.

​-------------------------------------------

4000$ - CLAN

​-------------------------------------------

    The possibility to start a clan will cost the player a one-time fee, with which he will also be given the opportunity to win vaccines depending on the success against the rival clans. The clan leader will be responsible for distributing the work they entrust to individual players such as exploration, defense, and collection of raw materials. Clan mode will be different from normal campaigns, among other things, by having to build a completely new settlement and the freedom to deploy individual buildings. The clan will include game modes that will differ from classic multiplayer and collaboration.

 

    Its still more than half year befor the releasing an alpha version of the game, so why did we chose Indiegogo. The reason is simple, we need a feedback. Indiegogo is giving us an oportunite to see if The Dead Division will be played by nowadays players, or if it will die without anyone noticing it. Next thing is a money. Indiegogo will provide us with the most important thing to run a game, the money support. The amount of money will decide what should be our biggest priority. Another thing is time. Making a game needs a lot of time, and that is exactly what we need. 

 

    Received money will be used to pay things connected with crowdfunding, like fees for Indiegogo services, fees for money exhange and taxes. Part of the money will be used to pay the rent for the server and costs connected witch project leading, for example equipments upgrade. We belive that more than half of the goal mone will be acquired. Your financial support will help us with recruiting more people to our development group, which will speed the whole work.

 

    The release date for alpha version is expected to be at december 2019, for that time the game will be tested privately. Public release date is expected to be somwhere around first half of 2020. We will provide you with informations about our development progress. These informations will be posted on our Indiegogo, Facebook and YouTube accaunts. For the registrated users, we will also provide informations on our offical     website, which will contain a news about developing.

 

    Alike a lots of projects nor in our case is granted that no problems will appear, these problems could have a negative influence to targets and deadline compilance. Our team is made up from small group of people, who are working on the game in their free time alongside their jobs. We started developing the game in second half of 2016, and we are trying to give it most of our time. We have     got a lots of plans, but so do we have a long way in front of us. We believe that we will get over all of the obstacles ahead, and we will make the game that will be played all over the world. Hi, we are sorry but the translation is made by one of us. He is not born English nor American, so forgive him the mistakes made in the translation. We are looking forward to hearing from you.
