story:
A Fast Paced Sci-Fi Stadium Tournament

From the Creators of HIVE and Welcome to Graystone

 

In a Nutshell

Battle Pass is a Free To Play, fast paced stadium shooter, pitting players against each other in a cut throat tournament filled with blood, gadgets, powerups, and wagers on your favorite players. 

  • Fast Paced, close combat shooting mechanics
  • Gadgets, upgrades, custom loadouts, and skins 
  • Leaderboards and tournaments 
  • Wagers on the best players in-game
  • Spectate from the stands in high-profile matches 
  • 1v1, Duo, Trio, and Squad matches 

 

This Season's Host

KAI

Every season features new contestants, and a new host! Our Premiere Season is hosted by Kai! Kai is a local celebrity in their hometown, and is ready to make it big time! 

 

Meet Your Contestants

Taken from around the world, our current contestants are their towns slobs, chads and thieves! Meet Battle Pass Season 1's Contestants (And yes, there will be more seasons - hopefully)

CLARISSA

Aww, Clarissa, such a sweetheart. She's snuck her way into everyone's  hearts and minds back home. Little do they know she's been digging her hands in their pockets and funding her own fun. Her ability to take advantage of her surrounding resources made it an easy choice to give her the ability to request load drops and have a near superhuman agility. 

 

GENTRY

Gentry is the leader of the renowned motorcycle gang Hands Off, a vigilante group known for their violence against offenders. They're actually a pretty good person, they just like killin'. Because of their love from brute force, Gentry has a higher health, but slower recovery. 

 

MINDY

Mindy is known back home as Cherry. She's a preacher's wife by day - hacker  by night. She used her tech savvy to set her family up for success... By draining everyone in her town dry. Mindy has the ability to hack others' gadgets in game. 

 

TUCKER

Meet Tucker! He's a looker and he knows it! Widely known in his town for his ability to sneak around on the many women he entertains, we've given Tucker the power of invisibility! 

 

Inspirations

 

I used to (and still do) LOVE games like Quake, Unreal Tournament, Mortal Kombat, etc. The big concepts that these games share? 

Speed and Gore

These games were covered in blood and guts, intense music, dark, demonic settings. I want to build a game that focuses on fast, fun gameplay mechanics, blood and gore, and a sense of achievement after an intense match. 

 

How It's Made

I've made a living as a full-time game developer, and I've been super lucky. Some of my games in the past have been released thanks to campaigns like this. I've learned a lot, from mechanics, to optimization. 

This game will be made primarily in Unreal Engine 4. In my opinion, this is one of the greatest game engines available today. Unreal Engine was used to make games like Fortnite, Mortal Kombat, Injustice, and many, many, many more. 

I specialize as an Unreal Engine blueprint developer online as a freelancer and from royalties from previous games. Because of my experience in this I know regardless of the success or failures of this campaign - this game will be made. 

 

The Price Breakdown

So why $10,000? 

The Team

Like I mentioned, I could put my nose to the grinder and just work on this game alone - but that's not what the players deserve. They deserve a more well-rounded team to help build a fantastic online experience. 

I would like to hire another freelancer like myself to help in the level design and development of the character mechanics. 

I also don't believe in paying the bare minimum, and I would like to be able to pay a developer a fair amount for their time - as everyone deserves. 

The Publishing

In such a large gaming landscape, online games like this are massively popular - which means a lot of people are making them. In order to stand out, I'll need to push a massive marketing campaign to help ensure we have a good fan base to have a hard launch and make for more exciting tournaments on our first run. 

Other Expenses

This game relies heavily on the contestants and host, which will require a LOT of custom voice acting to be recorded to keep the game dynamic, and allow for constant responses from the announcers and players. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate right now that's okay! We hope we've still got you excited about the next fast-paced, free-to-play tournament. If so, share this campaign to friends, family, and other gamers!
story_txt:
A Fast Paced Sci-Fi Stadium Tournament
From the Creators of HIVE and Welcome to Graystone
 
In a Nutshell
Battle Pass is a Free To Play, fast paced stadium shooter, pitting players against each other in a cut throat tournament filled with blood, gadgets, powerups, and wagers on your favorite players. 

Fast Paced, close combat shooting mechanics
Gadgets, upgrades, custom loadouts, and skins 
Leaderboards and tournaments 
Wagers on the best players in-game
Spectate from the stands in high-profile matches 
1v1, Duo, Trio, and Squad matches 

 
This Season's Host

KAI
Every season features new contestants, and a new host! Our Premiere Season is hosted by Kai! Kai is a local celebrity in their hometown, and is ready to make it big time! 
 

Meet Your Contestants
Taken from around the world, our current contestants are their towns slobs, chads and thieves! Meet Battle Pass Season 1's Contestants (And yes, there will be more seasons - hopefully)

CLARISSA
Aww, Clarissa, such a sweetheart. She's snuck her way into everyone's  hearts and minds back home. Little do they know she's been digging her hands in their pockets and funding her own fun. Her ability to take advantage of her surrounding resources made it an easy choice to give her the ability to request load drops and have a near superhuman agility. 
 

GENTRY
Gentry is the leader of the renowned motorcycle gang Hands Off, a vigilante group known for their violence against offenders. They're actually a pretty good person, they just like killin'. Because of their love from brute force, Gentry has a higher health, but slower recovery. 
 

MINDY
Mindy is known back home as Cherry. She's a preacher's wife by day - hacker  by night. She used her tech savvy to set her family up for success... By draining everyone in her town dry. Mindy has the ability to hack others' gadgets in game. 
 

TUCKER
Meet Tucker! He's a looker and he knows it! Widely known in his town for his ability to sneak around on the many women he entertains, we've given Tucker the power of invisibility! 
 
Inspirations
 
I used to (and still do) LOVE games like Quake, Unreal Tournament, Mortal Kombat, etc. The big concepts that these games share? 
Speed and Gore
These games were covered in blood and guts, intense music, dark, demonic settings. I want to build a game that focuses on fast, fun gameplay mechanics, blood and gore, and a sense of achievement after an intense match. 
 
How It's Made
I've made a living as a full-time game developer, and I've been super lucky. Some of my games in the past have been released thanks to campaigns like this. I've learned a lot, from mechanics, to optimization. 
This game will be made primarily in Unreal Engine 4. In my opinion, this is one of the greatest game engines available today. Unreal Engine was used to make games like Fortnite, Mortal Kombat, Injustice, and many, many, many more. 
I specialize as an Unreal Engine blueprint developer online as a freelancer and from royalties from previous games. Because of my experience in this I know regardless of the success or failures of this campaign - this game will be made. 
 
The Price Breakdown
So why $10,000? 
The Team
Like I mentioned, I could put my nose to the grinder and just work on this game alone - but that's not what the players deserve. They deserve a more well-rounded team to help build a fantastic online experience. 
I would like to hire another freelancer like myself to help in the level design and development of the character mechanics. 
I also don't believe in paying the bare minimum, and I would like to be able to pay a developer a fair amount for their time - as everyone deserves. 
The Publishing
In such a large gaming landscape, online games like this are massively popular - which means a lot of people are making them. In order to stand out, I'll need to push a massive marketing campaign to help ensure we have a good fan base to have a hard launch and make for more exciting tournaments on our first run. 
Other Expenses
This game relies heavily on the contestants and host, which will require a LOT of custom voice acting to be recorded to keep the game dynamic, and allow for constant responses from the announcers and players. 
 
Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't donate right now that's okay! We hope we've still got you excited about the next fast-paced, free-to-play tournament. If so, share this campaign to friends, family, and other gamers!

story:
The Ultimate Gamer Dream

Ever since we were little kids we have made video games part of our lives. Some of them were so fun that we spent entire afternoons playing them, others had such amazing stories and characters that we even dreamed about living in their worlds and fighting alongside them.

Growing up in the late 80's, 90's and the first decade of the 21st century gave us a unique opportunity to experience the best of each gaming console, either a brand new Nintendo™, Xbox™ or PlayStation™, or an inherited one from our parents or relatives, that old Atari™, Sega™ or Intellivision™ that we didn't quite understand but was super fun to play with . We got to see the best of the Arcade era, the Console era and the Online era. We went from proving ourselves who was the best through a High Score in the Arcade Room to Online Ranking Systems and Online Co-op.

And so we got together with a dream, to create an event where the best experiences of each era could coexist whilst bringing new ideas to it. To create the Ultimate Gamer Dream, give back to the community that has given us so much our entire lives and take video game events to the next level.

 

Taking Video Game Events to the Next Level

When we look at video game or e-sports events today we see two things. First, the competitive level is amazing, the best of each game clashing, fighting or shooting their way to glory, some gameplays are breathtaking and make us jump out of our seats, which brings us to our second point; The audience, modern video game events and e-sports competitions focus their attention on a tournament, hence the audience turns into a passive bystander of the action occurring. Sure, we enjoy watching these amazing matches, but there's always this little voice in our heads that says "You could do this better" or "You wouldn't have chosen that combo or skill".

EXP Fest wants to change this, by giving the audience an active role during the event we want to encourage friendly competitive matches all over the arena. Our team is developing a Mobile App that will integrate the best of vintage arcade gaming and modern technologies into one awesome experience for everyone attending EXP Fest. By empowering the audience we break the paradigm of top-level competitive gaming and divide the event into Amateur and Pro Tournaments. Just go play the games you love, earn EXP and level up to obtain amazing rewards, just like 80's and 90's Arcade Rooms.

The idea is to have an event that involves more than one game at a time. We have categorized e-sport competitive gaming into 5 genres: Massive Online Battle Arena (MOBA), First Person Shooter (FPS), Real Time Strategy (RTS), Fighting and Sports; with a bonus 'Vintage' category. This will give EXP Fest's attendants 6 different ways to prove their worth, level up their EXP Badges™ and attain Ultimate Gaming Honor and the rewards that come with glory.

 

Get your EXP Ticket and download our Mobile App

Look for your favorite games and prove your skills

Play matches to get EXP Points and level up your EXP Badges

Upgrade your EXP Badges and you will receive a notification

Approach the nearest EXP Post and claim your prize

Spin the wheel to test your luck

You can get trinkets, gaming gear, video games...

and so much more!

EXP Fest is changing the way e-sports events are done

Taking video game events to the next level

 

Choose Your Class

We believe that there are many kinds of gamers, casual Friday-night, hardcore Cap-level ones, vintage lovers, FPS fans, Online gamers, Couch co-op enthusiasts; and so we are bringing something everyone can enjoy. We might have disagreements on which game or console is the best, but one thing all gamers agree on is the fact that practice makes perfect. Bring your skills to the party and level up the EXP Badge™ of your favorite genre, or be the overlord of the event and try to master all genres, but beware, competition will be fierce and the spoils of war not easily taken.

The EXP Development Team firmly believes that everyone has a unique set of skills and so we put up together a great party where everyone has a role, meet the team and what they bring to the table:

 

Short-term and Mid-term Goals

Our dream is to make EXP Fest a recurring event that takes place in a different city each time. In order to do that we need resources, partners and new team members. This campaign targets all those elements.
The money we raise through this campaign will be used to add new team members; as in every Role Playing Game out there, each class has a different set of skills, and they are all needed in order to accomplish the objectives, so does EXP Fest, we need a team of Developers to help shape-up the Mobile App that will set the difference between our event and the ones out there, we need a Marketing team that help us contact Sponsors for the event, as well as spreading the word about our features to gamers all over the world so they can jump in and help or enjoy the event once it is out there. A Logistics team in charge of setting up the arena for the event as well as contacting Pro-Teams interested in participating in Pro Tournaments.

The equipment needed to create the Mobile App is very simple but very much needed, you cannot go hunt for End-game loot using your Lv. 1 Wooden Sword, so we need to upgrade our equipment in order to achieve the event all gamers dream of. A video game event made by true gamers.

Our creative team came up with some visualization ideas for the Mobile App*, don't share this link with our Mobile Developers, it might create a dispute that needs to be settled at Final Destination:

* These images are in Alpha stage and don't reflect the actual Mobile App or its features.

 

Perks and Rewards

We are going to divide these into two categories, Perks  are the ones obtained through our IndieGoGo.com campaign they go from a very from-the-heart Thank You note to awesome boosts during your attendance to EXP Fest. Afraid you cannot make it to the event but want to help us either way? We have things for you too. We are offering Perks that include T-Shirts, Decals with our awesome EXP Mascots that will be unveiled soon,  Loot Crates with geeky and amazing things in them . Our top supporters will also be involved in the App development process, we are going to need the community to test our Mobile App during its beta stage and who better to test it than our own crowdfunding community, this will help us improve our final product and make sure gamers get what they really want out of an e-sport event.

The Reward System works a little bit differently, these are things EXP Fest's attendants will get every time they get an EXP Badge™ upgrade in any of the genres present during the event. It's very simple, play your favorite games, get experience points, level up your EXP Badge™ and claim awesome rewards. A list of rewards will be delivered in future updates but you can expect awesome things both to use during the event as well as to take home with you.

 

Spread The Word

Did you like our idea but  can't donate right now? Don't worry you can still help us, like our campaign on social media, follow us, like us, retweet us, tell your friends, give us your feedback. Any help is most welcome.

Furthermore, if you are a geeky gamer like us and would like to join our team don't be afraid to contact us, we are always looking for new team members.

 Instagram

 Twitter

 Facebook

 YouTube


Thank you very much for reading and helping us,

 

The EXP Development Team.

story:
So, as massive fans of business simulation games like Capitalism, Transport Tycoon and Ports of call, we are planning to take this to the next level, and create an MMO where you do much of the same stuff as you did in these games, but in competition with thousands of other players all over the world.

In the initial verson of the game, you will be given 3 main avenues to achieve the goal of being the fattest cat around; Industry, Transport and Trade.

After launch we are planning to roll out expansions every 6 months, that will be free, expanding this to include things like Real Estate, Investment Banking, Retail and possibly even more shady avenues. In a sandbox, only your imagination is the limit.

Industry

Build and manage factories, improve them, hire workers and managers. As a new player, limited capital and skills will force you to start small, but play your cards right and before you knw it you may be sitting on a manufacturing empire. Succeeding in the industrial field will require you to both compete, sometimes agressively, and cooperate with other players.

Will you micromanage your empire yourself, or will you hire managers to take some of the load? Will you buy raw materials off the market, or strike deals with other players who can supply them at a better price? How will you get materials transported to your factories, and how will you get your goods transported to the consumers?

Do you place your factories in a less desirable town, where it is cheaper to hire workers and buy land, but you might have trouble selling your goods locally and have to ship it further? Or will you spend more on your workforce to save on transport costs? How about upgrades and automation?

The list goes on and on, and succeeding will not be as simple as it might sound.

Transport

Perhaps your dream is to be a shipping magnate? In an open world with thousands of players and NPCs there will always be an abundance of goods and raw materials that needs to be transported quickly, safely and cheaply. You will have to decide if you want to be focused, or full service.

Perhaps you will focus on trucking, and buy the services of rail companies, or do you ally yourself with another player focusing on railways, or on ships? Just remember to keep you fleet maintained and deliver on time. Your clients will be able to rate your performance, and those ratings will be visible to prospective clients!

It is however not just goods and materials that needs to be moved. Public transport is also an option you may want to look into. Perhaps an airline is more up your alley? Or a Cruise Line? Just make sure you don’t beat up your passengers and throw them off the plane!

Transporting people can be done in two ways. You can accept city contracts, perhaps running a citys bus service, or you can operate on the open market. Buy a plane, set up a route between two cities, and hope the passengers will choose you over the competition. The NPC passengers will base their choice on price, brand recognition and brand reputation.

Brand reputation is a stat based on your reliability and safety record. Keep your planes, trains and buses running on time, avoid accidents, and your reputation will increase, making more passengers prefer your service over those with lower reputation, to some extent even if you charge higher ticket prices.

Trade

Buy low, sell high. It’s easy right? If it was, we’d all be doing it in the real world aswell. The world of trading is one of massive risk, and potentially massive rewards.

The One Percent boasts a fully functional stock market that includes both NPC and player corporations. The moment you create a character and your corporation, it is automatically added to the listing. Your share price will then fluctuate naturally based on factors like net value of your corporation, profitability and trade volume.

There is also a commodity market where you can buy and sell goods and raw materials in bulk. Especially in the raw material market this opens up potential for cooperation and negotiation between players. Do you buy the raw materials your factories need off the market, or can you negotiate a better deal directly with a player producing them?

Are you sure this will work?

No new game can be completely certain it will be a success. We do however focus on creating a game WE would like to play, and as we're not self centered enough to believe we are one of a kind, the fact that we would like to play it, and people we talk to wants to play it, makes us confident there are many out there like us.

To ensure we deliver a product that will succeed, we also invite you to actively take part in the development of the game. Have an idea or feedback on one of ours? Something you would like to see in the game? We would LOVE to hear about it!

How can I help without spending money?

Not everyone has the loose cash to back our project financially, and we fully appreciate that. There are however other ways you can help us along the way, and be a part of making the One Percent.

  • Like us on Facebook and share our posts and page with your friends
  • Join our community and take part in shaping the game.
  • Spread the word!

Thank you for your time and support!

story:
DOWNLOAD STEAM DEMO NOW!

 

Carlos wakes up in a psychiatric clinic with PTSD. His wife wants him to recover and return to their family and his psychiatrist is trying to help him. But Carlos can not find a way out of his mind. The only chance he has is to delve down into his nightmares and learn as much as possible…


Features



Immerse yourself in a world of insanity.
All of the details from Carlos' nightmares and reality intersect in an unknown way. Caution! The boundaries of reality can be erased!

What line of conduct will you choose under the circumstances?
The psychiatrist tries to dig into Carlos' secret thoughts. Should Carlos trust these people? Or has he completely lost his mind?

References to real events.
References to real events and the Cuban setting create a unique atmosphere. 

Memorise details.
You must memorise both the nightmares and reality to decipher what is happening and how you can solve it.

 

Gameplay

Double includes gameplay in two worlds - the real world and the dream.

Dreams:
In dreams, the gameplay is a psychedelic 2d shooter with cover based gameplay. The boundaries of possible and impossible are erased, so the most unexpected can happen. Also, do not forget why you are here - gather information that can be useful in exploring the real world of the hero.

Reality:
In the mental hospital, gameplay is a quest based on dialogue and choices. The development of the plot depends on what decisions you make. Be careful - sometimes dreams can penetrate into reality.

 

Music

An important element of the Cuban atmosphere is music: acoustic guitar is a traditional instrument in Cuba, mixed with electric guitar riffs and electronic instruments to add a modern feel and a psychedelic feeling. In total, we have a deep and intense sound, which literally sucks in the atmosphere of the game.

 

Platforms and Localiztion

The game is being developed for WIndows OS and will be distributed through the Steam online store. Also we may distribute to other platforms in the future.
We are currently planning to support the following languages: English, Russian, Spanish.

 

Development stage

The game has been in development since August 2017. Now that the project is nearing to completion, we have released. The release is planned for the august of 2018.

 

Funding and rewards

Project is being developed with the enthusiasm of two brave people.
Now the project is close to completion but we need some funding to complete the game. 

Some info where the collected funds will go:

It is important to know that to know we are young team and we do not have a good PR company so the most of funding go into this.

Rewards:
3$ - Supporter
Thank you for supporting us! Every help is important, comrade!

story_txt:
DOWNLOAD STEAM DEMO NOW!

 
Carlos wakes up in a psychiatric clinic with PTSD. His wife wants him to recover and return to their family and his psychiatrist is trying to help him. But Carlos can not find a way out of his mind. The only chance he has is to delve down into his nightmares and learn as much as possible…

Features
Immerse yourself in a world of insanity.All of the details from Carlos' nightmares and reality intersect in an unknown way. Caution! The boundaries of reality can be erased!

What line of conduct will you choose under the circumstances?The psychiatrist tries to dig into Carlos' secret thoughts. Should Carlos trust these people? Or has he completely lost his mind?
References to real events.References to real events and the Cuban setting create a unique atmosphere. 
Memorise details.You must memorise both the nightmares and reality to decipher what is happening and how you can solve it.
 
Gameplay

Double includes gameplay in two worlds - the real world and the dream.
Dreams:In dreams, the gameplay is a psychedelic 2d shooter with cover based gameplay. The boundaries of possible and impossible are erased, so the most unexpected can happen. Also, do not forget why you are here - gather information that can be useful in exploring the real world of the hero.
Reality:In the mental hospital, gameplay is a quest based on dialogue and choices. The development of the plot depends on what decisions you make. Be careful - sometimes dreams can penetrate into reality.
 
Music
An important element of the Cuban atmosphere is music: acoustic guitar is a traditional instrument in Cuba, mixed with electric guitar riffs and electronic instruments to add a modern feel and a psychedelic feeling. In total, we have a deep and intense sound, which literally sucks in the atmosphere of the game.
 
Platforms and Localiztion
The game is being developed for WIndows OS and will be distributed through the Steam online store. Also we may distribute to other platforms in the future.We are currently planning to support the following languages: English, Russian, Spanish.
 
Development stage
The game has been in development since August 2017. Now that the project is nearing to completion, we have released. The release is planned for the august of 2018.
 
Funding and rewards

Project is being developed with the enthusiasm of two brave people.Now the project is close to completion but we need some funding to complete the game. 
Some info where the collected funds will go:

It is important to know that to know we are young team and we do not have a good PR company so the most of funding go into this.

story:
THIS IS ABOUT ME - JUST A GUY.

My name is Radames Medeiros, 30, creative director / "jack of all trades". From Earth like you. For the past 11 years i worked with something that people "hates" >> ads. So I decided it was time to stop all that and do something that I liked and motivated people. Curious as I have always been, I have always been easy to learn everything, I began 2 years ago to venture into making games, but I’ve spent years narrating table rpg games and playing, always playing, rpgs of the most varied  kinds,  creating worlds, systems and narratives. As an advertiser I created several pieces and I even had some winning scripts, but that does not count here. based on all my knowledge and skills acquired until then. See, I'm not bragging about anything, but since there is an internet I visit tutorials and learn things, simple as that. These abilities enabled me to create - what you will now see - practically alone. (I would like to stress that when I say "Alone" I mean the main job. I would not be where I am today without help from other people). It was only in 2017 that I took the courage to abandon all advertising life and devote full time to development, even though my base is still the art direction I can produce interesting things (I think.). Well, life is a box of surprises, some of you must know that and along with all this 2017 also brought me depression, invaded my house, my father had an avc, there were two cases of cancer in the family, my paternal grandmother died 1 week after our reunion more than 10 years away. Other than that life here is not very easy, my father, mother and maternal grandmother (85 years old) struggle hard to survive, it was my duty to raise my head and pursue the dream / work that I always wanted. Many struggled for this and I should sacrifice myself and strive for double. And that's how I did it, since four months have passed. I have many joys to share now, work happily 24/7 and have been inspiring people to pursue their dreams too.

I have only a few desires and duties that I want to share with you: I would like with this campaign to be able to put more people on this boat that I navigate. Developing alone is good on the one hand, but I want to offer more quality to you, put my ideas at the level I see. Directing art and doing art do not always go hand in hand, although I can exemplify my visions, more skillful people could accomplish them better than I do. In addition I would like the intense participation of the community whenever possible, as I make this game for you. So they have fun and have a piece of what they want for their life somewhere.

It is very easy to talk to me if you wish, my contacts will be at the end of this project and I would very much like your opinion and ideas.

STEAM LINK: https://goo.gl/U2xXvU

Well, let's go to the point:

 

THE INTERN - GAMEPLAY

The Intern - O Estágio places the player in the shoes of an aspiring creative lady who will travel through worlds, times and dimensions in search of 3 other masks to occupy a position with the gods of creation. The game is separated into 8 stages, each phase containing 2 stages, 1 mini-boss and 1 boss. These levels will be produced jointly with the community and released episodically, always in pairs, until all are complete. Players traverse the maps to find the portals that lead to bosses, accumulate experience that leads to increase Mana (main attribute of the game that defines the basic attributes of the character as it increases), evolve skills and enable transformations by collecting 3 different types of Mana, which are adapted to the style that the player chooses (Fire, wind and water / melee, speed and distance), besides being able to count on the aid of Summons acquired when defeating the mini-bosses and extra powers granted by the masks collected by defeating the main bosses. The game also features some mini-games and puzzles, such as races, chases, secret places to visit. Each phase contains about 30 minutes of gameplay, totaling 320 minutes of gameplay on average. The player will travel through 3 planets of different dimensions and times until they complete all and be able to enable the last challenge.

  • Don't be afraid! Mana is everything.
    While you have your Mana stock full you 're virtually imortal and more the Mana don't have a "limit". So while you are accumulating more mana you'll be more powerfull. 
  • I've planned transfomations to be a expression of your power!
  • When was the last time you completed a game?

How about playing quietly and get to the end, record that gameplay, edit the video and still have time to go out with friends? The Intern looks on two fronts: TIME / BENEFIT. Of course if you spend more time inside the game you will have greater benefits but if you are that casual player who just wants to enjoy the story and get to the end of it all. This game is for you too!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game tells the story of a girl on a journey through dimensions / worlds / universes / parallel times. She is "plucked" from her common life (newly formed job-seeking and frustrated with life, living in a world where everything is boring) after receiving a special message inviting her to get a gray bus that would take her to compete for a vacancy, she desperately runs after the opportunity. What the girl did not expect is that this search for this bus would take her, in the middle of a storm to visit another dimension.
After crossing the continuous space-time, it plunges into another world, where it knows its ally, the mask of truth. The mysterious mask unites the protagonist by releasing his power and controlling his mind and body. The truth enables the intricate young woman to release and accumulate the Mana that exists in all things, as well as grant special skills and knowledge directly to the wearer. The other world is a wonderful place, in fact it is one of several dimensions and times, an island of floating stones, very green and abundant and also dangerous life. True, the mask guides the protagonist through this wonderful world in order to reach the competitors the mysterious wave, but fails to arrive too late to the portal. It is when the young woman discovers that she is not alone there, that the message was actually a summoning and that this whole situation was part of a larger test in order to gather all 4 masks that control the Mana of things. The young woman's goal becomes clear, although she is still reluctant, even knowing everything the mask knows, she still did not "believe". Far from the truth, but confident in getting "The Job" she enters the portal willing to follow her new companion.
This is where the real adventure begins, our protagonist sets out to gather the four masks without knowing that such an objective was necessary to take on a very important job.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Everything that I'll show now it's the evolutions and the point that the game is right now after 4 mounths of solo development. I want to improve everything in the polish stage, so disregard what is in the moment and imagine what can come with your support. At the end of the project I will leave my references: what I would like to follow in order to give quality to the project.

THINGS THAT ME AND DEISI VE MADE SO FAR:

 

WHY INDIEGOGO?

Well. I don't want to make games cause i want to be rich. Far from this. I want make games to people have fun, to make their life a little more interesting, for inspiring. Of course I've expenses and plans, but 0 incoming. My family and friends 're my main backup and their are helping me on this journey. Deisi girl are working for free too right now and i'm living with my parents... So, why Indie gogo? Cause I want to give more quality and help who is helping me with the well deserved value of their work. I wish with that you can experience the best experience that my imagination and dedication can provide. With the Indiegogo I can put more people on the boat and help them with their dreams and searches! I Want to show for everyone that just a guy with help of the internet can make something good for the others. 
I have many ideals here you can make a difference too. With or without the success of the campaign I will continue the hard work and try to deliver my best to everyone.

Risks & Challenges

I don't see risks in the development of the game because for me it is a personal goal to complete it, I will go to the end in one way or another. Whatever comes will be good.

Challenges

Every day I have challenges in this development, discover new things, optimize, create contacts, tests and more tests, arts, everything has its share of tests. But that's what makes creating such a fun game, I believe.
I'd like to implement some things too, procedural Skills tree, more worlds, more mechanics, deeper stories, breakable things, there is much that can be done. For now, I want to achieve what I have already said here, and if by chance many help this little world can become a multiverse.


Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways you can help us:
The Simpler: sharing this campaign on your social networks. It costs nothing and you help me immensely. I saw a theory once that anyone is only 6 known away from you. I wish Terry Crews would see that! =) Can the internet get to you?XD
The second: is accompanying our work by following us on our social networks there's a lot of game material, gifs, updates, and you can talk direct to me:

  


The third: way is to get the pre-order in the ITCH.IO(We accept bitcoins too!) You can make a direct donation to paypal (To radacria@gmail.com ), playing the alpha, giving your opinion, talking to me personally in my networks, any kind of human support is welcome.
The fourth is getting our physical products shown below with Perks or HERE:

ANOTHER PRODUCTS AND PERKS

  • You can get the above physical itens here and help in the development too: https://goo.gl/9R4U1K

    Thank you so much!

story:
First of all, is there a demo?

Absolutely! Find it right here!

(Will not open in a new tab! Recommend using middle mouse button!)

 

So, what’s the story?

"Outertown" is a deep point and click visual novel in which you delve into the story of a bitter, juvenile cat's life and the challenges they face. In order to escape their past at Woodside Academy, they apply for an exchange programme at a whole new school dedicated to Fine Arts. There, they will find the welcoming cat Mira and listen to her story about her close relationship with the red panda, Charlie.

Talk to interesting characters who all have their own story to tell and follow Mira’s story as you both try to uncover a huge mystery that has struck this small town of Elk Grove as well as the hometown of the main character, Woodside.

How did it begin?

This game spawned as my graduation project in game dev high school. From the moment it was time to start working on the project I was very driven to get the first version of the demo done. It took a long time to finish and I worked completely independently, aside from the dialogue system code that my friend (@kallejillheden, aka “Jag”) wrote for me. When it was time to have the school exhibition I was so excited and it was a huge success!

After the exhibition I decided I wanted to remaster the demo. So I sat down and started working on it. This included making brand new graphics, adding new scenes, new characters and also some new music. During the course of production, @thatsicklypup joined the team as a writer; writing two new chapters of the game's story.

After months of working on polishing up the demo, I’m finally ready to take on the giant task of finishing the game.

 

So, what do you need?

We have set our goal to $12,500 and every dollar will go to the people who work on this game, both current and new possible team members. Other things that are needed is new hardware (new PC), new software (renewed licences for programs), putting the game out on platforms like “Steam” etc, music (hopefully we can commission a full original soundtrack) and money for the work I put in as well, seeing how I as of right now have no other income. If the funding goes well and we earn more than expected, this might become my full time project!

 

Alright, so what are the perks?

We have great perks for those who to decide to help us out early here! Many with multiple bonuses like for example;

 

Get your name in the credits!

Get your name in the credits, a copy of the game, access to the old demo and a thank you message!

 

Get your character in the game!

Ever dreamt of seeing your own character in the game, well look no further! With this perk you will get all the above and see yourself in-game in the background, a great opportunity for showing off in front of friends or family and maybe spark some interest in the game! This perk is limited to 10 slots though!

 

Get an Interactable Character in the game

So just seeing your character in game isn’t enough? Well this is the perk for you.

This perk will get you your own non-playable character which the main character will be able talk to and possibly ask questions. This perk has 10 slots available and will include the previously mentioned perk!

!!! IMPORTANT NOTE !!!

Both of the NPC character perks will require you to give your permission to slightly alter your character to fit the game. Changes might be putting a specific outfit on them or removing wings or other complicated attributes. We will both agree on a specific design that I feel is appropriate for the game, and then it will be inserted. Also, animal people only.

 

The Impact.

I feel this project is not only important for myself and my dreams but also for a bigger community as a whole, testing an old idea but with anthropomorphic characters that anyone, no matter the person's background can connect to!  I also want to offer a fresh new interesting game for the furry community who often don't get these kind of drama games, but also a generally cool visual novel for anyone who likes story games.

Just by contributing you will be part of this dream of mine and help this get to everyone!

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest obstacle we currently have is money, if we don’t get enough money it can slow down the process depending on how much we get, other obstacles can be if anyone under my employment or I get sick and if any hardware breaks down! The PC I have now is a laptop I got from high school and as wonderful as it is, I’m worried about it breaking down or crashing soon because it’s starting to get old.

But none of these will stop me from trying to complete this project, I have a love and passion for this game and rest assured knowing that I won’t stop working on this no matter the obstacle. No matter how the kickstarter goes, somehow, sometime I will finish this game.

That’s also why I have put the goal on where it is, mostly for a new PC and paying the people that work on it as well, to overcome any challenge that mostly comes in old hardware!

 

 

I can’t donate, but I want to help!

We know that sometimes it’s hard to help a project financially but that’s not the only way you can help! You can share this campain on any platform to reach out to as many people as possible! Just sharing this helps me out a lot and I am very grateful for that.

 

---

In order to escape their past at Woodside Academy, they apply for an exchange programme at a whole new school dedicated to Fine Arts. There, they will find the welcoming cat Mira and listen to her story about her close relationship with the red panda, Charlie.Talk to interesting characters who all have their own story to tell and follow Mira’s story as you both try to uncover a huge mystery that has struck this small town of Elk Grove as well as the hometown of the main character, Woodside.How did it begin?This game spawned as my graduation project in game dev high school. story:
Hello! This is Jorge, founder of Pers and your host in this campaign page. First of all, thank you for considering supporting the Blobbies. Below I'll give you all the necessary info so you can decide if you want to support us ... or skip us in favor of some exploding zombie cat app.

 

What is this campaign about?

The purpose of this campaign is to complete the Blobbies' app for iOS and Android. 

Blobbies' App Main Screen

 

This app is 75% complete and our goal is to ship it in May 2020. The app will have several sections including: the Blobbies' Personality Chart (where you can find out which Blobbie is most like you?) ...

The Blobbies' Personality Chart

 

... the Blobbies' Shape Challenge (where you must learn and remember shapes to then battle the evil Hexacones) ...

The Blobbies' Shape Challenge

 

... and the Blobbiemorph! game (a "platformer" [think Mario Bros.] where you must blobbiemorph into different animal shapes to survive all kinds of obstacles and enemies).

Early prototype of the Blobbiemorph! Game (unfinished graphics).

 

Ivi (my right hand) made a tour video of the app (the Blobbiemorf! game is not yet included).

What are Blobbies®?

Blobbies are friendly colorful beings that can change shape at will.  

The seven Blobbie Colors

 

Blobbies were introduced to the world via their book: “Here Come The Blobbies”, a sci-fi fantasy adventure that has received several awards in USA including a “Book of the Year” award from Creative Child Magazine. 

"Here Come The Blobbies" and some of its awards.

 

Each Blobbie is the physical representation of one of the 7 rainbow colors and has a unique personality type based on that color. It's based on research on color theory, psychology, metaphysics, chakras, etc. (or to summarize: witchcraft!!!). 

Can you find out which Blobbie is most like you?

 

What are these cool rewards I keep hearing about!?

Besides having your name on the credits of the app, access to the beta, and the option to create your own game level, you could also receive one of these cool transforming plush toys:

Blobbie Red • Blobbiemorpher Tyrannosaurus

 

Blobbie Orange • Blobbiemorpher Eagle

 

Blobbie Yellow • Blobbiemorpher Dolphin

 

Blobbie Green • Blobbiemorpher Rabbit

 

Blobbie Blue • Blobbiemorpher Triceratops

 

Blobbie Indigo • Blobbiemorpher Stegosaurus

 

Blobbie Violet • Blobbiemorpher Unicorn

 

And here they are organized in reward levels (with WORLDWIDE FREE SHIPPING*):

 

YOUR NAME in the Credits of the App + Beta Access + Blobbieapp + Boxed Minimorpher Pocket Toy (with Necklace, Stickers and Trading Card) + Signed Postcard.

 

YOUR NAME in the Credits of the App + Beta Access + Blobbieapp + Boxed Blobbiemorpher (with Stickers, Trading Card and Certificate) + Peruvian Postcard.

 

YOUR NAME in the Credits of the App + Beta Access + Blobbieapp + Boxed Blobbiemorpher (with Stickers, Trading Card and Certificate) + Polybagged Minimorpher Pocket Toy + Signed Postcard.

 

YOUR NAME in the Credits of the App + Beta Access + Blobbieapp + Set of 3 Deluxe Minimorphers Pocket Toys + Signed Postcard.

 

Your name HIGHLIGHTED in the Credits of the App + Beta Access + Blobbieapp +  Set of 7 Blobbiemorphers + 3 Deluxe Minimorphers + Book + Signed Postcard.

 

CREATE YOUR OWN LEVEL+ Level Creator Credits + USB Blobbiedrive + 10 pcs Blobbiemundo TCG set (in Spanish) + Ultimate Blobbiecombo.

 

The rewards are the Blobbiemorphers™, transforming plush toys that won a "Toy of the Year" award in the plush category and were selected as a "Top Holiday Gift" by Better Homes and Gardens magazine.

Better Homes and Gardens mention and some of the Blobbiemorphers' awards.

 

We used to sell them years ago, but we had to discontinue them because plush prices went up, the economy went down, and the cost of labor in China increased because factory workers demanded their human rights (and we support them! ...  but that didn't work to our advantage). If you want to read more about the story of the Blobbiemorphers, I wrote about an article for the Huffington Post. (FYI we have no political affiliation. The Blobbies love pledges from all political parties!).

Mathias, blobbiefans, and Jadiel with their Blobbiemorphers!

 

So, for this campaign we have decided to make a limited amount of Blobbiemorphers and give them as rewards! We'll be giving the 7 most popular designs: Red Tyrannosaurus, Orange Eagle, Yellow Dolphin, Green Rabbit, Blue Triceratops, Indigo Stegosaurus, and Violet Unicorn.

All Seven Limited Edition Blobbiemorphers.

 

These Blobbiemorphers are made of hypoallergenic velour, safe for kids 3 and up, 11 inches (28 cm) in height and much larger after they blobbiemorph.

Marcela, Gerardo, and Valeria with their Minimorphers!

 

We'll also give as rewards 3 models of Minimorphers™, the pocket version of the Blobbiemorphers,  only 3.5 inches (9 cm) in height. Sorry, not enough money to make all 7 colors ... maybe in a future campaign. 

Orange Eagle Minimorpher • Green Rabbit Minimorpher • Violet Unicorn Minimorpher

 

We also have the Blobbiecombos which include many goodies such as hardcover Blobbiebooks, Blobbie USB drives, the Blobbiemundo TCG, and even the chance to create your own game level!

*NOTE: Free worldwide delivery applies to most countries, some countries may require an additional fee. Delivery may take 30 or more.

 

Who are we and why should you trust us?

We are Pers®, a small company based in Lima, Peru and California U.S.A. 

Me, Ivi, Christoffer, Carlos Ernesto, and Juan Pablo on a sunny day in Lima.

 

Eating "Ají de Gallina" with the Pers Team (Tienfeng, Ivi, Marujita, Harold, Ronald, Anthony, Christoffer, me).

We create books, apps, toys and we recently launched a brand-new trading card game: Blobbiemundo™, which is currently played in Peru and we are hoping to take worldwide. More info on our TCG here and in our video below in Spanish (think of it as a foreign movie).

 

Now, about my background ... I have over 20 years of experience in Design and Development. My accomplishements include working as a Software Consultant at Cisco & Oracle ...

Some of my work for Cisco and Oracle.

 

... becoming the Visual Manager of Adobe's Creative Suites, in charge of Photoshop, Illustrator, Acrobat and others (I redesigned Photoshop's toolbar, proposed Adobe Bridge, and defined the style for the first Creative Suites) ...

Some of my work for Adobe.

 

... and being fired by Steve Jobs at Apple (well, he laid off half the company in a reorg, he didn't actually fire me personally ... but I still hold a grudge!). Below is a photo of me after having my dreams crushed by Steve.

At Apple ... cleaning out my cubicle :'(

 

If you are curious about my many, many failures (and some successes) in life, you can read all about them here.

Anyway, my point is that my team and I have experience creating and delivering products, so we'll make good use of the funds gathered in this campaign and we'll deliver quality products on time.

If you want to see some of our past work, you can download our FREE apps below.

Ice Math Ninja (Winner of a "Family Choice Award" and reached #1 Family App in 16 countries):

iOS: https://apple.co/33ulUAK   Android: http://bit.ly/2IPNb8J

 

Pookie and Tushka find a little piano (Winner of "Best First Children's Book" and Top 10 eBook at iTunes USA for 7 years):

iPad: https://apple.co/2ILHZTg    iBooks: https://apple.co/33whLMm

 

 

Ice Flap Penguin (No awards, a total loser!): 

iOS: https://apple.co/2IQO9lg   Android: http://bit.ly/32bcZ72

 

Why do you need my hard-earned money?

Because we are a small company and if want to eat (we do!) we must work on things that bring money quickly ... which means that fun projects like the Blobbies' app always take a back seat. I've been working on this app in my spare time since 2014, but I can never set aside enough time to complete it. 

Working on the Blobbies' app in ancient 2015.

 

If this campaign is successful, we'll be able to hire additional personnel to help out with our workload so that we can finalize the graphics, animations, level creation, and the testing of the app (if you want to be an app tester, there is a funding level for that!). 

 

Possible additions to the Blobbies' app that could happen ... if we exceeded our goal.

 

Our funding goal is extremely modest, but we are hoping that you fall in love with the Blobbies, we exceed the goal and use the additional funds to be able to create a much better game ... and maybe even more Blobbie games and products ... it's all up to you (no pressure). 

 

Concept game for smartwatches that could happen ... if this campaign was beyond successful.

 

Thank you for reading, I hope we endeared ourselves to you ... or at least you pity us enough to pledge! Either way, the Blobbies love you and they eagerly await your support! :)

story:
At Duettos we manufacture classical tabletop games using your designs and your images turning them into unique and beautiful artworks. We believe that playing games with a personal touch is far more fun!

Duettos games are not only fun to play but they are perfect and very personal gifts for birthdays, weddings, Christmas and other occasions.

For us quality, durability, design and a high service level are paramount.

Our vision is to create a large portfolio of different games that customers can choose from and can customize to their needs.

We successfully started our business with a memory game. With this campaign on Indiegogo we want to launch our customizable Domino game. If successfully funded our third game will be a customizable Sudoku board game.


Manufacturing handmade games of high quality is time consuming and needs durable and appealing materials. Next to optimizing the manufacturing process to keep production costs low, we also need to purchase materials in advance and in larger batches. Now this is where we ask for your support.

Seventy percent of our funding goal is allocated to purchase materials. Twenty percent will be invested in production tools and their development. The last ten percent are reserve for unforeseeable issues.


Instead of dots on the tiles, our Domino shows your images! This makes playing Domino far more fun!

A normal double-six Domino game consists of 28 tiles having values from 0 till 6 points. Our Domino game consists of 36 tiles having values from 1 - 8 points, a different image reflecting each value. The tiles ar much larger than common Domino tiles. To manufacture your customized Domino you only need to send us 8 different images.


Here are the specifications of the game.

The tiles:

  • 36 tiles per game
  • 8 different images
  • 40mm x 80mm x 10mm (1.57inch x 3.15inch x 0.39inch)
  • oak wood
  • images printed on a very thin layer of polystyrol
  • high resolution print in photo quality
  • durable and water resistant
The box:

  • 230mm x 230mm x 65mm (9inch x 9inch x 2.6inch)
  • cardboard covered with white paper
  • label size 200mm x 200mm (7.87inch x 7.87 inch)
  • label can be fully customized
  • foam-rubber inlay that holds the tiles on their place
Booklet with the rules of the game:

  • 200mm x 200mm (7.87inch x 7.87 inch)
  • printed with your images
  • in English and German
The certificate:

  • 185mm x 185mm (7.28inch x 7.28 inch)
  • customized with one of your images
  • showing date of production and serialnumber

Please see more pictures of the game in the gallery above and find more information about our Domino game on our homepage.


This is the game where players have to find pairs!
But not just any pairs, our memory game is made with your images.

For a detailed description of the game, pleae visit our homepage.
Here are the specifications of the game.

The playing cards:

  • up to 72 cards per game
  • up to 72 different images depending of the game type
  • 65mm x 65mm x 2mm (2.56inch x 2.56inch x 0.08inch)
  • cardboard coated with high quality paper on both sides
  • high resolution print
  • front and back are customizable
The box
  • 210mm x 210mm x 45mm (8.27inch x 8.27inch x 1.77inch)
  • cardboard covered with white paper
  • label size 200mm x 200mm (7.87inch x 7.87 inch)
  • label can be fully customized
  • foam-rubber inlay that holds the cards on their place
Booklet with the rules of the game:
  • 200mm x 200mm (7.87inch x 7.87 inch)
  • printed with your images
  • in English and German
The certificate:
  • 185mm x 185mm (7.28inch x 7.28 inch)
  • customized with one of your images
  • showing date of production and serialnumber






Every project has risks and challenges but as we already managed to bring our first game successfully to market, we have enough experience in making customizable products.

We also have very reliable suppliers for all our materials and have tested our new game over a period of more than three months.

In comparison to non-customizable products each Duettos game is made individually. Depending on the amount of pre-orders, production and shipping might be a challenge and could take longer as planned. We will however process all orders first in first out.


If you like our products and like what we do, then please help us to forward this campaign to your friends! Mention our campaign on social media, like us on Facebook, twitter about our project and post messages about us wherever you can!

If you have any connection to the press, please contact us. We would be delighted if you would write about us.

Thank you!


Where can I order a Duettos game?

As the Duettos Memory game is on the market already, they can be ordered via our online shop on our homepage. However you will only get the special campaign discount here on Indiegogo. Our Domino game is currently only available on Indiegogo and will be available in our online shop after the campaign ended successfully.

How do I get my customized game?

When this campaign is successful we will add your order to our system and send you a voucher with an upload code. With this code you can upload your images for your game.

How do I know which images I have to upload

Together with the voucher and upload code, you will receive a detailed description of how to choose and format your images.

I can’t format images. Do you offer a service for formatting my images?

Yes we do, and of course this service is free! Simply send us the original images and we will do the rest.

When will my game be shipped?

As soon as we receive your images your order is complete and we can start manufacturing your game. The order of manufacturing is based on first in first out.

What do you mean by first in first out?

The first pre-order that is complete, i.e. we received all the necessary images, will be the first order to be manufactured. It does not mean that we will process the first pre-order on Indiegogo first!

Can you guarantee delivery before Christmas?

Unfortunately not. Although we plan to ship all games in November, we can’t foresee how many orders we will get and we also don’t have any influence on shipping time of any carrier. But believe us; we will do everything possible to ship your game on time before Christmas!

Where does my money go?

All the money donated with our Thank You perk will be used to bring our next product, a customizable Sudoku board game to market. The rest of the money will be used to purchase material and build the tools for production.

How will you know where to send my game?

Your shipping information and address will be collected during the check-out process.

Where do I see the shipping costs?

Please find an overview of the shipping costs below. During the check-out process you will be asked for your shipping address. Depending on your address and perk, the system will show you the correct shipping cost.

Where do I get support if I have questions?

Please simply write us an email to info@duettos.com We will answer your questions a soon as we can.

story:
Hello. My name is Alanood and I'm a university student.

Since I have been a child, I always wanted to create a game with my own ideas.

This project is my dream coming true.

If you fund me, the money will go to:

  • Longer story and better writing (I will hire English language specialists to make my storytelling better).
  • Background music and sound effects.
  • Better visuals for buildings and dungeons.
  • Make the enviroment more interactive.

If you don't want to support me with money, I would be thankful if you share my page with others.

For any questions or feedback, feel free to contact me: AlanoodSulaiman@gmail.com

Please note that my game will be commercial.

story:
What is Mate?

Mate is a social card game that will help you to overcome social awkwardness and to better get to know your co-workers, team members, friends or members of your family. All questions were carefully selected and are designed to apply to all genders and ages.

Mate is a set of poker cards - this means there are 52 cards and 3 jokers. On every card you will find a question/phrase/topic that applies to the following rules:

Hearts: Broad topics
Diamonds: Fill in sentences
Clubs: Have you ever questions
Spades: Choose between X or Y
Jokers: Easy and fun drinking games (okay, "all ages" might not apply to this one here)

How did I get the idea for Mate?

One day I had one of these encounters that seemed to be of a disappointing nature as both lifestyles and interests did not match. So we had one of those run-of-the-mill conversations about the weather and our jobs. At some point though my colleague asked to stop right there and to change the subject - so I replied "Ok, then tell me something about motorbikes."

Baffled by my own question - motorbikes were certainly the last thing on my imaginary topic list - we willingly gave this subject a try! Surprisingly we could talk for hours and hours! Although at first it seemed like a difficult topic to me, in the end it amazed me how much I actually had to say about it - The first time I drove a motorbike by myself in Thailand or my brother who tried to pimp his tiny tin-scooter just to be caught by the police. Or my friend who lost his motorbike to some drunk friends finding it funny to burn it in the woods.

This taught me no matter how difficult you might find getting to know another person - asking the right questions can make the difference. It is hard to find topics to talk about that will get your conversations going. But every person is worth talking to and Mate Cards might just turn things around. You only need to crack the ice and that's what Mate is designed for.

How does it work?

Mate consists of 4 different type of questions that can be found on each of the cards symbols. Some questions are easy and fun to answer, some are ice breakers, some will give away certain traits, some will reveal funny stories, some will let you remember and dwell in your past and some might just reveal beautiful forgotten memories.

Feel free to use the cards to your likings - however it might be a good choice to just put them on a table and start picking one card after another.

Cover & Back

The cover and the back of the cards are both designed with carefully selected flowers/ornaments made from the playing cards symbols - Hearts, Diamonds, Clubs and Spades.

Hearts

These cards will give you a broad topic or a general idea for a conversation. These cards give you the biggest freedom as you can say and ask anything related to the topic. E.g. "Do you do trainspotting?" or "Trainspotting is a weird hobby, do you have any weird hobbies?" or "I do not have any interests in trains, but I do like planes - I collected little models of planes when I was small"

Diamonds

On these cards you will be given a phrase with missing parts for you to fill in. Sometimes you can simply fill in words but sometimes you will need to fill in whole stories.

Clubs

Clubs contain "Have you ever" questions. Either answer with a simple yes or no - or you might just find yourself falling into a big puddle of memories worth telling each other!

Spades

On these cards you will find questions of the type X or Y. Some are easy and fun to answer and some are not.

Jokers

Have you ever been in the situation in which you wanted to play a drinking game but couldn't think of one? I certainly have - but worry no more! On the Jokers of Mate you will find fun and easy drinking games. I made sure not to write any words about alcohol on them so they might just as well apply to children as the games are also indeed quite fun to play without any alcohol.

Current Status & Challenges

Design and questions are completed and ready to be printed. However I am still open to any suggestions for questions, topics etc. - if you have any suggestions please don't hesitate to let me know so I can consider including them.

Currently I am evaluating several printing houses to ensure fast delivery and high quality of the cards.

The cards are already so far ahead in the process that I currently only see two last possible obstacles: 

1) If I am confronted with high demand I might not be able to be as fast as I want to with getting the cards ready for shipping.

2) Packaging is not ready yet. Only when I give my okay for printing I will receive the outlines for packaging. The whole design for the packaging still needs to be done and might delay delivery a bit further.
